Many among both the clergy and military draw a straight line between the Protestant revolters we fight today and the dedication to the Protestant cause shown by our neighbors. We cannot remain a respected and feared nation in the eyes of others if we do not confront them about their support, explicit or implicit, of the heretics who assault the [Root.GetAdjective] lands.
translation: 通常情况下，每个国家的乌合之众是他们自己的事.当另一个国家公然信奉这类精神毒品的乌合之众,事实却并非如此.很多教士和贵族认为我们现在对抗的新教叛徒和我们的邻国支持新教联盟的投入有直接关系.我们无法被尊重和敬畏如果我们不明显的,私下的帮助他们阻挡这个异端进攻[Root.GetAdjective]的土地.

original: They better have an answer for us!
Let us not stir up more trouble over this.
translation: 我们不要因为这个惹出更多麻烦.

original: The Cause of the Calvinist Plague

Normally, each nation's rabble is their own concern. Not so when another nation openly espouses the same spiritual rot as the rabble. Many among both the clergy and military draw a straight line between the Reformed revolters we fight today and the dedication to the Reformed cause shown by our neighbors. We cannot remain a respected and feared nation in the eyes of others if we do not confront them about their support, explicit or implicit, of the heretics who assault the [Root.GetAdjective] lands.
translation: 通常情况下，每个国家的乌合之众是他们自己的事.当另一个国家公然信奉这类精神毒品的乌合之众,事实却并非如此.很多教士和贵族认为我们现在对抗的改革宗叛徒和我们的邻国支持改革宗联盟的投入有直接关系.我们无法被尊重和敬畏如果我们不明显的,私下的帮助他们阻挡这个异端进攻[Root.GetAdjective]的土地.

original: They better have an answer for us!
Let us not stir up more trouble over this.
translation: 我们不要因为这个惹出更多麻烦。

original: Apparently, the [From.GetAdjective] government's decision to enforce the Catholic faith in their lands has been a mistake in more ways than one. Their [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects have revolted against them, which more than a few of those affected blame on our support of the true faith.\n\nNow, an ambassador from [From.GetName] has openly confronted us about this issue, and rather imperiously demanded that we renounce the rebels and their struggle. While we certainly would like to see the spread of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, this is a diplomatic issue more than a religious one. What is our stance on these foreign rebels?
translation: 显然，[From.GetAdjective]政府决定在本国强制传播天主教信仰已经在多方面显得不正确。他们的[Root.Religion.GetName]人民试图反抗他们，这些反抗的人比支持我们的正统信仰的人要多。\n\n现在，一位来自[From.GetName]的大使公然用这个问题对我们发难，专横的要求我们放弃与叛乱分子的斗争。我们无疑希望看到[Root.Religion.GetName]的传播，但这是一个外交问题而非一个单纯的宗教问题。我们该怎样处理这件事呢？

original: Cuius regio, eius religio. They should respect the will of their rulers.
translation: 统治者的宗教乃人民的宗教。他们应该尊重他们的统治者的意志。

original: We demand that you cease your oppression of these poor [Root.Religion.GetName] subjects!
translation: 我们要求你停止对这些可怜的[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒的压迫！

original: We will support the faithful against you, openly and gladly!
translation: 我们十分乐意公开支持对抗你的信徒！

original: Whatever troubles we may have with the [From.Religion.GetName] scum within our own borders, we can console ourselves with the fact that the international leaders of their faith distance themselves from this rebellion. [From.GetName] have promised us that regardless of their own beliefs, they consider the revolt against our rule unacceptable.
translation: 麻烦大了，我们可能在自己的国内有了相当数量的[From.Religion.GetName]败类，我们可以自我安慰的是，我们的信仰守护者可能帮我们镇压这个叛乱。[From.GetName]已经向我们承诺，他们会协助我们镇压我们无法抵抗的叛军。

original: Let us hope this is not just duplicitous talk.
translation: 让我们希望这不仅仅是笑里藏刀的谈判。

original: Apparently the [From.Religion.GetName] in [From.GetName] are more brazen about the trouble they cause than we thought. When confronted about the fact that their brothers and sisters in faith are rioting in our streets, their response was that we brought this upon ourselves by disrespecting their heretical beliefs.
translation: 看来[From.GetName]的[From.Religion.GetName]要比我们想象的更加无耻。质及其同信仰的兄弟姐妹在城中的暴举，他们却只说这是我们自作自受，是我们不尊重他们的异端信仰。

original: If that's how they see things, they can hardly hope to retain our respect.
translation: 如果这就是他们处事方式，他们也很难希望得到我们的尊重.

original: Our efforts to get [From.GetName] to take responsibility for the heresy they spread seem to have backfired. Not only have they embraced the rebel movement against our state religion, they have openly incited more riots, causing the heretics to grow even more confident in their cause. Every drop of Catholic blood spilled on our soil by these maniacs is now on their hands.
translation: 我们尝试让[From.GetName]负担起传播异端责任的努力似乎适得其反.他们不仅接受我们境内的异端反叛运动，他们已经公开煽动暴乱更多，导致异端更有信心发展.因此流下的每一滴天主教徒的血都是他们的罪过

original: There can be no absolution for those who persist in sin.
translation: 和罪恶同流合污的人是不能得到赦免的.

original: Sometimes, we have the chance to set something into motion without seeming to have done anything. One such chance has arrived recently, when a cardinal living on the soil of one of our neighbors admitted to an agent from [Root.GetName] that he would consider moving across the border and support us in the Curia for a price. While this may be tempting, there may be a greater price to pay if we take advantage of this: the wrath of the country he deserts.
translation: 有时候我们即便看起来什么也不做，也有机会在暗地里操控。我们最近得到了一个机会，一个邻国的枢机承认他是[Root.GetName]的间谍，为了保命，他愿意跨越边界来到我们这里并且在教廷里支持我们。尽管这听起来很诱人，但是这份请求也许会让我们付出更大的代价：他叛逃国家的怒火。

original: We will take our chances that they never find out.
translation: 我们相信他们不会发现的.

original: It is not worth risking, but the man who found him deserves a promotion.
translation: 这个风险不足以换来回报，不过发现这个叛徒的人值得奖励.
收受贿赂的枢机离开了

original: A cardinal who had previously stayed in [Root.GetName], close to the border, has now moved out of our nation entirely and shifted his allegiance to our neighbors. The [From.GetAdjective] agents who bribed him to betray us probably thought we would not notice their hand in the matter, but they were wrong. This intentional sabotage of our influence in the Curia is unacceptable and will not stand unchallenged.
translation: 一个之前靠近边境在[Root.GetName]的枢机已经叛逃到我们的邻国。并且向该国效忠了。[From.GetAdjective]的间谍也许认为他们的贿赂行为没有被我们发现，他们大错特错。这种对我们的教廷影响力的蓄意破坏是不可接受的。

original: It is an affront to both us and our Church.
translation: 这是对我们和教会的侮辱.

original: The cardinal in [Root.GetName] has lived close to the heretics in our nation and rather than condemn them, he has tried to understand them. While a sympathetic course of action, he has recently approached one of our ministers confessing that he has himself started to doubt Church doctrine. If this came to the Pope's knowledge, he would no longer be allowed to serve in the Curia, but perhaps we could convince him to keep this to himself for a few ducats.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的枢机试图了解我们国内的异端信徒而不是谴责他们，与他们亲密地生活在一起。他向我们的一位顾问坦白，尽管一开始只是出于同情，他最近也开始怀疑起教会的教义。如果教宗知道了这件事，他将无法在教廷继续任职，也许我们可以花点钱让他保持这个秘密。

original: Faith cannot be bought, but silence can.
translation: 信仰无法用金钱买来,但是沉默可以.
教宗发现了我们的的行动。

original: It's unfortunate, but he is ill suited for his position if he has doubts.
translation: 这是一个悲伤的故事，不过如果他有疑问的话,他不适合这个位置.
教宗发现了我们口是心非的主教

original: The cardinal we bribed to keep silent about his doubts of Church doctrine unfortunately still believed in confessing his sins. Even more unfortunately, the manner in which he did this to the Pope has not granted him forgiveness, perhaps because he does not truly regret his doubts. While he does regret taking our bribe, this too has come to the knowledge of the Holy Father, who is displeased with us as much as the now former cardinal.
translation: 不幸的是，受我们贿赂、答应将自己对教会教义的怀疑埋在心底的主教仍然相信应该忏悔自己受贿的罪行。更不幸的是，也许是因为他并不后悔自己对教义产生怀疑，他向教宗坦白的方式没有让他得到谅解。尽管对接受了我们的贿赂很是后悔，他还是让教宗知道了受贿这件事，结果教宗对我们像对这位前主教一样地不满。

original: Is it too late for us to ask forgiveness, too?
translation: 现在请求宽恕对我们来说是否也为时已晚？

original: The cardinal in [Root.GetName] has been loyal to [Root.Owner.GetName] so far, but is starting to have doubts about his continued stay here after seeing heathens living so close to his home city of [Root.GetCapitalName]. In a letter to the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle], he has claimed that these people cannot be trusted and requested that they be subject to much more stringent regulations than our other citizens.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的枢机一直对[Root.Owner.GetName]忠心耿耿，不过他因为在他家乡[Root.GetCapitalName]附近蔓延的异端开始犹豫是否应该继续留下。在一封寄给[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的信件中，他声称这些人不值得信赖，并要求他们接受比正常公民更严格的法规。

original: If we cannot judge someone's character by faith, what else?
translation: 如果我们不能通过信仰来判断一个人的性格,那什么可以呢？

original: We have no intentions of limiting their rights because of one man.
translation: 我们不能因为一个人的行为而限制他们的权利。

original: $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$, being a wise and respected Catholic, has maintained good relations with cardinals and other people in the Church even outside the borders of [Root.GetName]. They recently discovered that a man who has just been promoted to cardinal, who is also a good friend of theirs, is considering moving to our country to facilitate their mutual work on a theological text. If we aided this process, we would have a cardinal in the Curia who is not only loyal to $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$, but also to [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: $THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$，作为一个睿智且广受尊重的天主教徒，和国内外的枢机和其他神职人员保持了良好的关系。他发现最近他的一位刚被提升到枢机的好友，正在考虑移居到我国来促进神学的文本工作。如果我们给予资助，那么我们在教廷可以获得不仅忠于$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$本人，也忠于[Root.Monarch.GetName]的一位枢机。

original: Whatever we can do to help, we will.
translation: 只要我们能帮助,我们一定帮。

original: Our administration has other priorities than nepotism.
translation: 我们的政府有比裙带关系更重要的事情要考虑.

original: One of the cardinals in [Root.GetName] has proven to be a skilled administrator and already provides useful advice to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]. At this point, making him a minister in our government would almost be only a formality, but an important formality nonetheless, since he may grow more powerful yet. Having a cardinal in our service would certainly lend us credibility with the Pope and strengthen the sentiment that [Root.GetName] is a Catholic nation first and foremost.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的一位枢机已经被证明是个能干的政治家，他已经向[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]提出过很多有用的意见。从这点上来看，任命他为政府大臣仅仅是走形式而已，不过这仍然是一个重要的形式，因为他可能会继续晋升。枢机在我国政府任职将加强教宗对我们的信任，对我们的第一印象是[Root.GetName]是一个合格的天主教国家。

original: He has aided us well so far, so let us get the formality over with.
translation: 迄今为止,他很好的帮助我们管理，所以让我们赶紧办完繁琐的手续。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] does not need his advice to rule [Root.GetName].

translation: 枢机的政策得罪了贵族

original: Since we made one of our cardinals a minister in our government, he has gone far beyond providing theological insights and innovated significantly in the administration of [Root.GetName]. Unfortunately, his suggestions of centralizing power are not possible without removing some authority from the nobles, who have begun to see him as an opportunist. At this point, trying to remove him from office over this dispute would probably mean we lost his loyalty altogether, but the nobles who stand to lose from his plans consider this a sacrifice easily worth making.
translation: 自从我们将我们的一位枢机任命为政府里的大臣，他远不止提供了神学见解和在[Root.GetName]的政府中创造新的管理模式。不幸的是。他的集权建议是无法避开剥夺一部分贵族的权力的，这些贵族已经将他视为投机主义者。如果在此时因为这个争议将其开除出政府意味着我们将失去他的忠诚，不过在他的计划里将一文不值的贵族认为这是一个划算的代价。

original: The minister is showing us the path to the future.
translation: 这位大臣正在指引我国的未来。

original: He has overstepped his authority and should be dismissed.
translation: 他逾越了他的管辖范围，所以应该被解职。

original: While conducting espionage in one of our neighboring countries, our operatives shadowed a powerful man, a cardinal, and discovered that although his loyalty appears incorruptible, his morals are already corrupt beyond what the Church can possibly imagine. Although the details of his transgressions are not of interest to us, they may be of interest to the Pope and give us a chance to weaken our neighbor's influence in the Curia. On the other hand, having a hold on a man of his rank could be useful in many situations.
translation: 当我们在邻国实施间谍活动的时候，我们的间谍尾随了一个有权有势的人——一位枢机，尽管发现他的忠诚似乎无法被收买，但他的道德已经败坏到教会无法想象的境界了。虽然我们对他犯的细节不是感兴趣，也许对教宗来说将会十分有兴趣，而且会让我们削弱邻国在教廷里的影响力。另一方面来看，有着如此重要的人物的把柄也将有很多用处。

original: The Holy See must be informed of his actions.
translation: 他的行为需要让圣座知道.

original: We can use this as blackmail to improve our spy network.
translation: 我们可以以此为要挟来改善我们的间谍网络.

original: The cardinal in [Root.GetName] has been rumored to be of weak character, but has always been discrete enough not to warrant further investigation. Now it appears that foreign spies from [From.GetName] who have had their eye on him put an end to this and exposed his sins to the Pope. His days as a cardinal are numbered, and our power in the Curia will be weakened due to this untimely [From.GetAdjective] intervention.
translation: [Root.GetName]的枢机在传言中是个性格软弱的人，不过一直十分小心的避免任何进一步的调查。现在[From.GetName]的外国间谍已经盯上了他，准备将他的罪行披露给教宗。他的枢机之职难保，而我们在教廷的影响力也因为[From.GetAdjective]的干预大大下降。

original: What an underhanded way of getting at our influence.
translation: 这是一个多么卑鄙的手段.

original: Our people have come a long way from their origins. Where there were once many tribes with their own customs and leaders, people throughout [Root.GetName] now recognize [Root.Monarch.GetName] as their ruler. Many have speculated that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] may soon declare [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] Sultan, but this may not go without contention unless the title is given to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] by the Caliph.\n\nWord has reached us that the Ottoman Caliphate has its seat in the distant city of Istanbul and they may just be willing to grant us an audience. Perhaps with the Caliph's blessing, the Sultanate of [Root.GetName] will find support among the faithful of its citizens.
translation: 从我们的起源来看,我们的人民取得了极大的进展. 以前是许多部落混居,他们有自己的习俗和领导者,现在[Root.GetName]的人民认同[Root.Monarch.GetName]作为他们的统治者. 很多人猜测[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]将会很快自称为[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]苏丹,除非是哈里发授予[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]的,否则一直会被人怀疑正统性.\n\n奥斯曼哈里发在遥远的伊斯坦布尔愿意接见我们的新闻传来了. 也许有了哈里发的祝福[Root.GetName]的苏丹能得到虔诚的人民们的支持.

original: Let us travel to this faraway land and seek their support!
translation: 让我们长途跋涉到千里之外,寻求他们的支持!

original: We do not need their approval to reign!
translation: 我们不需要他们的许可才能统治!

original: An emissary has arrived from the lands of [From.GetName], seeking support from [Root.Monarch.GetName] in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] capacity as Caliph for the creation of a new sultanate. Once a collection of disparate tribes, we are informed that the [From.GetAdjective] people are now pious Muslims and devoted to their ruler, [From.Monarch.GetName], who wishes to seize the title of Sultan with our support.
translation: 从[From.GetName]来了使节团，为[Root.Monarch.GetName]寻求[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]作为哈里发支持创建一个新的苏丹国. 曾经只是一群不同的部落,我们得知 [From.GetAdjective]的人民都是虔诚的穆斯林,并且热爱着他们的统治者，[From.Monarch.GetName]希望通过我们的支持获得苏丹的头衔.

original: A noble goal. The foundation of a new sultanate is a blessing to us as well.
translation: 高尚的目标。一个全新的苏丹国也是我们的幸事。

original: If you wish to be Sultan, you must convince the people yourself.
translation: 如果你想成为苏丹,你需要自己先说服人民.

original: The emissary has returned from Istanbul, bringing news of how the leader of the Muslim world has decreed that [Root.Monarch.GetName] is now the Sultan of [Root.GetName]. What may have otherwise turned into a violent struggle for power and political upheaval will now see the support of most, maybe all, of the wise and faithful among the [Root.GetAdjective] people.
translation: 使节团从伊斯坦布尔回来了，带来了穆斯林的领袖已经同意[Root.Monarch.GetName]是[Root.GetName]的苏丹的消息。一场可能的血腥的政治和权利斗争现在可以得到大部分，也许所有聪明和虔诚的[Root.GetAdjective]人民的支持。

original: Only the unbelievers will oppose us now.
translation: 只有不信者才会反对我们。

original: The emissary has returned from Istanbul, but despite our best efforts, the Caliph would not grant us the title. According to [From.Monarch.GetHerHim], it is up to us to convince the people of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s capacity to rule as Sultan.
translation: 使者已经自伊斯坦布尔归来，即使他费尽了口舌，哈里发终究没为我王加冕。依[From.Monarch.GetHerHim]所言，[Root.Monarch.GetName]是否担得上苏丹之名，全凭百姓而定。

original: A Caliph displaying such poor judgment is hardly fit for the title.
translation: 一个判断力如此差哈里发不配上他的头衔.

original: The [Root.Owner.GetAdjective] people have lived in this arid climate for a long time. Although this causes some foolish nations to dismiss us as inhabiting the land unwanted by others, we have mastered skills of survival and combat that they would be wise to fear.\n\nJust across the border at [Root.GetName], our brethren are suffering the oppression of other people, people who may not be prepared for what the [Root.Culture.GetName] are capable of when you underestimate them. With the help of these locals, we could organize a raid into the lands of their oppressors, striking quickly and taking advantage of the fact that we know the desert there better than anyone else.
translation: 很长时间以来[Root.Owner.GetAdjective]的人民生活在这气候干旱的地区. 尽管这让一些愚蠢的国家认为我们的土地是废地,我们已经掌握了如何生存下去和让他们害怕的战斗技巧.\n\n在[Root.GetName],边界的另一边，我们的兄弟正在遭受其他人的压迫,他们将会因为轻视我们对[Root.Culture.GetName]准备不足. 借助当地人的帮助,我们可以利用我们比其他任何人都好的沙漠知识在压迫者的领土上组织一些突袭.

original: We will arrive and withdraw like a sandstorm.
translation: 我们的到来和撤退会像沙尘暴一样.

original: We will not assault our neighbors like this, regardless of who their subjects are.
translation: 无论他们的附庸是谁,我们不会进攻我们的邻居.

original: Some people from the [Root.Culture.GetName] elite have recently been attacked by what they believe to be a raid organized by foreign military. Initially, the attack seemed to have occurred too deep into our borders for this to be possible, but an explanation for how this could have happened has begun to take shape. The [From.Culture.GetName] in one of our border provinces, who we thought to be our loyal subjects, appear to have conspired with our neighbors to organize the attack.\n\nWhile it may not be possible to retaliate in kind, there are other ways we can show what we think of such cowardly tactics.
translation: 一些[Root.Culture.GetName]的精英被他们认为是有组织的邻国军队突袭. 一开始,这些攻击似乎发生的太过于深入我们的土地,不过我们很快的得出了合理的解释.[From.Culture.GetName]是我们的邻近省份,我们以为忠诚的附庸却暗地里和我们的邻居阴谋策划了这场袭击.\n\n也许我们无法用相同的方式报复,我们有其他方式展示我们对他们的胆小鬼战术的看法.

original: Sooner or later, they will pay.
translation: 他们迟早会付出代价的.

original: A long time has passed, but we have not forgotten how [Root.GetName] once served as an entry point for an audacious attack to plunder our country. Many people believe that this threat remains real, and demands that the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] act upon it, strengthening our control of the border and ensuring that desert raiders are not allowed to cross it ever again.
translation: 很长时间过去了,不过我们没有忘记[Root.GetName]曾经作为一次胆大包天的突袭的进入点. 很多人认为这个威胁依旧存在,并且要求[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]行动起来，加强我们对边界的控制,防止沙漠突袭者穿越边境.

original: We will dispatch the necessary troops immediately.
translation: 我们马上派出需要的士兵.

original: The [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] will travel to patrol the border [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]!
Surely some local initiative can be arranged.
translation: 一定有地方政策可以让我们实施.

original: The [Root.Culture.GetName] people have always been resourceful and adaptive beyond what others would consider possible, and lands others may find impossible to inhabit or even traverse are our homes, our roads and our domain. We could made good use of this, including in our country's trade efforts. One of our main trade routes is in fact right next to such an area, and there have been discussions about how to best take advantage of this.
translation: [Root.Culture.GetName]的人民一直足智多谋,并且拥有超出其他人的想象的适应性. 一些别人觉得无法居住甚至横跨的地方是我们的家园,我们的道路,我们的王国.我们可以很好地利用这一点,包括提高我们国家的贸易.我们其中一条主要的贸易路线其实恰好处于类似地区旁边,因此已经开展一些关于如何最好的利用的方法的讨论.

original: We can send our caravans on routes that we alone know.
translation: 我们可以让商队走只有我们知道的那条路.

original: It can be used as a base to stage an attack on the trade route.
translation: 这可以作为基地来组织对贸易路线的进攻.

original: Our efforts to bring salvation to the heathens in [Root.GetName] have borne fruit, but it is a strange and unfamiliar fruit. The local population has started to accept Christ, but the faith has been intertwined with their old ways. Angels and spirits, the true Lord and the old Lord of the Sky, the Blessed Virgin and the Earth Goddess... do these people really believe in what they hear, or do they simply call their old idols by different names? The local missionary has come to us for advice, concerned about the souls of the [Root.Owner.GetAdjective] people, and his own.
translation: 我们尝试把救赎带给[Root.GetName]的兄弟姐妹们的努力已经开花结果，不过结果却是奇怪并且没有预料到的。虽然当地的人民开始接受基督，他们的信仰还是和之前的纠缠不清。天使和鬼魂，上帝和古老的天空之神，圣母和大地女神……这些人民是真的相信还是只是将他们的神灵换了个名字？当地的传教士前来咨询我们的意见，为[Root.Owner.GetAdjective]人民和他自己的灵魂而担忧。

original: Their faith is pure, and we would be fools to reject it.
translation: 他们的信念是纯洁的，而我们如果拒绝的话就是天大的傻瓜.

original: This is worse than heresy. It must be rooted out.
translation: 这比异端更加严重.这必须被消灭掉.

original: We trust in the spirits, in the gods that have always been with us, and our people are rarely impressed by the lies of those who would lead us from them. However, some people on our border who have come into contact with those who worship one they claim returned from the dead seem to have seen similarities between their faith and ours. Just as many here choose to worship the Sky Father, our neighbors speak of the one the call Christ as having a Heavenly Father himself. Many have begun to suggest that these two may be one and the same, and that the animosity between our faiths is nothing but a misunderstanding.
translation: 我们相信鬼魂,相信一直与我们同在的神灵,我们的人民拒绝相信那些谎言. 但是,一些生活在边境的人民接触到和我们有很多相同的声称起死回生的信仰. 就像很多人选择崇拜天空之神,我们的邻居口中的崇拜他们的基督. 很多人开始认为这两个其实是一致的,这两个信仰之间的仇恨只是误解造成的而已.

original: This is simply another lie they spread to force their faith upon us.
translation: 这只是他们为了强迫我们追随他们的信仰而编造出来的另外一条谎言而已.

original: We have different names for many other things, so why not gods?
translation: 很多其他东西都有不同的名字,为什么神灵不行么？

original: Bringing the word of the Prophet to the people of [Root.GetName] has not been impossible, but the outcome so far has troubled some of our religious scholars. Although they have abadoned many pagan traditions, a reverence for ancestors remains with troubling undertones of worship. We see no fault in honoring one's family, but when prayers are directed to the dead and not to God, can anything good really come of it? Nevertheless, these are ancient practices. Rejecting them may alienate many of those who would otherwise listen.
translation: 将先知的智慧传授给[Root.GetName]的人民并非难事,不过因此产生的结果让一部分宗教学者十分苦恼.尽管他们放弃了很多传统，崇拜他们的祖先仍然拥有着令人不安的回音. 他们崇敬祖先并不是错误的,但当祈祷的对象是去世的人们而不是上帝,这样真的好么？ 然而这些都是古老的做法,如果拒绝他们的要求会疏远很多本来会听从我们的劝说的人们.

original: We will respect their practices as equal to our own.
translation: 我们尊重他们的信仰就如同我们自己的信仰一样.

original: There is no God but God. If they will not learn this, we have achieved nothing.
translation: 世上只有一个神.如果他们不能从中学到什么,那我们什么也没达到.

original: We have known of the Muslim faith for a long time, but chosen to remain true to our traditions. Those who devote themselves only to the distant creator, forsaking the gods and spirits that dwell among us, are certainly on the path to misfortune.\n\nPeople at the border, who live next to Muslims every day, have started to see things differently. They find that the words of Muhammad speak to them as well as their neighbors and rather than seeing this as a betrayal of the old ways, they identify the prophet's God with our most revered sky deity.
translation: 即使我们知道穆斯林信仰很久了,我们依然选择坚持传统. 那些为了一个遥远的造物主而献身,放弃我们以前的神灵的将会走上一条不归路.\n\n在边境上和穆斯林每日接触的人们已经开始感受到不同. 他们意识到他们邻居口中的穆罕穆德迎合他们的观点,而且并不认为这是对旧的信仰的背叛.他们认为,先知的上帝和我们最神圣的天空之神是一样的.

original: Your ancestors go forgotten while you pray to the sky. This is unacceptable.
translation: 当你们的祖先被遗忘的时候,你们也在向天空祈祷. 这是不可接受的.

original: Perhaps if we accept their one God, they will consider our many.
translation: 也许我们接受了他们的唯一的神灵,他们才会接受我们众多的神灵.

original: Although many of our citizens are not yet followers of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, we have remained hopeful and patient. Others are not so patient. Many of our citizens consider it absurd that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], ruling by the grace of God, accepts the widespread paganism in our country. This, in turn, has sparked concern among the very same pagans that they are subjects of an externally imposed belief system, with some of them calling for the overthrow of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] does not show reverence for the spiritual practices that have lived with the people here for millennia.
translation: 尽管很多我们的人民并不是[Root.Religion.GetName]的信徒,我们还是保持着希望和耐心. 但是其他人却并没有我们这般耐心. [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]接受了上帝的恩典来统治,他让异教肆意横行的行为让大量人民感到可笑. 这反过来又引发了很多非常相同的异教徒的注意,认为他们是外来宗教下的奴隶. 一小撮人甚至要求推翻[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]如果[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]拒绝显示对他们几千年来生活在这里的人民信仰的尊重.

original: The believers are right. We will not tolerate this godlessness.
translation: 信徒是正确的.我们不会容忍这种无神.

original: The animists, although misguided, must be respected as citizens.
translation: 虽然是被误导的万物有灵论者,但他们还是我们的公民,他们理应受到尊重.

original: Let them resolve the matter amongst themselves.
There is time yet for reconciliation.
translation: 还是有时间让他们和解的.

original: Although cut off from many of our faith, we have not forsaken Islamic scholarship. $THEOLOGIAN$ is just one of many who have written great works on the subject, their work inspiring countless others. Through our dedication to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, the theological works of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] has made it a famous city.
translation: 尽管中断了许多信仰，我们没有抛弃伊斯兰学识。$THEOLOGIAN$只是许多写下宗教题材传世作品的人之一，他的创作激励了数不清的人们。通过我们对[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰的奉献，[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的神学创作使她成为一座名城。

original: It shall remain a beacon of wisdom throughout the ages.
translation: 这将会成为古往今来智慧的明灯.

original: The scholars and scientists among the [Root.GetAdjective] have been distinguished by extraordinary innovation and curiosity. Their latest efforts have focused on gathering information about the plant life of the large jungle areas of our land, hoping to gain useful information to aid in researching medicine and dyeing techniques. This has been successful so far, with the botany project rippling developments into other areas of research.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective]的学者和科学家和其他同行的不同在于他们非凡的好奇心和创新.他们最新的努力都集中在收集有关我们的土地上丛林地区的植物信息，希望能获得有用的信息，用于研究医学和染色技术.到目前为止,我们十分成功,我们的植物学研究已经开始逐渐帮助我们其他方面的研究.

original: And much is yet to be discovered.

Although we do not doubt the strength and tenacity of our [Root.GetAdjective] warriors, the technological advances of the neighboring armies have not passed by without our notice. The adoption of firearms greatly changes warfare, and we can see clear advantages in this.\n\nOur neighbors are unlikely to provide us with all the technical details to fully equip our army, but they do seem willing to sell us some of their weapons. While this would probably give them an advantage in terms of our trade exchanges, it would doubtlessly be of use to our military efforts.
translation: 尽管我们不怀疑我们 [Root.GetAdjective] 的力量和韧性，我们邻居军队的科技上的进步却并没躲过我们的注意. 我们认识到火器的使用跨时代的改变了战争,这将提供明显的优势.\n\n我们的邻居不会提供所有的技术和技巧让我们装备军队，不过他们似乎愿意出售一些他们的武器. 尽管这个会让他们有着贸易上的优势,无疑将会在未来的军事行动中起着至关的作用.

original: We must acquire this equipment at any cost.
translation: 我们必须不惜一切代价得到这些装备.

original: Our army serves its purpose, with or without these weapons.
translation: 无论我们有没有武器,我们的军队已经达到了他们的目的.
横跨大西洋的奴隶交易

original: [Root.GetName] is far from the only country keeping slaves, with this being a common fate for war captives in the area. Our European neighbors seem to have especially interested in this lately, seemingly being in desperate need for servants to work the new land they have seized across the ocean. To this end, they are now attempting to arrange a long-term trade agreement with us that will facilitate this purchase of slaves.\n\nWhile we stand to earn money from this, the implications have been the cause of some concern. They apparently consider our people, or at least our captives, to be suitable as their slaves and treat them with unbounded brutality. We don't wish to humor this notion, but there is no telling what they might end up doing if we refuse.
translation: [Root.GetName]并不是唯一一个蓄养奴隶的国家，这个地区的战俘通常都会面临沦为奴隶的命运。我们的欧洲邻居最近似乎对奴隶非常感兴趣，他们亟需在大洋那边的新土地为他们工作的劳动力。为此，他们现在试图签订一份长期合同来购买奴隶。\n\n尽管我们可以轻松地赚到这笔钱，但是我们对此仍然有些忧心。他们看待我们的人民，或者至少说我们的战俘，只是他们的奴隶，对待他们非常残忍。我们不想对此开玩笑，但是如果拒绝他们，后果很难预料。

original: None will be sold to these people if we can help it.
translation: 如果我们可以使用这么多奴隶的话，那就不要卖。

original: If they can pay, we can provide.
translation: 如果他们愿意付钱，我们可以卖。

original: It's time to put an end to the practice of slavery, for us as well as for them.
translation: 现在是结束奴隶制的时候了，无论是我们还是他们。

original: The [Root.Culture.GetName] people of [Root.GetName] have traditionally lived, at least in part, a nomadic life. Although our efforts to centralize have made this less feasible, people are used to it and expect us not to intervene. It does make [Root.Owner.GetName] more difficult to manage, however. Some of the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]'s advisors have suggested that we try to take control and restrict their movements, but this could be seen as trampling the way of life that made them successful in the first place.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]的[Root.Culture.GetName]人民，传统上过着一种至少部分意义上的游牧生活。虽然我们的集权措施使得他们不在那么自在，那里的人民仍然习惯于这种生活方式，他们不希望我们干涉。这使得[Root.Owner.GetName]更加难以掌控。一些[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的顾问建议我们控制他们的迁移，但这可能会被认为是对他们习惯生活方式的粗暴践踏。

original: Let them live as they always did.
[Root.GetName] is unruly enough as it is.

The Akan people of Kumasi and the surrounding region have lived there for a long time now, although we have not considered them a nation in their own right. However, their tribe is of such importance to our present affairs that we need to conduct trade and diplomacy with them. Although the nature of the Akan state may yet change, we cannot question its existence.
translation: 阿肯人在库玛西以及周边地区生活了很长时间了，尽管我们并不认为他们是一个国家。然而，他们的部落事务已经成为我们目前的重要议题，我们需要和他们建立经贸和外交关系。尽管阿肯人的国家地位可能会有所变化，但我们不能否定他们的存在。

original: Who knows, one day they may become grow to the strength of an empire.
translation: 谁知道呢，说不定他们会成长为一个大帝国。

original: The Ashanti have neighbored one of colonies for some time, so far without any major diplomatic incidents. This all changed recently, when our governor $COLONIALGOVERNOR$, our representative at the Gold Coast, heard of the Golden Stool. This mysterious old artifact apparently holds great significance to the Ashanti, to whom it is the seat of the king. Although we have been vaguely aware of its existence before, it recently came to the knowledge of $COLONIALGOVERNOR$, who demands to sit on it as a demonstration of his, and by extension our, paramount power in the area. \n\n'Why am I not sitting on the Golden Stool at this moment?' he has asked the Ashanti, who have so far shown no sign of complying. Indeed, they seem highly insulted by the suggestion alone. How far should we be willing to pursue this?
translation: 阿散蒂成为我们的受保护国已经很久了，直到目前为止没有什么太多外交上的问题。但是最近情况有所变化，当我们的总督$COLONIALGOVERNOR$，我们在黄金海岸的代表，听到了金凳子的传说。这件古物对阿善提人有着重大的意义：它是国王的宝座。尽管我们以前只是含糊地知道它的存在，最近$COLONIALGOVERNOR$得知，他要求坐在宝座之上，展示他自己乃至我们国家的权威\n\n‘为什么现在不是我坐在这个金凳子上？’他这样问阿散蒂人，可是阿散蒂人并没有表达顺从的意思。事实上，光是提出这个建议就似乎已经是一种很大的羞辱。我们是否要继续在这件事上施压下去？

original: The Ashanti may not take kindly to this.
translation: 阿散蒂人不会善罢甘休的。

original: We have no use for a man who demands such means to assert his dominance.
translation: 我们不需要用这种手段维持统治的人。

original: The Golden Stool is the symbol of the Ashanti king, which no one is allowed to violate. Now, the [From.GetAdjective], who we trusted had some respect for our traditions despite their disinterest in them, have sent a governor here who demands to sit upon the Stool as if he was king himself. This has outraged the Queen Mother and many others, who are arguing that this man must be stopped and the sanctity of the Golden Stool preserved, at the cost of war if necessary.
translation: 金凳子是阿散蒂国王的象征，不可侵犯。现在，[From.GetAdjective]，我们曾经以为他们尽管并不关心我们的传统，但至少有所尊重，他们派来一名官员要求坐在金凳子上，好像他本人就是国王一样，这激怒了包括太后在内的很多人，大家都在争论是否应当组织这个人，维护金凳子的神圣，即使是以战争的代价。

original: If [From.GetName] trusts such a fool to represent them, there can only be war.
translation: 如果[From.GetName]信任这样一个傻瓜代表，那么只好战争解决了。

original: Traditions are not worth starting a war over.
translation: 维护传统没必要以打仗作为代价。

original: The [Root.Owner.Culture.GetName] rule [Root.Owner.GetName] justly, we believe. [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] has been fair to the different tribes under our rule, but to some of [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis] subjects, this is not enough. The [Root.Culture.GetName] people have sent a representative from [Root.GetName], requesting greater rights to make decisions about their own tribes if they are to remain under the reign of the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]. Although seemingly a humble request, the news of discontent in their home provinces makes it sound more like a demand.
translation: 我们认为[Root.Owner.GetName]在[Root.Owner.Culture.GetName]的统治很公平。[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName]平等对待不同部落，但是对于[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerHis]的部分附属国，这还不足够。 [Root.Culture.GetName]人从[Root.GetName]送来一位代表，要求在[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]的治下获得更多的自治权利。尽管听起来这个要求很谦卑，从他们的省份传来的不满情绪使这些看起来更像是一种要挟。

original: The tribes are best ruled that rule themselves.
translation: 部落最好还是自己治理自己。

original: We don't give into demands, even if veiled.
translation: 我们不会同意他们的要求。

original: Ever since our adoption of cavalry, the mounted warriors of [Root.GetName] have been feared by all for their uncanny ability to rapidly attack deep inside enemy territory, raiding and weakening the defenses. A group of soldiers have prepared a plan to aid the ongoing war based on this tactic, preparing to break off from the main army and perform the attack in secret, before the enemy can react. Although a risky plan, it could yield much-needed funds for the war.
translation: 自从我们采用骑兵以来，[Root.GetName]的骑马武士能够深入敌区快速攻击薄弱防区的能力就深深地使人恐惧。一群士兵开始打算采用类似的战术，和大部队分离开来，在敌人有所反应之前，执行秘密的战术任务。尽管这么做有些冒险，但是对战争来说会起到很好的效应。

original: We need more plans like these!
translation: 我们需要更多类似的计划。

original: Bring me those who planned this and let them aid our greater schemes instead.
translation: 把那些计划者带过来，并把他编入我们的大部队之中。

original: The uncharted territory within and beyond the jungles at our border may seem threatening to many other people. But our tribe has lived in lands like these for a long time, and would never have thrived if we feared exploring the unknown. Now, a large group of young hunters are asking for the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s permission to explore and settle in whatever place they may discover. Certainly, these are capable people who could get a lot done if they didn't waste time on dreams of places not yet known, but who are we to put a stop to youthful curiosity?
translation: 边境线以外的丛林深处是地图上都不会显示的区域，对于很多人来说这是个可怕地方。然而我们的部落已经在那里生活了很久，而且不过不去探索未知，就不会有任何繁荣的机会。现在，一大批年轻的猎人要求[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的恩准去探寻他们可能找到的任何定居点。当然，这些正值当年的年轻人如果不把时间浪费在探索未知领域上的话，可以做到更多。但是我们又怎么能阻止年轻人的好奇心呢？

original: Go and claim what you find for [Root.GetName]!
translation: 去吧，去宣称你所发现的[Root.GetName]!

original: We are the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and they are needed here.

Our research into the plant life of [Root.GetName] continues to lead to new discoveries. We have recently uncovered a new way to create dyes, which is both efficient and results in impressive colors not found anywhere else that we know of. Since dyes is one of the important [Root.GetAdjective] exports, we will see that these valuable techniques are spread quickly throughout our land.
translation: 我们对[Root.GetName]的植物研究导致了新发现。我们最近找到了一种配置染料的新方法，它不仅高效而且能够生成已知方法都无法产生的新颜色。既然染料是[Root.GetAdjective]重要的出口产品，我们预见到这种高价值的技术将在我们的土地上迅速传播开来。

original: We are dyeing to try them out!

Many foreign religions have attempted to set their roots among us and many missionaries have tried to turn us towards a God, always the one God, always the same, always different, always theirs. But despite the trying times we have gone through, we keep honoring the spirits and our ancestors. Now the elders have told us that the time is right for a larger celebration of these ancient rites and that people throughout [Root.GetName] should be encouraged to participate.\n\nWith the very people who would see us converted right across the border, this sort of nationwide event would probably attract some irritation from those who consider themselves above it. Our diplomats are suggesting we keep it at a smaller scale, so as to not offend our neighbors.
translation: 许多外来的宗教想在我们这里扎下脚跟，许多传教士正在试图将我们转化去信仰一神教：他们的神。尽管他们不停的尝试，我们坚持尊崇我们的神灵和祖先。现在老人们高所我们现在是庆祝这些古老礼节的时候，整个[Root.GetName] 的人们都应该被鼓励参加。\n\n外人很希望我们能够转变信仰，这种庆祝会刺激到他们。我们的外交官建议我们控制庆祝规模，不至于冒犯到我们的邻居。

original: Our ancestors did not cower in shame, and neither do we!
translation: 我们的祖先从不会在威胁面前退缩，我们也是！

original: We can't afford to anger those who have forgotten the truth.
translation: 我们无法抵挡异教徒的怒火。

original: [Root.GetName] is a country with many skilled artisans and craftsmen. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is often expected to commission a work of art to commemorate [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] predecessor, a tradition which aids both remembering our ancestors and demonstrating the wealth and influence of the current ruler.\n\nMany materials are available, with bronze being the traditional choice. We should pick something suitable for both the grandeur of the previous [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and affordable for [Root.Monarch.GetName].
translation: [Root.GetName] 是一个拥有许多熟练工匠的国度。人们会期望[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]分发生产纪念[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的祖先题材的艺术作品的任务，这是一个传统，用来纪念祖先，同时展示现任统治者的财富和影响力。\n\n有许多可用的材料，青铜是传统的选择。我们需要选择恰当的材料，不仅能彰显前任[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的庄严，同时不会超过[Root.Monarch.GetName]的可负担程度。

original: Our sculptors can do miracles with terracotta.
translation: 我们的雕刻家可以使用陶土做出惊人的作品。

original: If we can get the ivory needed, it could be a work for the ages.
translation: 如果我们可以找到足够的象牙，这个作品将成为这个时代的见证。

original: Nothing less than gold will do.
translation: 没有什么比黄金更加合适了。
我们无法负担这样子的浪费。

original: While our efforts to adopt certain technologies from Europe have been somewhat impeded by the ongoing war, applying our new weapons in the field has had a positive impact. Our soldiers have turned out to be very capable with firearms, and people in the army who have been skeptical to our efforts are now much more positive. Although we are a long way from fully equipping our soldiers with guns, we have taken significant steps along the way.
translation: 如果我们想要从欧洲人手里学会目前战争所需要的技能，那么采用新的战场武器无疑会产生正面的效果。我们的战士已经证明了他们非常擅长使用火器，曾经对这些持怀疑态度的现在观点也逐渐变得正面了。虽然到达全面装备枪械还有一段距离，我们已经朝前迈进了一大步。

original: [Root.GetAdjective] warriors are already feared today. They will be unstoppable tomorrow.
translation: [Root.GetAdjective] 的战士在今天已经感受到畏惧，明天也是一样。

original: A dynasty so old its origins are shrouded in mystery, kings and queens of the Bagrationi house have ruled Georgia ever since the 9th century, first as its princes and then as monarchs.
translation: 一个如此古老的王室，他们的来源可以追溯到神秘的传说时代，巴格拉季昂尼王朝的国王和王后自从九世纪开始就统治着格鲁吉亚，先是作为诸侯，后来成为君主。

original: Surrounded by powerful countries of different religion and culture we are forced to use opportunistic diplomacy and often change allegiances in order to appease everyone and preserve peace for as long as it's possible.
translation: 强邻环绕，他们有不同的宗教和文化，我们必须采取机会主义，频繁地变换我们的盟友，从而来安抚每个国家并维持尽可能久的和平。

original: To restore the realm from the devastating invasions of the last centuries, we must rebuild major fortresses and churches so our cities and villages can begin to prosper once again. A special tax was imposed to finance such efforts.
translation: 为了从近几个世纪的入侵中恢复我们的领地，我们必须重建主要的防御工事和教堂，这样我们的城市和乡村可以再次繁荣。我们引入了新的税种来加快这个进程。

original: Before the Mongol arrival, in its golden era Georgia exerted its power over a number of client states. Surrounded by people of different cultures and religions, we might find it easier to expand if we seek to create dependent states, rather than incorporating new lands into our realm directly.
translation: 在蒙古大军到来之前，处于黄金时代的格鲁吉亚控制着许多卫星国家。由于我们身处在许多不同的文化和宗教中间，我们也许会发现建立附庸国家比起直接吞并是一种更加方便的扩张手段。

original: Thanks to an administrative reform dividing large autonomous saeristavo (duchies) into smaller and easier to control samouravo (counties), our realm will become easier to govern, more stable and loyal to the crown.
translation: 由于我们将大的行政区划分为了小的郡县，我们的领土将变得更加容易统治，更加稳定而且更加忠诚。

original: Sadrosho (banners) are special military districts used for mobilization purposes. Secular nobles have proven unruly and unreliable in charge of them, so we will instead vest the power over them to ecclesiastic nobles like our local bishops.
translation: Sadrosho指的是一种特别的军区划分，为了便于军队的调动。世俗的贵族已经被证明了他们是不可靠的，所以我们需要授予神职贵族更多的权力，比如地方主教。

original: Surrounded by countries that seek our destruction, we are trying to find allies who would help us unite and preserve our kingdom. Ambassadors were dispatched to the greatest monarchs of Europe asking for their support.
translation: 我们的近邻对我们虎视眈眈，我们需要寻求能够支持我们王国主权完整的同盟。我们将大使们调度到欧洲的大国首都去寻求他们的支持。

original: Trade has always been the primary resource of our immense wealth. As such, we have for generations specialized in honing our bartering skills, learning to make the most of our dealings with others.
translation: 贸易是我们财富的主要来源。同样的，这么多年来我们一直在专精我们的贸易技术，学习如何更好地和生意伙伴打交道。

original: Sumatran cities were the first in South East Asia to embrace Islam. We not only received Muslim travelers from around the world but also furthered the faith through missionary work in the name of The Prophet. We are the Indonesian pillar of Islam!
translation: 苏门答腊的城市是东南亚最早信奉伊斯兰的地方。我们不仅接待了来自全世界的穆斯林，而且我们还在先知的名下开展了进一步的传教工作。我们是伊斯兰教在印度尼西亚的支柱！

original: For as long as there has been trade in the strait of Malacca, there have been pirates. Perhaps we should strike a deal with the seasoned pirate leaders and turn their presence into something beneficial?
translation: 自从马六甲海峡有贸易开始，这里就有海盗。也许我们应该和这些海盗头目做笔交易，让他们的存在变得对我们有利？

original: For centuries, the magnificent cities of Sumatra have been a place for scholarly learning and knowledge. Drawing towards them the best and the brightest of first the Buddhist and now the Muslim world, there is no match for our academic minds!
translation: 几百年来，苏门答腊的伟大城市就是一个学术研究和知识的中心。面对他们的是最初是佛教，现在是穆斯林世界的最高的智慧，没有一个地方能与我们的学术热情相提并论

original: Traveling far and wide, our merchants travel to the most exotic places of the world; from the Maghreb in the west to China in the east - and well beyond! The plentiful riches from trading in spices attract many new able bodies to the merchant craft.
translation: 那么地遥远，我们的商人旅行到全世界最边缘的地方；从马格里布一直到中国，甚至更加远方！香料贸易的高额利润吸引这更多的新鲜人才加入到商人的行列。

original: Srivijaya was a dominant Sumatran state that influenced most of South East Asia. They held a strong hegemony in the region for several centuries, expanding through trade and sheer military force. And we are their proud heirs! Rejoice!
translation: 三佛齐曾经是东南亚具有支配地位的苏门答腊国家，他们拥有区域的霸权长达几个世纪，通过贸易和军事势力不停扩张。我们是他们骄傲的继承人！欢呼吧！

original: The proud Sumatran empires have always had strong thalassocratic traditions. We must ensure continued dominance of the seas both to protect our trade as well as our cities!
translation: 伟大的苏门答腊帝国一直拥有着很强的海洋传统。我们必须确保这一地位延续下去，同时在海洋上保护我们的贸易，还有我们的城市！

original: For centuries our people have followed the principles of Pashtunwali. This code of ethics requires any insult to be met with vengeance. We shall stop at nothing to achieve vengeance for our lost sons.
translation: 几百年来我们的人民一直遵循着普什图瓦里的原则。这种道德规范要求我们以牙还牙，我们将会为我们在战争中失去的儿子们复仇。

original: All Pashtuns were born in the shadows of the great mountain range known as the Hindu Kush, and the mountains shall be our fortress against any intruder.
translation: 所有的普什图人都出生在兴都库什山的阴影之下，这座伟大的山脉会成为抵抗任何侵略者的天然屏障。

original: A central tenet of Pashtunwali. A warrior must be brave and face any threat against his family, land or honor. Thus we shall find no shortage of men willing to fight for their land.
translation: 普什图瓦里的中心理念，一个战士必须在他的家族，土地或者荣誉遇到为学时变得勇敢，因此我们要找到足够的男人愿意为自己的土地而战。

original: Prior to the rise of the Mughals a lot of Afghans migrated to Northern India, where they managed to dominate the local aristocracy. Even when Afghanistan was under Safavid and Mughal control the country served as a recruiting ground for soldiers and advisors. This provided Afghanistan with significant influence in foreign courts.
translation: 在莫卧儿崛起之前，许多阿富汗人迁移到了北印度，他们成功地统治了当地的贵族。即使在阿富汗处在萨菲王朝和莫卧儿控制之下，他们成为当地的雇佣兵和顾问。这使得阿富汗在外国宫廷上有着显著的影响力

original: Following Afghanistan's independence from Persia a lot of Afghan cavalry men returned home to serve their king known as the Durr-i-Durrani or pearl of pearls. Starting out as mere raiders these cavalry forces soon became the basis for the formation of the greatest empire ever ruled from Kabul.
translation: 伴随着阿富汗从波斯的独立，许多阿富汗骑兵回到了家乡，开始效忠他们的国王艾哈迈德沙·杜兰尼，或者珍珠一般的国王。从小的突击开始，这些骑兵部队很快变成了从喀布尔统治的伟大帝国的基础。

original: The grand tribal council known as the Loya Jirga was traditionally assembled to address major events such as the coronation of a new king. The role of the Loya Jirga will now become institutionalized so no one can question our right to rule.
translation: 部族首领大会，称之为支尔格大会，是新君登基之类场合的传统大典。支尔格大会的角色现在将会变得制度化，这样没人就能质疑我们的统治。

original: No outside force shall occupy our lands. Let these so called empires try their best, they will all be found wanting.
translation: 没有任何外部势力可以占领我们的土地。让这些所谓的帝国尽情尝试吧，他们最终都会发现自己不配做这片土地的主人。

original: Faced with superior enemies on both sides Wallachian rulers developed a knack for shifting alliances when prudent. Several secured their throne with Ottoman support and then went on to form alliances with Hungary or the Holy Roman Emperor.
translation: 由于面临这腹背受敌的情况，瓦拉几亚的领导者学会了左右逢源的本领。有时他们会向奥斯曼寻求支持稳固王位，然后他们又和匈牙利或者皇帝结盟。

original: During the reign of Vlad the Impaler foreign trade was restricted to three towns in order to help Wallachian merchants.
translation: 在弗拉德三世的统治下，和外国人的贸易被限制在三个指定的城镇当中，用以支持本国的商人。

original: In order to secure the power of the throne against rival claimants Vlad the Impaler instituted a standing mercenary guard untied to local power politics.
translation: 为了对付觊觎王位的人，弗拉德三世建立了佣兵卫队和在地力量结合的制度。

original: Starting with Vlad the Impaler court positions was often given to foreigners with no land in Wallachia. This reduced dependency on the local aristocracy.
translation: 从弗拉德三世开始宫廷的职位通常授予在国内没有土地的外国人。这样可以减少我们对贵族的依赖。

original: By the time of his death Vlad the Impaler was known throughout Europe as a tyrant taking sadistic pleasure in torturing and killing. While his legacy was perhaps undeserved, being feared has its merits, and the enemies of Wallachia shall tremble when they see our armies approach.
translation: 弗拉德三世去世之时，全欧洲都知道了他作为一个施虐狂暴君的恶名。也许这并不是他所应得的，被害怕也许是一个优点，并且当我们的部队进军时，瓦拉几亚的敌人们会感到恐惧。

original: The Treaty of Alba Iulia cemented the power of the Wallachian nobility. A council of 12 great boyars was to take part alongside the voivode in the executive rule of the country.
translation: 阿尔巴尤列亚条约巩固了瓦拉几亚贵族的权力。十二个贵族组成的会议和总督们共同组成这个国家的统治阶层。

original: In 1746 serfdom was abolished in Wallachia, vastly decreasing the number of serfs fleeing to Transylvania.
translation: 1746年瓦拉几亚废除了农奴制度，极大地减少了逃亡到特兰西瓦尼亚的农奴人数。

original: §R- We cannot join or leave a League while there is a League War raging.§!
translation: §R- 在战时我们无法加入或离开一个联盟§!

original: §R- We cannot join or leave a League while at war.§!
translation: §R- 在战时我们无法加入或离开一个联盟.§!

original: §R- We cannot join this League while we have a truce with the Emperor.§!
translation: §R－当我们和皇帝仍然有停战协议时我们无法加入或离开一个联盟。§!

original: §R- The Emperor cannot join or leave a League.§!
translation: §R－皇帝无法加入或离开一个联盟。§!

original: §R- We have not discovered the Holy Roman Empire!§!
translation: §R- 我们还没有发现神圣罗马帝国!§!

original: §R- We cannot join a League if our capital is on a different continent than the Holy Roman Empire.§!
translation: §R- 我们的首都和帝国不在同一片大陆上所以我们无法加入或者离开一个联盟。§!

original: §R- We are already a member of a Religious League!§!
translation: §R- 我们已经是一个宗教联盟的成员！§!

original: §R- You recently joined a League and will not be able to leave until §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: §R- 你最近已经加入一个联盟，§Y$DATE$§!前你无法离开这个联盟。§!

original: With the three capitals of the ancient Jurchen tribes firmly in our hands, it is now time to proclaim our people's unification and let the entire world know that Manchurians are now one.
translation: 女真三大部都已经在我们的掌控之中，现在是宣布我们统一的时候了，让全世界知道满洲人现在是团结的一个整体！

original: We should expand our influence in the Shogunate by seizing land from a neighboring clan.
translation: 我们必须通过征服临近大名的土地来增加我们在幕府那里的影响力。
外交手段成立大不列颠

original: By uniting our political development domestically and extending our influence beyond our borders we will be able to reinforce our position in world affairs and transform into one of the foremost European powers, the British Empire.
translation: 通过外交手段统一我们的政治，将我们的影响力延伸出边界，我们可以加强我们在世界事务中的影响力，将我们的国家变成欧洲列强中的佼佼者：大不列颠帝国

original: By what has been considered an unprecedented construction effort in the region, the construction of the Kiel Canal connecting the North Sea with the Baltic has been completed in [Root.GetName]. Our fleet can now move between these key areas quicker and safer, giving us opportunity for unique military maneuvers and trade projects.
translation: 这是该地区史无前例的伟大工程：在[Root.GetName]基尔运河的建成将北海和波罗的海连接起来。我们的船队在这些关键海域的航行将变得更快更安全，给予我们更多的军事行动空间和贸易竞争力。

original: It will change the course of ships and of history!
translation: 这回改变航行的历程，也会改变历史！

original: Throughout history, attempts have been made to connect the Red Sea and the Mediterranean in some capacity, but none have succeeded on the level of [Root.Owner.GetName]'s project. Where ships once needed to encircle a continent to travel between Europe and the Indian Ocean, the barrier of land that many captains have no doubt cursed for centuries has been chipped away by our ingenious engineers. None thought it would be possible for decades, but we dared not only to think it, but to do it.
translation: 纵观历史，人们曾为沟通红海与地中海做出各种努力，但是没有任何人取得了[Root.Owner.GetName]的计划一般的成功。陆地的阻碍曾让从欧洲驶向印度洋的船只不得不绕过整片大陆，而如今，得益于我们的天才工程师们，这一被无数船长诅咒的障碍已经不复存在。过去的数十年中没有人想过这种可能，但我们不仅敢想，而且敢做。

original: Many claimed it was impossible. Other put it in the realm of the distant future, or of dreams, but [Root.Owner.GetName] put it in the realm of reality. Of ideas to connect two oceans, the Atlantic and the Pacific always seemed the most distant, despite being separated by so little land. But through resilience, ingenuity and the sheer resources we have poured into the project, it has been completed, allowing our ships safe passage without the need to round Cape Horn. The canal, considered centuries ahead of its time, will not only serve as a gateway, but as a monument to the fact that nothing is impossible for [Root.Owner.GetName].
translation: 许多人宣称这个工程不可能完成。另外一些人认为只有在未来这个工程才能实现，或者永远只是一个梦想。[Root.Owner.GetName]把它变为了现实，在连接海洋的概念中，大西洋和太平洋的距离被认为是最远的，虽然他们只被很窄的一段地峡所分隔。我们向这个工程里投入了坚持的韧劲，精巧的独创性和无数的资源，现在它完工了，让船只安全的航行，没有必要远绕合恩角。这项工程被认为超前了数个世纪，不仅仅是被当作一个门户，也会成为一座[Root.Owner.GetName]让不可能成为现实的伟大丰碑。

original: Our subject [From.Owner.GetName] has sent word that our canal construction has been delayed due to various factors beyond their control.
translation: 我们的附庸[From.Owner.GetName]告诉我们，由于种种不可控的原因，运河的工程推迟了。

original: Canal Project in [From.Owner.GetName] Ahead of Time
Our subject [From.Owner.GetName] has sent word that our canal construction is proceeding at a faster rate than expected due to their skilled handling of the project.
translation: 我们的附庸国[From.Owner.GetName]告诉我们，由于对项目的熟练处理，运河工程比想象中的推进得要快。
向自定义附庸增加省份

original: Are you sure you wish to give away the province §Y$PROVINCE$§! to your $SUBJECTTYPE$ §Y$COUNTRY$§!?
translation: 你是否确信你要把 §Y$PROVINCE$§! 交给你的属国 §Y$COUNTRY$§! ？

original: Do you wish to create a new Client State, giving it §Y$PROVINCE$§! as their capital?
translation: 你是否要以§Y$PROVINCE$§!为首都建立一个新的自定义附庸？

original: Your new Client State has been formed. You can now change its color and flag.
translation: 新的自定义附庸已经建立，你可以改变他的国旗颜色和样式

original: You can now change the name, color and flag of your subject.
translation: 你现在可以更改其名字，颜色和旗帜

original: You can now change the name of your subject.
Choose the government form of your new client:
translation: 选择你新自定义附庸的政府形态：

original: When a Client State is created.
translation: 当一个自定义附庸被建立起来。
$MONARCHTITLE$ 一个新自定义附庸被命名为

original: has been formed. They serve $COUNTRY$ loyally.
translation: 已经成立了。 他们忠于 $COUNTRY$ 。

original: Fighting in the religious wars of the Holy Roman Empire has taught us important lessons about warfare.
translation: 参加帝国的宗教战争为我们了解战争本身上了很好的一课

original: The Catholic faith is the official religion of the Holy Roman Empire. Following this faith grants our nation a certain moral legitimacy.
translation: 天主教信仰现在是神圣罗马帝国的官方信仰。信仰天主教可以为我们国家带来更多的正当性。

original: The Protestant faith is the official religion of the Holy Roman Empire. Following this faith grants our nation a certain moral legitimacy.
translation: 新教信仰现在是神圣罗马帝国的官方信仰。信仰新教可以为我们国家带来更多的正统性。
给自定义附庸分配省份

original: Not possible to create Client States while at war.
translation: 战时无法建立自定义附庸。

original: It is not possible to create a Client State while the province is occupied.
translation: 在被占领的省份上无法创建自定义附庸。

original: It is not possible to create a Client State while the province is under siege.
translation: 在省份被围困时无法创建自定义附庸。

original: Can only create Client States in provinces you own.
translation: 只能在你拥有的省份上建立自定义附庸。

original: Cannot create Client States in overseas provinces.
translation: 无法在海外省份建立自定义附庸。

original: Allow Client States and Advanced Casus Belli
translation: 允许建立自定义附庸以及更好的宣战理由
允许更高级的宣战理由

original: You need diplomatic tech level 23 to create Client State.
translation: 你需要23级的外交科技才能创建自定义附庸。
给自定义附庸添加省份

original: Select Client State to assign §Y$PROVINCE$§! to or create a new Client State with it as capital.
translation: 选择自定义附庸，给他们 §Y$PROVINCE$§!。或者建立以该省为首都的新自定义附庸。

original: This region is home to old and powerful trade guilds that we have allowed to retain old privileges in the hope that this will lessen tensions between them and the central administration of our country.
translation: 这片区域是古老的商人公会的老巢，我们允许他们维持他们的古老特权，我们希望这么做可以减少他们和我们中央集权之间的摩擦

original: The merchant and artisan guilds of this region are upset that we have infringed on their old privileges.
translation: 这片区域的商人和工匠公会感到他们的古老特权被我们所侵犯了

original: Telugu settlers from the north have started to build their own communities in this Tamil region, this is causing tensions between them and the existing rural population.
translation: 北方过来的泰卢固定居者开始在这片泰米尔区域建立他们自己的社区。这将造成新旧住民之间的冲突。

original: We have limited outside migration into this area and defended the rights of the local communities by limiting the influx of military colonists from the north.
translation: 我们已限制外来移民进入这一区域，并且通过限制从北方流入的武装殖民者来捍卫本土社群的权力.

original: This is the powerbase of the local strongman Chellappa. While he seems content for the moment, he is slowly increasing his power over the region.
translation: 这里是当地强人切喇帕的老巢。虽然他现在看似安于现状，但实际上他在慢慢地加强他在地区内的权力。

original: Pulicat is ideally situated to be the primary port for all imports to the great city of Vijayanagar. As the capital grows so does its port and due to a fortunate string of events the trade here is booming right now. For the moment this is the most attractive port of the Indian Ocean.
translation: 普利卡特非常适合作为毗奢耶那伽罗的主要港口。随着首都和港口的发展，以及一系列幸运事件的发生，贸易迎来了蓬勃的扩张。目前这里是印度洋上最有吸引力的港口。
蒂鲁伯蒂-蒂鲁马拉寺庙群

original: As the main temple patronized by our state the complex at Tirupati has grown to become one of India's greatest jewels. While the fact that the temple city itself controls so many of the villages in this area slightly diminishes our revenue here it is more than made up for by the splendor the temple lends to our state.
translation: 作为我们国家庇护的主要寺庙，蒂鲁帕蒂的建筑群已经发展成为印度最伟大的瑰宝之一。虽然寺庙城市本身控制着这个地区的许多村庄，使这里的收入略有减少，但这比不上寺庙带给我们国家的辉煌。

original: The Vijayanagara empire, with its military base in the dry uplands of the Kannada and Telugu speaking areas of the Deccan plateau, always had a tough time keeping the bustling trading cities of the southern Tamil country in line.\nAn embassy representing many of the most important Tamil trading guilds has just arrived in our capital demanding that their ancient traditions and rights be respected.\nThey are not asking for small concessions but rather expect to hear that they can be left more or less to their own devices.
translation: 毗奢耶那伽罗帝国，它的军事根基在坎那达和泰卢古的高地，但是说到德干平原地区，让南部泰米尔的那些贸易城市听话一直是个难题。\n一个代表多数重要泰米尔贸易公会的大使来到了我们的首都，要求我们保证他们的古老贸易特权不被侵犯。\n他们不是要求小恩小惠，他们只想听到他们想听到的。

original: We can allow them greater autonomy.
translation: 我们可以给他们更高的自治权利

original: We need to keep these shopkeepers on a tight leash.
translation: 我们必须控制这些做买卖的

original: Since the foundation of our empire a steady stream of Telugu settlers have migrated south into our lands from Telingana in the north. We have so far graciously provided them with land to develop in the sparsely populated parts our empire and built water tanks to help their settlements grow. This way we have gained a healthy and loyal source of manpower for our armies.\nLately, however, these settlers (known as Vadugans by the Tamils) have started to spread even further south into the Tamil speaking areas. Tamil farming communities have raised their voices to allow them to stop the Telugu settlers moving into their lands.
translation: 自从我们的帝国建立起来，泰卢固移民就从泰伦加纳地区一直稳定地在向南部迁移。到目前为止我们仁慈地向他们提供了土地，给他们建立了水塔，帮助他们的移民点发展起来。通过这种方式我们可以获取一个稳固的人力资源来源。\n然而最近这些定居者（泰米尔人称之为瓦杜加人）开始朝向更南处发展，进入了泰米尔语言区域。泰米尔的农业社团开始呼吁，要求停止这些泰卢固移民迁移到他们的土地上。

original: Help the farmers defend their homes.
translation: 帮助农民们保卫他们的家园
切喇帕·那罗僧诃的崛起

original: The autonomous nature of our Tamil possessions has been the perfect environment to build a power base for a local strongman.\nThe man in question, known as Chellappa, has requested to be allowed to serve as a general and seems content to act within the internal structure of our empire. It is, however, generally assumed that a man as ambitious as him must have his eyes set on much higher goals than a position in the army. While it is easy to deny him the honor he seeks and try to isolate him politically we run the risk of distancing ourselves of someone in control over much of our economic heartland.\nOn the other hand perhaps it would be most prudent to strike at him now instead of prolonging a conflict that many feel will be inevitable.
translation: 我们的泰米尔领地的自治性质是一个造就在地强人的天然环境。\n问题人物切喇帕，已经要求自己成为一位将军并且看起来似乎对自己所处的帝国结构很满意。然而我们推测这个男人的野心已经设定在更高的位置，所以他需要一个军队里的职位。尽管否决他的申请很容易，这样可以从政治上隔离掉他，但是我们会冒着一个强人控制我们国家经济中心的风险。\n也许一个更精明的做法是现在就打击他，因为这个冲突看起来是不可避免的。

original: Keep your friends close and your enemies closer
translation: 团结你的朋友 更要团结你的敌人

original: Try to limit his influence to his Tamil power base.
translation: 尝试着限制他在泰米尔地区的影响力

original: Strike now to crush him before he grows too strong.
translation: 现在就把他消灭在萌芽之中

original: It seems our general Chellappa has been conspiring to take the throne for himself!\nHe has now raised an army of troops loyal to him and is marching on the capital.
translation: 看起来我们的切喇帕将军正在为自己谋取王位！\n他现在已经纠集了一支忠于他的军队并朝首都开进。

original: The chiefs of the Tamil lands have been duped to believe that they would be better off in a state of their own rather than as a part of our empire. Local strongman Chellappa Saluva has raised an army and is attempting to carve out a state of his own over the area already de facto under his control.
translation: 泰米尔地区的酋长们被欺骗了，他们相信了独立比呆在我们的帝国更好。当地的强人Chellappa Saluva已经聚集了一波叛军，尝试建立自己的国家。

original: Over time, Chellappa's influence has shrunken. Now that he is no longer new or promising, he isn't a major factor in Tamil politics anymore.
translation: 现在Chellappa的影响力已经很微弱了，他现在没希望了，不再是泰米尔政治中的一个角色

original: The Northern Coromandel coast and the city of Pulicat in particular is vital to our empire. It is through this coastal strip that all of the goods of the east reaches the demanding 500 000 souls in our imperial capital.\nAs the area recovers from the Orissan occupation, and as the capital of Vijayanagar itself keeps growing, the port now seems to have entered a golden age of economic growth and prosperity.
translation: 科罗曼德尔海岸以及普利卡特城对我们的帝国至关重要，所有的东方货物都经过这个海岸带进入帝国，满足我们首都的五十万人的需求。\n当这个地区从奥里萨的占领中恢复回来，毗奢耶那伽罗首都本身保持发展。这个港口看起来正在步入经济发展和财富累积的黄金时代。
蒂鲁帕蒂-蒂鲁马拉寺庙群

original: Perhaps the greatest temple of all in our lands, the great temple of Venkateshwara and the connected temple city of Tirupati has increasingly come to be connected with the rulers of our state. Over the years it has grown from a major pilgrimage to one of the great temple cities in India. The city is supported by the donations of countless treasures as well as over 40 villages providing it with food and income.\nWe should, however, not be content with this. By increasing our support, providing it with even more villages and donations, we could ensure that it becomes the greatest temple city in all of Southern India. May Tirupati prosper for as long as our empire grows!
translation: 也许这是我们国家最伟大的庙宇。Venkateshwara大庙以及临近的Tirupati庙城已经逐渐和我们的统治者乃至我们的国家息息相关。多少年来这里成为印度的一个主要朝圣地以及最伟大的庙城之一。这座城市拥有数不尽的捐献，有40家村庄提供给他们食物和收入。\n我们不应该满足于此。通过增加我们的支持，提供给他们更多的领地和捐献，我们可以确信它将成为南印度最伟大的庙宇城市。愿Tirupati永世繁荣，与帝国常在。

original: Let us keep our contributions more modest.
Abd-ur-Razzaq, ambassador of the Timurid court
translation: 帖木儿朝廷大使 阿布都 - 剌沙克

original: An ambassador of Shah Rukh in faraway Samarkand arrived today in our capital. While the Timurid had traveled far and seen many great things on his way to our great city he appeared very impressed by what he found here. His knowledge of the world outside of India as well as the observations he could share regarding the lands of our direct neighbors will be very useful to us.
translation: 从遥远撒马尔罕来的沙哈鲁使节今天已经抵达了我们的首都。尽管帖木儿帝国大使在到达我们伟大城市的漫长路途中己见识过了许多奇闻奇观，但他仍然被我们这里所深深吸引。他所了解的印度之外的世界以及他对我们邻国情況的观察，对我们来说都很有价值。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the dense forests of the province are full of a rare and exceptionally beautiful type of wood.
translation: 我们收到了在$PROVINCENAME$的殖民者的消息，这个省份里的茂密丛林里有着珍贵稀少的树种。

original: We have received reports from our colonial settlers in $PROVINCENAME$ that the province is home to a wild plant that can be used to dye fabric.
translation: 我们收到了在$PROVINCENAME$的殖民者的报告，这个省份拥有一种可以制造染料的野生植物。

original: One or more clans headed by an elder with a council of other leaders to help him make decisions related to their respective areas.
translation: 一个或者多个部落推举一位长者和其他领导人组成的议会，帮助长者作各自领域的决策

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Godavari strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制哥达瓦里河口可以加强我们在这一地区的贸易竞争力

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Krishna strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制克里希纳河口可以加强我们在这一地区的贸易竞争力

original: Controlling the important river estuary of the Kura strengthens our hold of the trade in the region.
translation: 控制库那河口可以加强我们在这一地区的贸易竞争力

original: The Maghreb as a whole has seen many bad years from which it is still recovering. Hopefully things are soon going to be looking up again.
translation: 马格里布作为一个整体处在危机中已经很多年了，至今仍然在恢复，希望一切能重新好起来

original: A great number of Andalucian Moors have settled in our cities, enriching the urban culture and our state with it.
translation: 许多安达卢西亚的摩尔人定居在我们的城市，使我们国家的都市文化更加繁荣

original: The cult of Idris is growing quicker than anyone could've imagined. This immensely popular movement will perhaps not remain this enflamed forever but right now it is inflaming the hearts of our people.
translation: 伊德里斯崇拜以没人能够想到的速度正在加速传播，这个大规模的群众运动也许不会一直这么狂热下去，不过现在它点燃了人民的心

original: The last century has been a harsh and unforgiving one for the countries of the Maghreb. Due to increasing desertification, shrinking urban population, general famine and increasingly strong groups disloyal of nomads roaming the countryside most of the states in North Africa have seen better days.\nWhile things are looking up a bit lately, internal trade is on the rise and there are signs of increasing urbanization again, our states are still shadows of their former selves. Many fear that once the Iberians have finished off the Kingdom of Granada they will be coming for us.
translation: 上个世纪对于马格里布国家来说非常严酷和不顺。由于沙漠化，部落人口的减少，大规模的饥荒以及部族不忠，游牧侵袭等种种因素，这些年是非常辛苦的时期。\n最近情况似乎变得好了一些，国内贸易正在上升，城市化的进程也在逐渐开展。尽管我们的国家仍然处在过去辉煌的阴影之中，许多人担心伊比利亚人在征服格兰纳达之后会把目标对准我们。

original: Let them try! We shall rise again!
translation: 让他们放马过来吧，看看他们有什么能耐

original: Spain has chosen to expel the Moors that still resided within her borders. Large numbers of Andalusian Moorish refugees have therefore been arriving in our ports, asking to be let into our country. While it pains us that these of people had to leave their homes this may well be a blessing for our kingdom. Most of the refugees are city dwellers, craftsmen, scholars, artists and administrators. Precisely the kind of people our own cities have a great shortage of after the great crisis of the Maghreb.
translation: 西班牙决定驱逐出他们境内的摩尔人居民。许多安达卢西亚摩尔难民涌向我们的港口，要求进入我们的国家。对这些难民来说真是悲惨的遭遇，但对我们国家来说这是却是一种祝福。多数难民都是城镇居民，手艺人，学者，艺术家以及官员。这些都是马格里布危机之后我们的城市所急缺的人才

original: We welcome our brothers in faith.
Muhammad al-Jazuli and the Dala'il al-Khayrat
translation: 穆罕默德 朱祖里和 《祝福的证明》

original: Recently returned after a long stay in the Hejaz a popular Sufi leader originally from the Sus valley has enjoyed a quickly rising popularity in our kingdom. With him from the holy land al-Jazuli brings the Dala'il al-Khayrat, a prayer book in which he has collected litanies asking God to bless, show mercy and kindness to Muhammed.\nUnlike al-Jazuli himself the book can be in many places and given its fantastic popularity it seems destined to survive both him and our dynasty.
translation: 最近，刚从汉志归来的广受欢迎的苏菲派领导人在我们的王国迅速走红。他从圣地al-Jazuli带来了Dala'il al-Khayrat，这是一本包含连篇累牍的寻求真主祝福的祈祷书，展示了真主如何向先知展示他的仁慈。\n和他本人不同，这本书可以到处流传，在全国各地都收到了广泛的欢迎。
非斯的伊德里斯狂热崇拜

original: Fulfilling a long standing legend, the preserved body of Idris II was found in one of the mosques of Fez a few years ago. Ever since this event the Idrisid sharifs have been the centre of a growing a cult in Fez and in our kingdom in general.\nThis devout cult seems destined to lift the hearts our population after the harsh period we have left behind us. There is, however, always a risk with passionate popular movements like this one, it wouldn't do for them to forget who wields the temporal power.
translation: 伴随着长久的传奇故事，数年前，伊德里斯二世的遗体在非斯的一家清真寺被发现。自从那时开始，这位伊德里斯沙里夫的故事就成为了我们国家狂热崇拜的核心。\n这种虔诚的崇拜似乎注定要让我们的人民彻底和过去那艰难的时代说再见。然而像这样狂热的人民运动一直都有着潜在风险。他们不应该忘了谁正在行使世俗的权力。

original: Allow them representation but no real official support.
translation: 随他们自作多情去吧，不会有官方的支持
阿布•扎卡里耶•叶海亚•瓦塔西

original: In all but name Morocco has not one but two royal dynasties. Since twenty years past almost all power formally held by the Marinid dynasty has in fact been wielded by their formidable Wattasid vizier Abu Zakariya Yahya.\nInsanely popular after his victory over the Portuguese in 1437 and his patronization of the Idrisid cult in Fez, Abu Zakariya Yahya has ensured that the royal bureaucracy is both well functioning and imbued with Wattasid family members. As the Wattasids are related to the Marinid rulers this is in itself perhaps not a worrying development. Now that Abu Zakariya Yahya lies on his deathbed, however, we cannot but wonder what the future will bring. The great man has seemingly left nothing to chance and has already arranged for his cousin to succeed him as Vizier but what remains unclear is what the Wattasid family will do in the future with the network Yahya has built them.
translation: 摩洛哥实际上有两个王室。二十年过去了，马林王朝曾经拥有的权力已经被他们强大的瓦塔斯维齐尔Abu Zakariya Yahya所篡夺。\n在他1437年针对葡萄牙的战争获胜以及他对伊德里斯崇拜的支持，他获取了很多人的支持。 Abu Zakariya Yahya保证了皇家行政机关正常运转的同时不断地向其中加入瓦塔斯家族的成员。瓦塔斯家族是马林家族的近亲，看起来似乎这并不会是一个令人忧心的进程。现在Abu Zakariya Yahya已经临终了，然而未来会怎样没有人知道。这位为人看起来做事四平八稳，他让他的堂兄弟继承维齐尔的职位，没有人知道瓦塔斯家族会利用Yahya已经建立的人脉做些什么。

original: We have lost a great man.

translation: 这是瓦塔斯家族的阴谋？

original: It is clear to us now that the Wattasid family has been allowed to grow too strong and influential in our kingdom. Unless we move to curb their power now we might not be able to further down the line. Sultan $MONARCH$ is convinced there is a conspiracy against the throne afoot.
translation: 很显然瓦塔斯家族现在在我们国家的影响力变得过于强大，除非我们现在就开始减少他们的权力，否则以后会发生什么真的不好说。$MONARCH$苏丹深信有一个觊觎王冠的阴谋。
他们仍然是值得信任的顾问。

original: In what was seen as a sudden betrayal of our Wattasid viziers our Sultan has had all the Wattasids he could find rounded up and executed. The popularity of the Wattasid family, however, means that this has been a very unpopular move.\nAs $MONARCH$ appointed a new, non Wattasid, vizier to serve him yesterday riots broke out and it is rumored that somewhere two Wattasid brothers remain hidden to take control over this revolt, determined to avenge their family.
translation: 瓦塔斯维齐尔忽然发难宣布叛乱，我们的苏丹已经把能找到的瓦塔西家族的人全部处决。瓦塔斯家族非常受欢迎，这个举动将会引发许多不满。\n昨天，当$MONARCH$指定任命一位非瓦塔斯家族的维齐尔时，叛乱发生了，有传言指出，两位瓦塔斯家族的兄弟躲在暗处遥控了这场叛乱，目的是为了他们的家族复仇。
瓦塔斯家族的最后通牒

original: It seems the suspicions against our Wattasid viziers had substance to them. Today our Sultan received an ultimatum from Muhammad al-Wattasi. He must either give up the throne peacefully or risk an open revolt against his power.
translation: 看来对瓦塔斯家族维齐尔的怀疑对他们起了反效果。今天我们的苏丹收到了Muhammad al-Wattasi的最后通牒，他要么自动放弃王位，否则就会兵戎相见

original: Over the centuries we have been able to rely on the salt and gold caravans from the Sahara.\nDespite the insistence of almost all advisors $MONARCH$ is now insisting that we must secure this trade route ourselves. The Tuaregs cannot be trusted to protect these caravans and we can be almost certain that the sources of these valuable goods would be handled more effectively directly by our kingdom.
translation: 数百年来我们依赖着撒哈拉运送盐和黄金的骆驼队。\n尽管所有的顾问都反对，$MONARCH$坚持认为我们必须自己保护自己的贸易路线。我们无法信任图阿雷格人保护我们的商队，我们相信直接动用王国力量保护这些珍贵的资源会更加的有效。

original: This is a fool's errand, the desert cannot be controlled.
translation: 真是愚蠢的行为，人是无法控制沙漠的

original: Moroccan armies are advancing into the southern Sahara via the Tuat oasis route.
translation: 摩洛哥的军队正在沿着Tuat绿洲的路线向撒哈拉进军

original: Fulani nomads have begun penetrating our borders in this region and are actively undermining our authority over our subjects.
translation: 富拉尼游牧民族开始深入我们在这个地区的边界，腐蚀我们在这一地区的统治

original: Islamic teachings are now slowly trickling down from some of the members of our aristocracy to the common people of our empire. While this creates some tension between traditionalists and converts it will undoubtedly lead to a more stable situation in the long run.
translation: 伊斯兰教育开始逐渐从帝国的普通居民向贵族成员渗透。虽然这将导致传统主义者和新皈依教徒之间的冲突，从长期来看这将会使我们的帝国更加的稳定。

original: Portuguese traders have been meddling in this region, encouraging our local subordinates to rebel against central rule.
translation: 葡萄牙商人开始干预这个地区，公然鼓励地方的叛乱势力反抗中央统治。

original: Our ports are frequented by Portuguese traders who bring us horses and exotic goods in return for gold and slaves.
translation: 葡萄牙人经常出入我们的港口，带给我们良马和异国的货物，用来交换黄金和奴隶

original: The roads in this region are plagued by bandits and raiders. While order will undoubtedly be restored eventually this is currently hurting both the local economy and creating tensions between our subjects and the state.
translation: 这块区域的道路经常被土匪袭击。当然将来这里的秩序将被恢复，但是目前这里的局面不仅会损害当地的经济，还会损害我们跟属国之间的关系

original: By forcefully limiting the contact allowed with Portuguese traders we have at the same time managed to alienate our own merchant caste, the Wangaras. While relations between the throne and these traders are likely to return to normal in time it may well take longer for our economy to recover.
translation: 在强制限制和葡萄牙商人的接触的同时，我们得罪了我们自己的商人阶层：万噶拉。尽管王室和这些商人的关系会随着时间的流逝慢慢恢复，但我们国家的经济也许需要更久时间来恢复。

original: A group of wandering nomads known as the Fulani have united under the leadership of Tengella and his son Koly. Migrating south the Fulani have now formed an expansionist state around Futa Tooro with its eyes set on the entire Senegambian region. These Fulani seem to have no respect for our borders and there have been numerous incidents already of these tribesmen penetrating deep into our lands, levying taxes on our people and undermining our authority.
translation: 一群流浪的游牧民族：富拉尼人已经团结在邓哲拉和他的儿子科利的旗帜之下。富拉尼人向着南部扩张，他们已经在Futa Tooro区域形成了一个政权并把他们的眼线散布在整个塞内加尔冈比亚地区。这些富拉尼人似乎根本无视我们的国界，这些部落游民深入我们的国界之时已经造成了许多起冲突，对我们的人民征税，挑战我们的权威

original: Having adopted a less violent approach, Portuguese traders have become an increasingly common sight along our western coasts. In many ways this is a boon to our state as it has given us much easier access to horses for our armies and a way to procure valuable goods from the many exotic ports frequented by Portuguese merchants. For gold or slaves there is not much the Portuguese wouldn't sell us and our merchant caste, the Wangara, is thriving due to this new partnership.\nThere is, however, a slight worry about this development in some camps, the amount of slaves to a horse seem to keep increasing by the day and while our own transoceanic ventures haven't gone so well it would seem less than prudent to rely entirely on these foreign merchants as they surely can't have our best interests at heart.
translation: 由于葡萄牙商人处事温和，他们的身影在西海岸正越来越常见。在许多方面，这对于我国都十分有益。他们的存在大大降低了购置军马的难度。葡萄牙商人和各地港口往来频繁，也方便我们获取异国的珍贵货物。只要有黄金和奴隶，没什么葡萄牙人不卖给我们的东西。我们的商人阶级，万加腊人，依靠新的贸易伙伴繁荣了起来。\n然而，随着合作加深，情况也隐约令人担心。在某些营地上，用于兑换马匹的奴隶越来越不值钱，我们主导的跨洋贸易也并不成功。外国商人显然不会照顾我们的利益，完全依赖他们不是什么明智之举。

original: The Portuguese traders on our western coast have become quite a nuisance lately. While the horses they bring for our armies and the exotic goods they bring from far away countries are of great use to us it seems they cannot help but meddle in the local politics. It is clear that several chiefs that are in contact with the Portuguese have been encouraged to extend their personal authority and to slowly attempt to cut the ties with our central administration.\nIn order to deal with this we could either strike at the chiefs themselves or attempt to limit the influence of the Portuguese.
translation: 西海岸的葡萄牙商人现在变得越来越不像话了，尽管他们带来的战马和货物确实还蛮好用的，但是他们开始干预当地的政治。现在已经有一些当地酋长开始接触葡萄牙人，他们被鼓励扩张他们的自治权，并且在未来切断和中央政权的联系。\n为了针对这种状况我们要么直接打击这些不听话的酋长，要么限制住葡萄牙人的影响力

original: Act decisively to limit Portuguese influence.
The problem lies with the disloyal chiefs.
translation: 问题在于不听话的酋长

original: While our kingdom is Islamic in name the old religion of our forefathers is still very much a force to be reckoned with. Islam has, however, been gaining more ground lately among the aristocracy and wandering marabouts have also become an increasingly common sight even in the farthest corners of our lands.\nIn the past our predecessors have all avoided trying to be too forceful about converting their subjects but if we wish we could probably make use of these recent developments to encourage the spread of the true faith.
translation: 我们的王国名义上是个伊斯兰国家，但实际上我们祖先的旧宗教依然是一股强大的势力。然而最近伊斯兰教正在贵族中间站稳脚跟，并且伊斯兰教隐士也变得很常见，即使是在我们国家的角落。\n在过去，我们的先王一直避免过于要求属国转化宗教，但目前伊斯兰教传播的进展让我们觉得应该是鼓励传教的时候了。

original: Let us not rock the boat.

The time needed to complete a journey from our capital to the coast has risen alarmingly due to the direct route being plagued by bandits, Fulani raiders and local chiefs hoping to enrich themselves by waylaying the rich Wangara traders.\nUnless we attempt to address this issue soon we may find ourselves losing contact with the outlying parts of our empire.
translation: 从首都通往海岸的路程所需要的时间最近延长了许多，这是由于道路经常被土匪所洗劫，富拉尼土匪和当地的酋长想要通过抢劫万噶拉商人来使自己富有。\n除非我们马上着手解决这个问题，我们将会很快发现我们会失去和帝国外部的联系。

original: Empower the local chiefs to deal with the problem.
translation: 加强当地酋长的权力来对付这个问题

original: Invest state resources to clear all roads.
translation: 用国家力量来扫清这些道路

original: Let us concentrate on our core areas instead.
translation: 还是关心我们的核心领土吧。

original: Sami Koli, the governor of Kaabu is accusing us of neglecting the coastal trading areas of our empire. He has now threatened to sever the ties with us completely and has started to deal with the European trading nations directly rather than as our representative. Never very committed to the Malian state religion Kaabu has grown to be a stronghold of the local traditional religion and its new rulers have been quick to use this against us.\nWith a strong religious identity and its Atlantic trade ties Kaabu has every chance of becoming a durable state. If we are to stop this we should probably act as soon as possible.
translation: 卡布的长官，萨米·科利正在指责我们忽视帝国沿海地区的贸易。他要威胁彻底断绝与我国的关系，不再充当我国代表，直接跟欧洲贸易国家来往。卡布一直以来都对马里国教不冷不热，现在已经成为了当地传统宗教的坚强阵地。它的新统治者迅速把握机会，利用这一点公开和我们作对。\n凭借着强大的宗教认同还有大西洋的贸易联系，卡布随时有机会长久立国。如果我们想要阻止，我们必须马上行动。
我们必须消灭这些叛军！

original: We will have to deal with them later.
translation: 让我们以后再对付他们。

original: Tawantinsuyu, the Empire of the Incas

Once one of many small regional kingdoms our state now holds land in all the four regions of the Andes. Our kingdom has transformed into something greater, a mighty empire of many peoples united under a strong class of rulers. To our subjects we are simply their overlords, the Incas.
translation: 只要这些小国家中有一个能拥有安第斯区域那四片领土. 我们的王国就能转变为一种更为强大的形式，人民团结在强大统治阶层之下的一个浩瀚的帝国. 在我们的统治下我们就是印加的霸主.

original: Tawantinsuyu, the Empire of the Incas
translation: 塔万廷苏尤，印加人的帝国

original: Once one of many small regional kingdoms our state now holds land in all the four regions of the Andes. Our kingdom has transformed into something greater, a mighty empire of many peoples united under a strong class of rulers. To our subjects we are simply their overlords, the Incas.
translation: 许多小国并入了我们国家，我国现在拥有安第斯山脉的全部四个地区。我们的王国变成了一个更为庞大的，一个紧密团结在一群强有力地统治者周围的强盛帝国。对于我们的属国，我们的唯一身份就是他们的主人，印加。

original: With the Andean technology group, technology levels are 150% more expensive (250%).
translation: 属于安第斯科技组时，科技升级花费额外150%（即需要250%）。

original: We are in the process of cutting the ties with the Patriarch in Alexandria. A risky move but one that is currently revitalizing our church.
translation: 我们正处于与亚历山大牧首切断联系的过程中。这是充满风险的一步，但它现在来看能使我们教会复兴。

original: While there are many drawbacks to an itinerant court one of its strengths is how it allows us to spread the culture of our royal court.
translation: 尽管流动宫廷遭遇了不少挫折,其优点之一是让我们能传播皇家宫廷的文化.

original: We are currently undertaking a series of reforms to lessen the provincial autonomy in our Empire.
translation: 我们目前正在进行一系列的改革来削弱我们帝国里省份的自治权.

original: This area has seen a large influx of Oromo nomads recently.
translation: 这个地区最近有大量奥罗莫人迁入.

original: We have kept the royal tradition of Mount Geshen alive. This means that we keep all royal heirs confined to the area around Mount Geshen so that we know that we can count on always having a proper heir when needed.
translation: 我们已经确保了Mount Geshen的王室传统. 这意味着我们将会让王室后嗣限制在Mount Geshen周围的区域，这样我们才能有把握在需要时随时都能有一位合适的继承人.
札拉·雅各布的集权改革

original: Under the care of the Solomonic dynasty Ethiopia has grown from a kingdom into a great empire. However the diverse regions under our rule lack a common language, religion or administrative system.\nZara Yakob, the most able ruler Ethiopia has seen in a long time, has prepared a number of reforms that might go a long way towards creating a more unified state.
translation: 在所罗门王朝的治理下,埃塞俄比亚已经从一个王国发展为一个巨大的帝国. 然而我们所统治的广大地区缺少一个统一的语言，宗教信仰或是管理系统.\n扎拉"雅克布"康斯坦丁，埃塞俄比亚长久以来最有能力的统治者，已经准备了一系列的改革来沿一元化国家的道路走得更远.
我们必须实行中央集权制
我们可以以后再实行中央集权.

original: In order to control the diverse Ethiopian empire the Solomonids have never established a permanent capital. Instead the royal court travels from chief to chief every few months.\nWhile it is hard to establish an administrative continuity under such circumstances the traveling court does have its benefits. The frequent visits of the royal courts in all corners of the Empire are contributing to the growth of a common elite culture in our lands.
translation: 为了控制广大的埃塞俄比亚帝国，所罗门王朝从没有设立过一个永久的首都. 反而是皇家宫廷每隔几个月都会迁至别的酋长处.\n虽然在这样的一个环境下想要建立起一个持久的行政机构有不少困难，流动的宫廷还是有它的好处. 皇家宫廷频繁造访整个帝国的各个角落有助于我们领土上一个普遍的精英文化的发展.

original: This is how it has always been.
Actively encourage the cultural conversion of the countryside.
translation: 积极鼓励乡村文化的转变.

original: Debre Berhan - The Mountain of Light
translation: 德布瑞 贝尔翰 - 光明之山

original: $MONARCH$ has had a vision in which he has been shown a shining mountain on which to build the new capital of Ethiopia. A church has already been constructed at the site and now it is up to the state to realize the dream of our Emperor.
translation: $MONARCH$ 已经有了一个在一座闪耀着光芒的山上建立埃塞俄比亚新首都的设想. 一座教堂已经在那里开始施工了，现在是时候让我们国家来实现我们皇帝的梦想.

original: The time has come for a permanent Capital.
translation: 是时候设立永久首都了.

original: Let us not break with Tradition.
