translation: 德布瑞 贝尔翰 遭受掠夺

original: Old traditions die hard and as the countryside of Debre Berhan is being plundered the new capital is being abandoned by everyone from our courtiers to the lowliest stable boy. We have no choice but to resume the custom of having an itinerant court.
translation: 旧传统难以根除，德布瑞 贝尔翰的乡下正在遭受掠夺而新首都也正遭到从统治阶层到低级人民每个人的抛弃. 我们别无他法，只能重拾流动宫廷的传统.

original: We must move to the provinces.
translation: 我们必须迁往这个省份。

original: $MONARCH$ finds himself spending more and more time by the monasteries at lake Tana. Due to this continued patronage of the king a small market town has begun to spring up in the area and some have started to name the city as a secondary capital of our kingdom.\nThis idea has grown on $MONARCH$ who believes a permanent capital here might allow us to start a new spiritual and architectural legacy.
translation: $MONARCH$发现自己在塔纳湖的修道院花的时间越来越长了。由于国王经常性的光顾，这个小村庄在这片区域里蓬勃发展着，如今逐渐成为被称为我们王国的第二首都的城市。\n$MONARCH$脑海中甚至开始滋生了一个想法，把这儿作为一个永久的首都可能能让我们为后人留下一份宗教上和建筑上的遗产。

original: Let us build our capital here.
translation: 让我们在这儿建立首都吧。

original: We must not bind ourselves to one place.
translation: 我们决不能把自己捆死在一个地方。

original: The fate of the Egyptian Copts

Word has reached us from Egypt that the Mameluk sultan is persecuting the Copts in his lands. As a fellow kingdom under the Patriarchate of Alexandria it is our duty to act. The fact that the patriarch himself is in Mameluk hands complicates things somewhat however, a direct attack might place the foundation of our church at risk.
translation: 埃及传来的消息说马穆鲁克苏丹正在迫害他领地上的科普特信众。作为同在亚历山大牧首区下的兄弟王国，我们有责任行动起来。然而，牧首本人正在马穆鲁克手中，这一事实多少使事情复杂化了一些，直接的进攻很有可能会动摇我们教会的基础。

original: Send a strongly worded letter to the Sultan.
translation: 给苏丹送去一封义正言辞的信。

original: Avoid the risk of angering the Mamluks.
translation: 避免惹恼马穆鲁克的危险。
一封来自埃塞俄比亚的信

original: We have received a letter from the Ethiopian Emperor today. The message is a detailed account of the many perceived misdeeds of our Sultanate against the Copts that reside within our borders.\nThere is likely little reason for concern, however, as the patriarch of both the Egyptian and Ethiopian Copts is our hostage. It seems very unlikely that an Ethiopian monarch would risk the safety of his patriarch over a matter such as this.
translation: 我们今天收到了一封来自埃塞俄比亚来的信。来信详细地指控了我们苏丹国对居住在我国境内的科普特人的恶行。\n但似乎他们还是有些许顾虑，毕竟埃及和埃塞俄比亚的科普特牧首还在我们的手上作为人质。埃塞俄比亚的君主似乎不太可能会冒着他牧首的生命危险来插手这事。

original: Attempt to apologize and repair relations.
A letter has arrived from Ethiopia
translation: 收到了一封埃塞俄比亚的信

original: We have received word that the Emperor of Ethiopia feels we are mistreating the Coptic population in our lands. He clearly sees this as a cause for war and there is much speculation that an Ethiopian attack might be imminent.
translation: 我们得知埃塞俄比亚皇帝已经察觉了我们在虐待我们领土上的科普特人。他显然将这作为一个宣战理由，也许这可以说明来自埃塞俄比亚的进攻将会是迫在眉睫。
一名马穆鲁克派出的外交官

original: Today a Mameluk messenger arrived at our court bearing the reply of the Sultan to our concerns about the Copts in his lands.\nThe reply is far from the apology we had expected however. The Sultan has chosen to show his contempt for the Ethiopian court and he ridicules any form of retribution that we might attempt.
translation: 今天一个马穆鲁克的大使带着一份苏丹对我们对其领土上科普特人的担忧的回信来到了我们宫廷。\n然而这回应可远不及我们先前所期望的道歉。苏丹表达了其对埃塞俄比亚宫廷的蔑视并对我们所可能做出的一切报复进行了嘲笑。

original: The Mameluk Sultan has sent word that he is looking into the situation of Copts in his lands. He assures us that he has nothing but feelings of friendship towards the Ethiopian people and the Coptic church.
translation: 马穆鲁克苏丹来信说他正在调查其领土上科普特人的情况。他想让我们相信他对埃塞俄比亚人民和科普特教会没有敌意。

original: The Ethiopian emperor was so displeased by our reply to his letter that he had our messenger detained.
translation: 埃塞俄比亚皇帝对我们的回应感到无比愤怒，以至于扣留了我们的外交官。

original: The Bishop of Ethiopia has died and the Ethiopian church has requested a successor from the Coptic Patriarch of Alexandria.\nWhile a successor has been chosen by the Patriarch this would be a good opportunity to show the Ethiopians who is in charge. The Emperor of Ethiopia has actively pursued a policy of conversion against his Muslim subjects and he still detains the ambassador we sent to chastise him last time.
translation: 埃塞俄比亚的主教已经过世，埃塞俄比亚教会要求亚历山大的科普特牧首委任一位继任者。\n牧首已经选出了继任者，但现在是个让埃塞俄比亚人明白到底谁说了算的好机会。埃塞俄比亚皇帝一直在致力于推行一项迫使其穆斯林子民改宗的政策，并且他仍然扣留着我们上次派去谴责他的大使。

original: Prevent the appointment of a new Bishop
We must not interfere in these matters
translation: 我们不能插手这些事务

original: It has been a long while now since the last bishop of Ethiopia died and we requested a successor from Alexandria. Could the Mamluks be interfering?
translation: 距离埃塞俄比亚主教去世及我们要求亚历山大给出一个继任者已经过去好一段时间了。会不会是马穆鲁克在从中作梗？

original: One of the greatest strengths of the Ethiopian church is the great number of successful monasteries that dot the landscape of our state. The Monastic orders have contributed to the success of our state by founding new monasteries in newly conquered areas and by spreading the word of the true faith there. The monasteries of Ethiopia are also the source of the education of the Ethiopian clergy, its nobility and its administrators and as such have contributed greatly to the revitalization of the Ethiopian church in the years past.\nThe other side of this coin, however, is that the monasteries and the orders that run them have grown both rich and autonomous.
translation: 埃塞俄比亚教会的一个巨大的优势是在我国土地上广泛分布着大量优秀的修道院。修士会通过在我们新近征服的地区成立新的修道院并在那里传播唯一真信，为我们国家的成功作出了许多贡献。埃塞俄比亚修道院也是埃塞俄比亚神职人员教育的源泉，其贵族阶级和管理者这样的人这些年来为埃塞俄比亚教会的复兴作出了巨大的贡献。\n然而换个角度来看，这也使这些修道院和修士会变得更加富有而自治。

original: Safeguard the privileges of the orders

The dependency of the Ethiopian church on the Patriarchate of Alexandria has always been a liability for our country. Perhaps there was once a practical need of bishops, clergy and spiritual guidance from abroad. The expansion of the Ethiopian church over the last two centuries, however, means that our kingdom is now already training its own clergymen and there is a strong religious infrastructure in the form of churches and monasteries throughout or lands.\nWith the Egyptian Patriarchate held hostage by Muslim conquerors we often have to wait a long time between the death of one bishop and the appointment of the next. It would be far more efficient to appoint our religious leadership from the ranks of our own clergy.
translation: 埃塞俄比亚教会对亚历山大港牧首的依赖向来是我国的一个烦恼。也许曾经对来自国外的主教，神职人员和精神指导有过实际需求。在这两个世纪里埃塞俄比亚教会的扩张说明我们王国已经在培养自己的神职人员，并且在各地拥有像教堂和修道院这些强大的宗教基础设施。\n自从埃及的牧首被穆斯林侵略者控制，我们往往不得不在主教去世和继任者被委任间等上很长一段时间。 从我们自己的神职人员行列中直接任命宗教领袖会有效率的多。
我们可不能对我们的牧首不敬。

original: Our Church should be free of foreign influence.
translation: 我们教会必须摆脱国外的影响。

original: A strange nomadic people have crossed our border from the African interior into our borderlands. Migrating in large numbers protected by very able warriors, their alien customs threaten to rip apart and reshape the very fabric of society here.\nThese disciples of Waaq are quickly displacing and converting the followers of the all faiths in the area, replacing old social structures with new ones of their own.
translation: 一支陌生的游牧民族已经从非洲内陆越过我们的边界线进入了我们的边疆。他们数量众多并且有数量众多的能征善战的勇士保护，他们的外来风俗威胁到了当地的社会结构，并且可能摧毁并重组它。\n这些Waaq的信徒们很快取代并转化了当地所有信仰的追随者，用自己的新的社会结构代替了原有的社会结构。

original: Groups of nomadic settlers have entered the province of $PROVINCENAME$. The province population is being either displaced or assimilated by the Oromo.
translation: 一群游牧定居者已经进入了$PROVINCENAME$省份. 省份中原有的人口被奥罗莫人取代或同化.

original: It seems the waves of Oromo settlers moving into our lands have finally faltered. The immigrants themselves have also begun to settle down and while our society is changed in many ways the violent initial phase of integration of this new people seem to be over.
translation: 奥罗莫人的迁徙潮终于开始渐渐平息了. 移民们已经开始安居下来,我们的社会在各种方面上也受到了改变，而这些新人口融入当地最初过程中的激烈冲突似乎已经平息.

original: Amba Geshen - The Mountain of Kings

Once, our great kingdom was plagued by crisis and civil strife upon every succession. In order to deal with this problem one of the first of the Solomonic kings therefore set up the institution of Mount Geshen. Ever since that day all royal princes except the direct heir of the king are kept isolated from the outside world on the slopes of Mount Geshen. The state ensures that these potential kings lack for nothing and this time of isolation may be used for study and contemplation by the princes. In order to protect the princes from the outside world, and in order to protect the kingdom from the claims of the princes, the mountain is kept under close guard.\nThis custom has served us well over the years and the kingdom has become much more stable than it once was. Still some feel that keeping all of our royal heirs in one place is quite risky.\nToday we find ourselves with an aging king and no heir to succeed, it is precisely in situations like these that the mountain might come in handy.
translation: 过往我们伟大的王国总会受到继承争斗的折磨。为了解决这个问题，我们所罗门王朝的首位国王建立了盖申山禁宫。从那以后除了储君以外的所有的继承人都在盖申山上与世隔绝。政府保证了这些王位觊觎者衣食无缺,又能有足够的时间来学习和思考。为了保护这些王子不受外界干扰，也为了确保王国不会受王子宣称王位的麻烦，这座山被置于严密的看守之下。\n这个传统多年来运作良好，而我们王国也变得前所未有的稳定，尽管有些人认为把所有王位继承人聚到一起有很大的风险。\n如今我们国王年事已高而又没有继承人，这时就是这座山发挥作用的时候了。

original: We are fortunate that our ancestors had such foresight.
translation: 我们应该为我们祖先如此有远见而感到庆幸.

original: We have no need for this gilded prison.
translation: 我们不再需要这镀金的监狱了.

original: The mountain will be used for other purposes
translation: 这座山将会用作其他用途

original: Early on in his reign king $MONARCH$ married the daughter of one of the Muslim chiefs of the kingdom. As the young woman converted and said her vows to the Ethiopian emperor there was no way to know that this would turn out to be one of the most influential persons in Ethiopian politics for years to come. Eleni or Helen would in time serve not only her husband but several successive kings after him as an able advisor and as a power behind the throne.
translation: 在他早年的统治时,国王 $MONARCH$ 迎娶了国内一个穆斯林领袖的女儿. 当这个年轻的女人转教并对埃塞俄比亚国王起誓时，谁也想不到她将会成为一个在接下来多年内对埃塞俄比亚政坛最有影响力的人. 海伦在长时间内不但会效忠于她的丈夫，还会为她丈夫之后继任的好几个皇帝担任有能力的顾问和实际掌权者.

original: Disaster at the Mountain of Kings

Nobody knows exactly what happened but news reached us today that all of the princes on Mount Geshen are dead. It would appear that someone managed to surprise the guards to then proceed to slaughter the royal heirs. As the kingdom tries to recover from the shock it is clear that this particular tradition will no longer be part of our national heritage.
translation: 谁也不知道到底发生了什么，但据我们目前所知，盖申山上所有的王子都死了. 似乎是有人突袭了守卫并对王位继承人们进行了一次大屠杀. 正当王国试图从震撼中缓过来的时候，有一点可以确信的是这项传统将不会再延续下去了.

original: Home to the majority of the world's population and the origin of the majority of its manufactured goods Asia is still in many ways the clear centre of the world in 1444. From Ming China to the myriad of states in India and Indochina, to the crumbling Timurid Empire and the wide steppes to its north, Asia so far remains fundamentally disinterested in conflicts such as the crusade of Varna or the Hundred Year's War.
translation: 作为一个人口众多及大部分制成商品的来源地，1444年的亚洲仍然在诸多方面是世界的中心。从中国的明朝到印度和中南半岛的诸国，再到摇摇欲坠的帖木儿帝国和它北方一望无际的草原部落，亚洲此时对瓦尔纳十字军或百年战争这样的冲突漠不关心。

original: 50 years prior its encounter with Columbus the Americas are a huge and diverse region. In the south Cusco has just begun its rise from a minor kingdom to the great Inca empire. In central America the newly formed Aztec Triple Alliance is but one of many strong regional powers. In North America, perhaps the most divided region of all, the Iroquois and Huron federations have just begun to form.
translation: 在哥伦布到来的50年前，美洲是一个广阔无垠的地区。在南方，库斯科才刚刚开始从一个小王国发展成庞大的印加帝国的崛起。在中美洲，新形成的阿兹特克三角联盟还只不过是许多强大的地方势力中的一支。在北美洲，或许这里是群雄割据最严重的地方了，易洛魁和休伦联盟才刚刚起步。

original: In 1444 Africa is a region full of emerging kingdoms. In the east the Christian Ethiopian empire is experiencing a golden age under its celebrated ruler Zara Yakob. In West Africa the space left by the crumbling Mali empire is being filled by rising states such as Songhai. An ongoing crisis in the Maghreb will soon result in the rebirth of a strong Moroccan kingdom in the northwest, while the northeast becomes the playground of European and Turkish imperialists.
translation: 在1444年，非洲充斥着新兴的王国。在东边，信仰基督教的埃塞俄比亚帝国在札拉·雅各布的统治下正处于黄金时代。 在西非，衰退的马里帝国留下的真空正在被桑海等新兴国家所填充。 在西北非，一场正在马格里布发生的危机很快将导致强大的摩洛哥王国再生，与此同时东北非将成为欧洲和土耳其帝国主义者的角斗场。

original: The Nabibangsha and other manifestations of Hindu-Muslim syncretism ensure that the day-to-day business in our religiously divided state remain rather peaceful.
translation: 纳比邦撒史诗与其他印度穆斯林的综摄主义的作品保证了这个被不同宗教信仰分割的国度维持着相对的和平.
卡理法塔巴德清真寺城

original: This is the site of the Mosque city of Khalifatabad, home to one of India's greatest mosques.
translation: 这里就是卡理法塔巴德清真寺城，印度最伟大的清真寺的所在地.

original: Through the hard work of our subjects vast new areas have been opened up for settlement and cultivation in this area, boosting both provincial income and the local interest in the Islamic faith.
translation: 经过我们领民不懈的努力，这片区域很大一块新新土地已经被清理出来作为开垦和居住之用，不仅提升了省份税收收入，同时也加深了当地居民对伊斯兰信仰的兴趣.

original: We have opened our arms to the fleeing nobility of the old Sultanate of Delhi. These impoverished nobles are eager to earn new fortunes for themselves in our service.
translation: 我们对旧德里苏丹国的流亡贵族伸出援手. 这些穷困的贵族们渴望在我们的帮助下获得新的财富.

original: Once the site of a few small villages Calcutta is now a thriving new port largely dominated by European traders.
translation: 在几个小村子上发展起来的加尔各答如今欣欣向荣，已然成为一个主要由欧洲商人统治着的新兴港口.

original: The Chishti Order and the Sultans of Bengal
translation: 赤速梯团和孟加拉苏丹

original: The Sufi Chishti order has always had a special relationship with our royal dynasty. The order has been able to rely on our patronage and we have relied on its support in return. Less than a generation ago Nur Qutb-i ‘Alam, leader of the Chishti in Bengal ensured our return to power as the Sultanate was threatened by a Hindu usurper.\nAs the sad news of Nur Qutb-i ‘Alam's passing now reach us the time has come to reaffirm this alliance between worldly and spiritual power. On the other hand this might also be a good opportunity to distance the throne from the Chishti order, an organization which has grown a bit too powerful for comfort.
translation: 苏菲派赤速梯团和我们的王朝总有种特殊的联系. 梯团依赖于我们的资助，与此同时我们又依赖于他们的支持. 在差不多一个世代以前，Nur Qutb-i ‘Alam，孟加拉地区赤速领导人，在苏丹受到印度篡位者威胁时保证我们能够重新掌权.\n当Nur Qutb-i ‘Alam去世这令人伤心的消息传来时，我们是时候该重申与这股世俗与精神势力的联盟了. 但是换个角度想，这是宫廷和赤速梯团分道扬镳的好机会，这个组织已经发展的太强大了，难以令人安心.

original: In time the Sufi presence in Bengal has led to a certain degree of religious syncretism. As part of this general trend the Bengali author and poet Sayid Sultan has recently created something quite unique. It is a book in Bengali about the lineage of the prophets of Islam. One of the unusual features of this book is that among the classical row of prophets Sayid Sultan has also included the Hindu god Krishna among those that came before Mohamed.
translation: 苏菲派在孟加拉的这段时间已经某种程度上开始逐渐朝着综摄主义的方向发展. 作为这个大潮流的一部分，孟加拉作家及诗人萨伊德苏丹最近创作出了一些独特的东西. 这本用孟加拉文书写的书中介绍了伊斯兰教先知的谱系. 这本书不同寻常之处在于除了传统中人们所说的先知们，萨伊德苏丹还将印度教的克利须那神列于穆罕默德之前诸位先知之中.

original: This is a great work of Bengali literature.
translation: 这是一部孟加拉文学巨著.
卡理法塔巴德清真寺城

original: In a recently cleared part of the deep Mangrove forests of the Sunderbans lies the city of Khalifatabad. Not content with having cleared the area in the 1430s the local ruler Khan Jahan Ali has spent a lifetime filling the city with Mosques and great buildings. Among the many Mosques of Bagerhat is the huge Shait Gambuj Mosque with over 80 domes, quite possibly the biggest Mosque in India.
translation: 在一片茂密的苏达班红树林中清理出的空地上坐落着卡理法塔巴德城. 在1430年代,不满足于仅仅清理出土地，当地统治者 Khan Jahan Ali花了一辈子的时间来在这个城市里填满了清真寺和大型建筑. 在巴盖尔哈德的众多清真寺中，有超过80个圆顶,宏伟的沙古巴迦密清真寺很可能是全印度最大的了.

original: Bengal is famed for its fertile soil and rich harvests. The great delta of the Ganges is, however, still covered by thick jungles and swamps. The clearing of land to allow our ever-growing population some room to spread is a process that has been going on slowly but steadily for longer than anyone can remember.\nRecently a number of holy men, many of them Sufis have begun to get involved in this process. These holy men have mobilized the hearts of our people and the process of land reclamation suddenly seems to be going a lot smoother than it ever has before. As if to confirm that things are now moving in the right direction the flow of the great river Ganges itself has shifted in a way that has further helped this process along.
translation: 孟加拉以其肥沃的土地和丰收出名. 然而恒河三角洲仍然被大片大片的丛林和沼泽覆盖着.开垦土地,为我们不断增长的人口提供发展空间的过程缓慢但持续着,没人记得这件事从何时开始.\n最近有一些教徒，他们大多数是苏菲派教徒，也加入到了这个改造过程中. 这些教徒打心底动员起了我们的人民以至于这开垦的过程变得前所未有的顺利. 似乎得到了上天眷顾一样，恒河流动的方向也在一点一点地改变，使我们的进展更加顺利了.

original: After the fall of the Delhi Sultanate large parts of its former leading nobility have crossed our borders. The nobles are determined to build a new life for themselves and to one day reclaim what their families have lost.\nThis is a heterogeneous group of Afghans, Uzbeks, Turanis and Persians, all of which are used to wield a great deal of power. Surely our state can benefit from their contacts and experience. At the same time their arrival is causing social tension and unrest in our lands.
translation: 在德里苏丹倒台后，一大批曾经处于统治阶级的贵族越过了我们的边界. 这些贵族决心要重新建立生活，并总有一天要夺回他们之前所失去的一切.\n这群人中混杂着阿富汗人，乌兹别克人，图兰人和波斯人，他们都曾经掌握着大量的权力. 我们国家肯定能从他们的人脉和经验中获益. 与此同时，他们的到来也在我们的领土上造成了紧张和骚动.

original: We must encourage these men of quality to serve us!
translation: 我们必须鼓励这些人才为我们效劳!

original: Try to discourage them from staying in our lands.
translation: 尝试阻碍他们留在我们的土地上.

original: A man called Sher Shah Sur or Sher Khan has risen to become the unquestioned leader of the Delhian nobles that have settled in parts of our lands. With promises of wealth and vengeance this charismatic leader has raised an army and is ready to march at anyone who would oppose him.\nWhile one would expect the long term goal of this army to be the reclamation of the Sultanate of Delhi we have today received an ultimatum from the camp of Sher Shah. Either we vacate the throne and allow him to take control over our kingdom or he will come with sword in hand to take it from us.
translation: 一个叫舍尔沙或是舍尔汗的人已经崛起并成为在我国境内定居的德里贵族们的绝对领袖. 他对财富和复仇的许诺让 这个极具魅力的领导人已经组织起了一支军队并随时准备着向反对他的人进军.\n人们会预料这只军队的长远目标是夺回德里苏丹国的王位，我们今天却收到了舍尔沙军营的最后通牒. 上面写着要么我们主动放弃王位,让他接管国家,否则他会带着剑来自己夺取.

original: If you want my throne you'll have to fight for it.
translation: 你想要我的王位就尽管放马过来吧.

original: (Sher Shah will start with low legitimacy)

It has recently come to our attention that the Hindu holder of one of the largest estates in our Sultanate has been plotting with our enemies in Orissa. The estate is a very old entity known as the kingdom of Bhurshut and it predates Muslim rule in India.
translation: 最近我们注意到我们苏丹国里最大的印度教领主正在和奥里萨阴谋勾结. 他的古老领地在穆斯林统治之前被称为布尔修特王国.

original: An ambassador representing the interests of the English East India Company arrived in our court today requesting to be allowed to set up a permanent settlement in the Ganges delta in order to facilitate the trade connections between us and the west.\nAs can be expected of a trader he is prepared to pay for this privilege.
translation: 一个代表英国东印度公司的外交官今日来到我们的宫廷，请求在恒河三角洲建立起一个永久领地，以此来加强我们和西方的贸易联系.\n正如预料之中他打算花钱购买这一特权.

original: Grant them a few villages in the delta.
translation: 赐予他们几个三角洲地区的村子.

original: The villages we once granted to the western traders have grown into a major trade port known as Calcutta. While the economy of the city is booming and the entire region prospers because of it there is reason to be concerned.\nDue to the great economic influence the European traders they are more and more seen as the real authority of the entire area, not just of the city itself. The local commander has begun constructing a number of new forts to protect the city without asking our permission and our demands that construction cease have been met by silence.
translation: 我们曾经给予西方商人的村庄如今成长为一个被称作加尔各答的重要商埠。虽然这座城市的经济蓬勃发展，整个地区也因而欣欣向荣，我们仍有理由担忧。\n由于欧洲商人巨大的经济影响，他们越来越多地被视为整个地区真正的当局，而不光是该城市本身的。当地指挥官已经在未征求我们许可的情况下开始建造一些新堡垒来保护城市，而对我们要求停止建设也报以沉默。

original: The soldiers we sent to Calcutta promptly reduced the new forts and imprisoned the westerners they found inside. As the prisoners then returned to their respective mother countries, however, this incident seems to have grown out of all proportion.\nAmong the freed a story has begun to circulate about a terrible dungeon known as the Black Hole of Calcutta. According to the story the vast majority of the prisoners died due to the horrible conditions they had to endure there. Our local commander assures us that this is not true but that is of little consequence. The English East India traders are doing their utmost to convince their mother country to 'restore order' in our kingdom.
translation: 我们派过去的士兵迅速地攻占了新堡垒并囚禁了里面的西方人. 这些囚犯接下来被遣返回自己国内，然而这个事件似乎做得太过火了.\n在释放的同时一个关于一个叫做加尔各答黑洞的恐怖地牢的故事传播了开来. 根据故事所说，许多囚犯由于他们在忍受那里的恶劣环境而死亡. 当地指挥官向我们保证这绝对不是真的，但效果微乎甚微. 东印度公司正在竭尽全力来说服他们的祖国插手在我们王国内'恢复秩序'.

original: A story of heinous deeds has reached us from the far away city of Calcutta. It appears that an English settlement there has been attacked by the local ruler. The traders and soldiers in Calcutta are then reported to have suffered the horrible faith of being thrown into an infamous dungeon known as the 'Black Hole of Calcutta'.\nEver since news reached us we have been besieged by India merchants urging us to act now and restore order in this barbaric part of the world.
translation: 我们听闻了从加尔各答传来的骇人行为. 看起来当地统治者袭击了一个英国定居点. 加尔各答的商人和士兵都声称惧怕被关入那个被称为'加尔各答黑洞'的恶名昭著的地牢.\n自从我们听到那消息我们就被印度商人围得水泄不通，他们要求我们马上做出反应，在这个野蛮的地区恢复秩序.

original: Our capital is as extravagant as it's well guarded.
translation: 我们的首都极度奢华，而且被严密保护着.

original: We are currently campaigning harder than ever to convince talented Muslim commanders, merchants and administrators to come to our country and seek their fortune here.
translation: 我们目前正在竭尽全力来说服才华横溢的穆斯林指挥官，商人和管理者来我们国家寻求财富。

original: An increasing number of our forts are manned by loyal Habshi slaves as these can be relied upon to remain loyal to the throne rather than the factions at court.
translation: 数目不断增加的堡垒被忠诚的Habshi控制，就好像他们能对王位效忠而不是在宫廷里内讧一样.

original: Our court remains polarized between the Deccani and Gharbian factions. We are trying to stabilize the situation by alternating our support for the groups but there are still undeniable tensions that make the day to day running of the country a lot harder.
translation: 我们的宫廷由于Deccani与Gharbian两派的斗争而两极分化严重. 我们正在试图通过改变我们支持的派别来稳定局势，但是局势始终保持紧张，使国家的运转变得越来越困难.

original: We are supporting the Gharbian faction at court, in return we are getting a steady influx of new adventurers from the western Muslim countries.
translation: 我们正在宫廷中支持Gharbian派别，作为回报我们得到了西方穆斯林国家冒险家的稳定流入.

original: We are supporting the Deccani faction at court, in return our provinces have become a lot calmer and easier to control.
translation: 我们正在宫廷中支持Deccani派别，作为回报我们的省份稳定度上升且更容易控制了.

original: The artisans of Bidar have invented a new kind of metal handicraft known as Bidriware. This has presently revitalized the local economy.
translation: 比德尔的工匠发明了一种叫做Bidriware的新手工艺品. 目前这使当地经济得到了复苏.

original: Bidar, a true capital for the Bahmanis
translation: 比德尔，巴赫曼尼实际意义上的首都

original: Tired of the constant intrigues and the poisonous atmosphere in Gulbarga one of the first decisions undertaken by $MONARCH$ in his youth was to move the capital of the Bahmani kingdom to Bidar. On the site of an old fort squarely in the middle of the Deccan plateau an entirely new capital has been built, a magnificent city comparable to the great cities of Persia and Transoxiana. With its 37 bastions and 7 gates Bidar is also an impressive fort and the foremost defense of our dynasty.\nBuilt to impress the royal court itself, it is no less awe-inspiring and the audience hall with the Turquoise throne of our dynasty is perhaps the most renowned symbol of our family.\nNone of this comes cheap of course. Our vizier contacted us today with a list of things in need of urgent attention and another list of areas which we would be wise to continue to develop.
translation: 厌倦了尔伯加各种阴谋诡计和险恶的气氛，$MONARCH$ 在他年轻时作出的第一个决定便是将巴赫曼尼首都迁至比德尔. 在德干高原中央一个古老堡垒的原址上，一个全新的首都正在被建成，一座能与波斯和河中地区大城市媲美的意义非凡的城市. 在37座堡垒和7扇大门的保护下，比德尔同时也是一座坚固的要塞，是我们王朝最牢固的防御.\n建造得令王室称奇已经能说明它的雄伟，青绿色王位的大殿更是我们家族最出名的象征.\n当然这一切可都不便宜. 今天我们的大臣给我们带来了两份清单，一份列出了我们所需要密切关注的情况，另一份则列出了我们最好坚持发展的省份.

original: Bidar must remain a capital worthy of our dynasty.
translation: 比德尔最好是一个配得上我们王朝的首都.

original: Let us not go overboard with this.

The Bahmani Sultanate is in many ways a colonial state. The Deccan had only been under Muslim control for 20 years when our ancestors threw off the imperialist yoke of Delhi. The vast majority of our subjects are Hindu Marathas, Kannadigas and Telugus.\nWith northern India closed to us by the Delhi Sultans for so long we have had to rely on oversea immigration directly from Persia and the Arab world to fill the needs of our state.\nOur dynasty has therefore always spent much energy trying to attract able and learned men to what has become a rather cosmopolitan kingdom. Since we lost control of the western coast, however, it seems this stream of able people has been transformed into a trickle. If we want to avert a serious crisis we must double our efforts to lure all men of quality here despite the risks.
translation: 巴赫曼尼苏丹国在各种意义上是一个殖民地国家. 德干摆脱德里的君主奴役并由穆斯林统治不过才20年. 最主要的统治者是印度马拉塔人，卡纳达人和泰卢固人.\n由于北印度的德里苏丹国对我们关闭了边界，一直以来我们不得不依赖从海外的波斯和阿拉伯国家的移民来满足我们的国家需要.\n因此我们王朝总是要花费更多的精力来吸引那些有能力且受过教育的人来我们这个已然世界化的王国. 由于我们失去了对西海岸的控制，人才流入的涓涓细流如今也变为间断的点点滴滴. 如果我们想要避免严重的危机，尽管冒着风险，我们还是需要加倍努力来吸引一切可能的人才.

original: Let us make more use of the local expertise.
translation: 我们应该更充分地利用当地的专业人才.

original: Today a Persian merchant named Mahmud Gawan arrived in $CAPITAL$ seeking an audience. Given the chance to introduce himself he explains that he is exactly the kind of person our kingdom needs. Apart from his personal qualities as a trader and administrator he says that he has a network of contacts all over the Muslim world from which we might benefit.\nMahmud Gawan promises that if we give him the means to do it he will make our economy flourish and our kingdom so famous that everyone will flock to our shores to serve us.
translation: 今天有个叫马茂德 加万的波斯商人来到了 $CAPITAL$ ，他有话要说. 在允许他自我介绍后他解释说他正是我们王国所需要的人才. 除开他本身商人和管理者的才能外，他说他在整个穆斯林世界有巨大的人脉网络，我们可能能够从中获得好处.\n马茂德 加万保证说如果我们能支持他去做他想做的事，他能够让我们的经济飞黄腾达，让我们国家闻名海外，让每个人都迫不及待地爬上我们的海岸为我们服务.

original: This is truly the Prince of Merchants!
translation: 这才是真正的商人王子!

original: Slaves is one of the oldest commodities of the Indian Ocean trade network. Ethiopian youths are being captured, converted to Islam and trained to become elite soldiers, administrators and sailors before being sold to rulers in India and Persia.\nAs our kingdom has a distinct shortage of men that are both able and loyal these 'Habshis' might prove a valuable asset to our dynasty. Let us use these slaves to man our forts, our desks and our ships rather than trust the bickering Gharbian and Deccani factions at court.
translation: 奴隶是印度海岸贸易网里最古老的商品. 埃塞俄比亚年轻人被捕获，被送往伊斯兰教国家，在被售往印度和波斯前被训练成精英战士，管理者和航海家.\n考虑到我们王国严重匮乏这些既忠诚又有能力的'Habshis'，他们可能会成为我们王朝的一笔重要的财富. 让我们用这些努力来建造要塞，打造我们的桌子和战船，总比寄希望于宫廷里内斗的Gharbian和Deccani好.

original: Start large scale importation of Habshis
Let us try to find another way.
translation: 让我们想想别的办法吧.

original: Our policy of constant outside recruitment has had its drawbacks. Known as 'Deccanis', second and third generation Bahmani nobles together with the remaining part of the old Hindu nobility are increasingly becoming a strong faction at court advocating the indigenization of our Sultanate. Against them stand the new immigrants from the west, the 'Gharbians', who have come to seek a fortune in the rich lands of India.\nThe court is by now quite polarized between the two and lately they even have to be kept separated in our audience chamber and at royal ceremonies.
translation: 我们目前对外的征募遇到了挫败. 被称为'Deccanis'，这些第二第三代的巴赫曼尼贵族和那些残余的印度旧贵族在宫廷内已经发展为一个强大的派系，他们提倡将我们苏丹本地化。与他们相对立的是从西方来的移民，也被称为'Gharbians'，他们回来在这印度富有的大地上寻求财富。\n宫廷现在由于这两派两极化严重， 而且最近他们在觐见室和王室庆典和上也分成两派。

original: Attempt to play them off against each other.
translation: 试图在他们互相斗争两败俱伤时获利.

original: A new kind of metal handicraft has developed in the shops of Bidar. This new style has spread quickly among the Persian artisans in the city and has become a famous export of our capital.
translation: 一种新的金属手工艺品在比德尔的商店里出现了. 这种新式手工艺品很快风靡于波斯城市工匠，并成为我们首都最出名的出口商品.

original: A very special delivery arrived today from the diamond mines of Kollur. The diamond is the biggest anyone at the diamond markets of Golconda have ever seen and it was thought only proper that it be presented to the $MONARCHTITLE$ directly.
translation: 今天从可拉矿山运来了一个特别的货物. 这颗钻石比戈尔康达钻石市场任何人见过的都要大以至于大家都认为将它直接送给$MONARCHTITLE$比较合适.

original: A traveler from a faraway country arrived at our court today. Impressed by our hospitality and the splendor of capital he offers stories of those of our neighbors that he has visited. He also tells tales of the far away country from which he started his journey, of a city named 'Tver' and a land of long and cold winters.
translation: 今天一个从遥远国度来的旅游者抵达了我们宫廷。 被我们的热情好客和富丽堂皇的首都所惊讶之余，他向我们讲述了他曾造访过的我们邻国的故事。 他也讲了他所来自的遥远国度，那个名为特维尔的城市与那片拥有漫长而又寒冷冬季的土地的传说。

original: A system of walls, gates and over 170 bastions protects the city of Ahmadabad from invaders while it at the same time affords the city place to continue its meteoric growth.
translation: 城墙，城门，和170余座堡垒构成的系统将侵略者抵挡在艾哈迈达巴德之外，同时也为城市持续飞速发展提供了保障

original: We are currently spending quite freely on the construction of a second capital on the hilly border of the Gujarat region.
translation: 我们目前正在花费巨资在古吉拉特地区多山的边境建造我们第二个首都.

original: This is the site of our secondary capital, the great fort city of Champaner.
translation: 这是我们第二首都的地点，尚潘纳，一座宏伟的要塞城市.

original: Our Merchant community is doing very well right now.
translation: 我们的商人社区目前做得非常好.

original: After a period of laxness we have now enforced religious law in our realm and adopted a much harsher policy on non-Muslims.
translation: 在一段时期的弛缓后我们现在将在我们领土上推行一项宗教法律，并对非穆斯林采取更加严厉的政策.

original: Our capital Ahmadabad has been growing rapidly ever since it was founded in 1411 and it seems unlikely this will ebb out any time soon. The close proximity of Khambat, one of the greatest ports in India and according to some the busiest port in the world ensures a constant stream of people, goods and capital.\nSuch a rapidly growing city is, however, hard to defend effectively, especially given its position in the middle of the Gujarat plains. Some say we ought to take a more active part in the planning of the city and not only focus on how to adorn it. The system of walls and bastions suggested by our architects may seem staggering but the alternative is a capital almost without defenses.
translation: 我们的首都艾哈迈达巴德在1411年它建立起迅速地发展着，而且看上去它在短时间内不大可能会衰落. 临近坎贝，印度最大的一个港口之一，并与其他世界上最繁忙的港口紧密联系保证其能得到稳定的人员，货物，资金流入.\n然而，这样高速发展的一个城市却难以有效地保护自己，尤其是当它坐落于古吉拉特平原的中央时. 有些人认为我们应该在城市规划中投入得更多，而不是一昧地关注于如何去装饰它. 我们建筑师建议的城墙和堡垒构成的防御体系看上去虽然很惊艳，但是换句话来说其实是让我们的首都完全失去防御能力.

original: Better to let the city remain an open capital.
translation: 最好还是让这个城市保持开放.

original: Champaner fort lies in a very strategically viable position in the centre of the mountains right between the Malwa Plateau and the plains of Gujarat. In addition to its defensible position it is also ideally situated to control the trade route between the Doab and the oceanic ports in our land.\n$MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ has deviced a very ambitious plan for transforming the fort of Champaner into a new grand secondary capital of our kingdom. As a symbol of our dynasty the construction would be overseen by the best architects of the Indo-Islamic world and no expense would be spared.
translation: 尚潘纳要塞坐落于古吉拉特平原与马尔瓦高原之间的群山中，是一个极具战略意义的位置. 除了易守难攻之外，它也巧妙地控制了我们领土上Doab与海洋港口之间的贸易线路.\n$MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ 已经提交了一份野心勃勃的计划试图将尚潘纳要塞改造为我国的首都. 作为我们王朝的一个标志，首都的建设将会在印度伊斯兰世界最好的工程师的监管下进行，同时每一分钱都会落在实处，绝不会有浪费.

original: We have no interest in this vanity project.
translation: 我们对这个华而不实的计划不感兴趣。

original: The city of Champaner has been lost to us and with it our dreams of the perfect capital.
translation: 尚潘纳以及我们完美首都的幻想都没有了.
布尔汗努丁库特博-埃陵墓

original: One of the Sufi masters residing in our capital has become ever more outspoken in his support of our dynasty lately. It is clear to many now that we are steering the kingdom in a good direction and the effect of these statements on the public mood has been very positive.
translation: 居住在我们首都的一个苏菲派领袖最近直言不讳地表明了对我们王朝的支持和肯定. 很显然我们王国正在朝着一个良好的方向前进，这些发言对公众情绪起到极大的正面作用.

original: The Jain and Hindu Merchant Community - Vasanta Vilasa
translation: 耆那教和印度教商人协会 - Vasanta Vilasa

original: The well being of the merchants of Gujarat has always been close to the heart of our dynasty and we have come to not only tolerate but also in many ways encourage the Jain, Hindu or Parsi traders that do business in our cities.\nAs a result business has been very good for merchants of all religions in Gujarat lately. In a recently completed manuscript about the rites of spring and the god Krishna a prominent Hindu merchant of Ahmadabad has taken the opportunity to praise the city and its rulers.\nPerhaps this more than anything is a sign of the success of our policies.
translation: 古吉拉特商人的富裕永远是我们王朝的重要利益，因此我们也在很大程度上允许，甚至可以说鼓励，耆那教和印度教，或是波斯商人在我们城市里做生意.\n结果是近来古吉拉特里各个宗教的商人都获得了利益. 在最近刚完成的一份手稿关于春日仪式和克利须那神的手稿中，一个艾哈迈达巴德的印度教商人趁机赞扬了这个城市及其统治者.\n也许没有什么能比这更能称作是我们政策成功的表现了.

original: Blasphemy! Clearly our laws have become too lax.
translation: 渎神! 显然我们的法律变得太过宽松了.

original: An Embassy to the Ottoman Sultan
translation: 一个前往奥斯曼帝国的使者

original: In a dangerous world it is sometimes good to have contacts that can protect you. With the arrival of the Portuguese in the Indian Ocean it seems uncertain if anyone can be safe at sea anymore. We have received repeated reports of shipping being raided by Christian ships lately. These pirates threaten the trade that our Sultanate lives from and must be stopped.\nIt has recently come to our attention that the Ottoman Empire, distant as it may be, has acquired ports in the red sea. Perhaps it would be wise to contact the Sultan of Constantinople to discuss a possible alliance against these Christian pirates?
translation: 在这个危险的世界里，通过外交来保证自身的安全有时还是很好的. 由于葡萄牙人来到了印度洋，现在谁也不能保证在海上的安全了. 最近我们总收到货物被基督教船只掠夺的报告. 这些海盗威胁到了我们伊斯兰国的经济来源，我们必须阻止他们.\n最近我们注意到奥斯曼帝国，尽管离我们很遥远，在红海得到了港口. 或许去接触君士坦丁堡的苏丹来讨论结盟对抗基督教海盗是个明智的选择？

original: Send an emissary to the Sublime Porte.
We will manage fine in our own.
Time to get involved in the Indian Ocean?

An emissary from the far away Gujarati Sultanate arrived at court today. The Sultan of Gujarat sends word that he has been plagued by Portuguese pirates and that these ships are threatening the stream of oriental goods from flowing east into our lands. The Portuguese have also been preventing the Indian faithful from reaching Mecca and Medina, a journey that starts in Gujarat for many.\nGujarat may be far away but we could surely send them something to help them in their struggle.
translation: 一个遥远的古吉拉特苏丹派遣来的使者今天来到了我们的宫廷。古吉拉特苏丹表示他已经被葡萄牙海盗骚扰已久，而且这些船只已经威胁到了东方货物流入他们的国家。这些葡萄牙人也阻碍了印度信徒们前往麦加和麦地那，对大多数人来说这一旅途始于古吉拉特。\n古吉拉特虽然离我们很远，但是我们还是可以给他们送点什么来帮助他们。

original: We must stand strong with our brothers in faith!
translation: 我们必须为我们的朋友挺身而出！

original: India? We have matters to attend to much closer than that.
translation: 印度？ 我们还有别的更重要的事情得处理呢。

original: The Ottoman sultan has sent us word that he sympathies deeply with our wish to be free from the Portuguese threat. In order to help us defend ourselves he has sent a number of ships and Ottoman naval officers, both which might benefit our kingdom in a future struggle against the Portuguese.
translation: 奥斯曼苏丹表示他很同情我们受葡萄牙侵扰的遭遇。为了让我们能够更好地保护自己他给我们派遣来了一些船只和海军将领，这将有利于我们在未来与葡萄牙的艰难斗争。

original: Unfortunately it seems the Sultan feels less strongly than we do about a unified front against these Christian pirates and he has sent word that he is not interested in any oriental adventures.
translation: 不幸的是苏丹似乎对联合起来对抗基督教海盗并没有太大兴趣，因此他表示不打算插手这些东方事务.

original: Ahmad Kattu, Sufi master and supporter of our family has passed away. This great man has acted as an advisor for more than one generation of Gujarati Sultans and once took part in the planning of the great city of Ahmadabad. This loss leaves a great spiritual void in our kingdom and our dynasty will be forever in his debt.
translation: Ahmad Kattu，苏菲派领导人，也是我们家族坚定的支持者，已经去世了. 这位伟大的人为不止一位古吉拉特苏丹担任顾问，也参与了我们伟大城市艾哈迈达巴德的建造计划. 他的逝去给我们王国留下了一个巨大的精神空缺，我们王朝永远亏欠于他.

original: We must construct a magnificent mausoleum to honor this great man.
translation: 我们得修建一座陵墓来纪念这个伟人.

original: This is a great loss for the kingdom.
Qissa-i Sanjan - The Parsee Community of Gujarat
translation: 桑加的故事 - 古吉拉特的祆教徒集聚区

original: Many hundred years ago a group of Zoroastrian refugees from Persia settled down in Gujarat, founding the Parsee community of Sanjan. Through the centuries this religious minority has proved resilient and has taken an active part in the development of this dynamic region.\nRecently a Parsee priest has recorded the oral historical tradition of the Parsees, from their exodus from Persia in the 10th century up to today. The resulting Qissa-i Sanjan is surely a classical example of high class Persian poetry but it is above all a story that will be treasured by the Parsees themselves for generations to come.
translation: 在几百年前，一群来自波斯的祆教难民在古吉拉特定居了下来，并在桑加建立了祆教集聚区。好几个世纪以来，这个少数派宗教被证明是极具恢复力的，并在这个不断变化的地区中扮演了重要的角色。\n最近一个祆教神父以口头传授的形式记录下了祆教的历史传统，从他们于10世纪逃出波斯一直到现在。《桑加故事》的形成显然就是波斯人高等诗歌艺术的经典例子并将会被祆教徒世世代代所铭记。

original: The Gujarat Sultanate has a rich tradition of historical writing and over the year many court historians have received the patronage of our dynasty. The recently completed Mirat-i-Sikandiri by Shaikh Sikandar ibn Muhammad Manjhu is not only an excellent example of this but also tries to incorporate all previous writings on its subject. The resulting work is a detailed chronicle over the history of the Sultanate of Gujarat from its creation up until today.
translation: 古吉拉特苏丹国拥有编撰历史书籍的优良传统，多年以来，许多历史学家都受到了本朝的资助。最近由Shaikh Sikandar ibn Muhammad Manjhu完成的著作Mirat-i-Sikandiri不仅仅是其中一个绝佳的例子，它囊括了前人的记载。这份著作是一份详尽的古吉拉特苏丹国编年史，详尽地记载了迄今为止古吉拉特苏丹国的历史。
为敌人的贵族提供庇护
为了土地而加入我们联盟
为了信仰而加入我们联盟
在封锁期间没有进行援助

original: The lack of state support during the time the city was under blockade caused the population to mistrust their rulers.
translation: 由于在封锁期间城市缺少来自国家的援助，人们开始不信任他们的统治者.

original: Many Scots serve in our armies as soldiers of fortune, increasing our potential reliance on such troops.
translation: 有很多苏格兰人作为雇佣兵为我们效力，潜在地增加了我们对这样一支军队的依赖性.

original: Religious dissidents have taken refuge here and begun to fortify in preparation of defense or revolt.
translation: 这里宗教意见的分歧导致了难民的产生并促使了叛乱的滋生.

original: The ruler was educated by Jesuits and cannot abide by heresies or heretics.
translation: 统治者接受的是耶稣会的教育，也因此无法被异教徒所接受.

original: When our capital fell, nobles felt threatened and fled the country, taking refuge in neighboring nations of our faith.
translation: 当我们的首都沦陷时，贵族们感受到了威胁并纷纷出逃，逃亡与我们有相同信仰的国家避难.
特兰西瓦尼亚的黄金时代

original: Our skilled monarch and investments to our capital have ushered in a golden age for our nation.
translation: 我们优秀的君主和对首都的投资为我们国家开启了一个黄金时代。

original: Our successes in the League war have convinced many that God is on our side and fights for our nation.
translation: 我们在联盟战争中的胜利是很多人相信上帝是站在我们这边，为我们战斗的.

original: Our setbacks in the League war have convinced many that God wants us to make peace and lose hope for victory.
translation: 我们在联盟战争中遭遇的挫折让很多人认为上帝希望见到和平，因此才夺取我们胜利的希望.
因为土地而在这个联盟里

original: We have made our intentions clear to take land in the League war, and that religious concerns are secondary.
translation: 我们已经摆明了我们想在这个联盟战争中得到土地的目的，宗教方面的考虑是次要的.
因为信仰而在这个联盟里

original: We have made it clear that we have joined the League War to fight for the survival of the true faith.
translation: 我们已经明确地表示了我们参加这个联盟战争是因为真理的存亡.

original: As Emperor, we may have to accept that some of our subjects fall to heresy to avoid internal conflict. The ruler dictates the religion of the realm, after all. We may not afford to be so lenient with ecclesiastical principalities, however. One of the Prince-Bishops who rule in the Holy Roman Empire appears to have abandoned the Church and listened to the lies of the Protestants, risking not only his own soul, but those of all his subjects. Thanks to the ecclesiastical reservation, we reserve the right to force him to resign in the event of betrayal like this.
translation: 作为一个皇帝，我们不得不容忍一些国民沦为异教徒来避免国内动乱。毕竟是统治者来规定一片领域上的宗教。不过，我们可不能对基督教公国那么仁慈。一个在神圣罗马帝国统治的采邑主教似乎抛弃了教会并听从新教徒的谎言，不仅将自己的灵魂，还将他的臣民的灵魂置于危险之中。幸好有教会保留规定，我们有权在他做出这样的背叛之举时强迫他下台。

original: Enforce it! A good Catholic will take his place.
translation: 实行！一个优秀的天主教徒将会顶替他的位置。

original: Send word to the [This.Monarch.GetTitle] of [This.GetName]. We will know his response in two weeks' time.
translation: 给[This.GetName]的[This.Monarch.GetTitle]发出信件。我们会在两周内得到他的答复。

original: It would cause too much trouble.

[Root.Monarch.GetName]'s conversion to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith appears to have angered Emperor [From.Monarch.GetName]. [From.GetName] is now claiming to enforce the Reservatum Ecclesiasticum, a measure that forces [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]s within the Empire to give up their titles if they convert from Catholicism. The reservation is not supported among Protestants in the Empire, and perhaps it would lose some of its authority if genuinely contested.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对[Root.Religion.GetName]信念的转变似乎触怒了皇帝[From.Monarch.GetName]。[From.GetName]现在宣布要推行教会保留，这是项强迫全帝国内所有[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]如果不再信奉天主教就放弃其头衔的规定。这项保留规定在帝国内受到新教徒的反对，而且如果他们真的为之斗争的话这项规定的权威性也许会被削弱。

original: Never! There is salvation outside the Church!
translation: 休想！教会以外也能有救赎！

original: To our surprise and outrage, [From.Monarch.GetName] of [From.GetName] has refused to accept the validity of the ecclesiastical reservation as we interpret it, claiming that evoking it is proof of tyranny on our part. If we wish to save the souls of the [From.GetAdjective] people, it appears we have to enforce the true faith ourselves.
translation: 使我们震惊并感到愤怒的是，[From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetName]拒绝接受教会保留的合法性，宣称这是我们暴虐专横的证据。如果我们想要挽救[From.GetAdjective]人民的灵魂，我们只能通过自己的手段来贯彻真理了。

original: The [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of [From.GetName] has wisely accepted our enforcement of the ecclesiastical reservation and resigned in favor of the Catholic [From.Monarch.GetName]. We have also demonstrated that the Holy Roman Empire stays true to its name and that we expect our religious leaders, if not all princes, remain on the true path or give their title to one who does.
translation: [From.GetName]的[From.Monarch.GetTitle]聪明地接受了我们推行的教会保留规定并为了[From.Monarch.GetName]天主教的未来而辞职了。我们同时也强调了神圣罗马帝国始终是与其名一致的，我们希望我们的宗教领袖们，如果不都是亲王的话，坚定自己的信仰，要不就把自己的头衔给那些信仰坚定的人。

original: The people of [Root.GetCapitalName] rely heavily on their port to supply the city with what it needs, but the blockade against [Root.GetName] has cut off both many luxuries and some goods they claim are necessary to run the city. The people can hardly make do with [Root.GetTradeGoodsName] alone, and are turning to the [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle] to find a solution.
translation: [Root.GetCapitalName]的老百姓的日常供给皆经由港口输入。然而，由于[Root.GetName]的港口被封锁，许多奢侈品和他们所宣称的「日常用品」都断了来源。仅靠[Root.GetTradeGoodsName]，人们难以为继，于是他们便来到[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetTitle]面前，要求能有个解决方案。

original: Divert resources to get goods delivered via land routes.
translation: 转移资源以从陆地路线运送货物。

original: Employ our network of privateers to smuggle the goods in.
translation: 雇佣我们的走私者网络来将货物走私进去。

original: War is hard on everyone. They will have to make do.
translation: 战争让谁都不好受。他们必须得忍耐。

original: Mysterious phenomena on the night sky have often been interpreted as bad omens or signs of the end times. An exceptionally noticeable such phenomenon, a great comet, has been visible recently, causing more of a stir than usual.\n\n$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$, however, has taken the opportunity to closely observe the comet's movements. The result has been a scientific work that tells us much about the object's distance from us and dispels many old superstitions about comets. While it appears uncertain if commoners will remember this in the future, this comet has provided more insight than fear.
translation: 夜空中的神秘现象一向被认为是世界末日的凶兆。一个像巨大的彗星这样格外显眼的现象近期被人们所目击，造成了不小的混乱。\n\n然而$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$抓住了这近距离观察彗星运动的极好机会。最终得出了一份科学报告，其中记述了许多离我们无比遥远的物体并推翻了许多关于彗星的古老迷信。虽然很难讲平民们以后还会不会记得这些，然而这颗彗星带来的更多是对自然事物的洞察而不是恐惧。

original: The tragic passing of the previous [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has left [Root.Heir.GetName] without a parent, but not without guardians or tutors. Advisors serving at our court are preoccupied with giving [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] the best education available in preparation of ruling [Root.GetName]. Hoping to gain favor and influence in the future, many people try to serve as a primary influence. Ultimately, one of them is likely to succeed, impacting what sort of ruler [Root.Heir.GetName] will turn out to be.
translation: 先前[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]灾难性的经过已经导致[Root.Heir.GetName]失去了父母中的一人，但是护卫队和私人教师还在。效力于我们宫廷的顾问们不得不提前忙于为[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]提供最好的教育，这是为了统治[Root.GetName]而做的准备。抱着在未来受到宠爱或获得影响力的希望，人们纷纷前来试图担任教师一职。最终他们中的一人将会胜出，并将决定[Root.Heir.GetName]以后会成为一个什么样的统治者。

original: An advisor working in the administrative division will provide the best education.
translation: 一个在行政部门工作的顾问将会提供最好的教育。

original: A diplomatic mind is necessary to teach and to rule [Root.GetName].
translation: 外交远见对于统治[Root.GetName]必不可少。

original: Warfare must be the primary concern of a future [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 战争对于未来的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将会是一个重要的顾虑。

original: Although Scotland has so far managed to stay out of the religious conflicts in the Holy Roman Empire, it is not for lack of interest. We are keenly aware that this war will impact all of Europe and are not without diplomatic stake in the outcome. Although Scotland may not be willing to go to war for a League, many Scots are. Serving as mercenaries in foreign armies on the continent, they may well change the course of the war without our direct involvement.
translation: 虽然苏格兰长久以来设法将自己置身于神圣罗马帝国的宗教冲突之外，他们倒不是对此毫无兴趣。我们的急切地意识到这场战争将会波及整个欧洲，而且也必将导致外交局势发生改变。尽管苏格兰可能不会愿意作为联盟的一员参与战争，但是许多苏格兰人是愿意的。在这块大陆上作为外国军队的佣兵，他们很可能能够在我们不必直接干预的情况下改变整个战争局势。

original: Send them to fight for the Evangelical League.
translation: 派遣他们为基督新教联盟而战。

original: Send them to fight for the Catholic League.
translation: 派遣他们为天主教联盟而战。

original: We need all the troops we can muster right here.
translation: 我们需要将尽可能多的军队召集在这里。

original: Mercenaries from Scotland have begun to join our ranks in large numbers. Reports indicate that our allies are also seeing many of them arriving to join the righteous in our efforts to finish the religious struggles in the Holy Roman Empire once and for all. Although their nation is not joining us in the war, the Scots appear to be willing to fight for our League, for the right price.
translation: 大多数苏格兰雇佣兵已经开始加入我们的行列。报告显示我们的盟友也在寻求他们来加入我们正义的一方，来一劳永逸地完成神圣罗马帝国的宗教目标。虽然他们国家没有在战争中加入我们，苏格兰人似乎很乐意为我们的联盟而战，当然是以一个合适的价格。

original: Then we shall be willing to pay it.
translation: 我们将会很乐意付这笔钱。
匈牙利人起义反抗哈布斯堡王朝统治

original: The Hungarian people of [Root.GetName] have begun to see the religious conflict in the Empire as one between them and the Habsburgs who rule [Root.Owner.GetName]. When war rages between Protestant and Catholic kings and emperors, they claim that the people must take up arms to protect their faith as well. As if the ongoing war was not enough, we must now grapple with these troublemakers in lands that should long since have accepted being ruled by the Habsburg dynasty.
translation: [Root.GetName]的匈牙利人民已经开始将帝国内的宗教冲突视为他们与统治[Root.Owner.GetName]的哈布斯堡王朝之间的冲突。当新教与天主教国王皇帝之间的战争开始时，他们宣称人民也应当拿起武器来保护他们自己的信仰。好像正在进行中的战争还不够似的，我们现在还得与我们领土内的本应顺从哈布斯堡王朝统治的骚乱者们作斗争。
我们的敌人四处散布谣言。
匈牙利人聚集在拉罗舍尔

original: The wars of religion may be over, but the religious conflicts in France are not. The Huguenot heretics, claiming to be concerned about their right to practice their faith under the rule of [Root.Monarch.GetName], have started to prepare for what might very well be open revolt. Although they have not gone that far yet, they have gathered in the city of La Rochelle and started to fortify its defensive structures. Their exact intentions are not clear, but the more rebellious among them claim that they will create an independent state, breaking free from French and Catholic rule.
translation: 这场宗教战争虽说是结束了，但是在法兰西内的宗教冲突还没有。匈牙利异教徒，声称担心在[Root.Monarch.GetName]的统治下会难以贯彻其信仰，已经开始酝酿着起义叛乱。虽然他们目前还到不了那一步，他们已经聚集在拉罗舍尔城内并开始加固其防御工事。他们的具体目的暂时还不清楚，但是他们之中的叛逆分子称他们将打造一个独立国家，脱离法兰西人和天主教的统治。

original: If this continues, we may just turn out to be as ruthless as they claim us to be.
translation: 如果这再继续下去，我们可能真会像他们所说的那样残忍。
匈牙利叛军需要我们的帮助

original: Although [Root.GetName] is now free from the tyranny of the Catholic Church, many suffer the same oppression abroad. The Huguenots in France have found it necessary to build fortifications in preparation of the terrors the French regime no doubt are willing to visit upon them.\n\nAs true as the faith of these brave people might be, it is doubtful if they have the means to resist the power of the French army. However, with the backing of the [Root.GetAdjective] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], anything is possible.
translation: 虽然[Root.GetName]现在已经摆脱了天主教教会的专横统治，但还有很多人在海外受到压迫。法兰西的胡格诺派教徒认为很有必要修建堡垒来预防必将到来的法兰西政权的威胁。\n\n尽管他们的确很勇敢，他们有没有办法来抵御法兰西军队的力量还有待考证。然而，有[Root.GetAdjective][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在背后支持，什么事都有可能办到。

original: Tell them to strike against the French, and we will follow!
translation: 让他们进攻法兰西，我们会紧随其后！

original: We would rather not draw the wrath of France.
translation: 我们还是别惹恼法兰西为妙。

original: The Huguenot dissidents who gathered in La Rochelle, previously showing at least some caution, have been emboldened by the support of the [From.GetAdjective] [From.Monarch.GetTitle]. Apparently the treacherous heretics in [From.GetName] have seen it fit not only to spread their lies to France, but to spark fires here as well. Whether or not they will honor their promise, the Huguenots are now in open revolt.
translation: 聚集在拉罗舍尔先前表现出些许警觉的反抗军得到了来自[From.GetAdjective][From.Monarch.GetTitle]的支持而大受鼓舞。显然在[From.GetName]的狡猾的异端不仅在法兰西散布谣言，在这里也开始煽风点火。不管他们会不会坚守诺言，胡格诺派教徒已经开始公开起义了。

original: Enemies of France will pay for this, in La Rochelle as well as in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 法兰西的敌人会付出代价的，不管是在拉罗舍尔还是在[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]。

original: Prague has been home to many kings and even emperors and is a city with many legacies within it. With today's capture by [Root.GetAdjective] troops, there is certainly a temptation to bring some of the city's treasures back to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and claim them for our own. With some rare artifacts being peerless in the known world, this may be our only chance to get our hands on them... but hardly without drawing the anger of Prague's citizens.
translation: 布拉格曾是许多国王甚至是皇帝的家园，它同时也是一个有着众多传奇的城市。在今天被[Root.GetAdjective]的军队攻陷后，当然有将这个城市的一些珍宝带回[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]并占为己有的诱惑。这里有世界上无与伦比的罕见艺术品，这可能会是我们亲手摸到它们的唯一机会了… 不过这么做显然会招致布拉格市民的愤怒。

original: Bring these to our capital! That is how legacies are built.
translation: 把这些带回我们的首都！这将会是一段传奇的开始。
阿尔布雷希特·冯·瓦伦斯坦

original: A noble of the House of Waldstein has emerged as a talented general amidst the religious conflicts in the Holy Roman Empire. Hailing from Bohemia, Wallenstein proved his loyalty to the emperor early in the war. He has already begun to provide insights and innovation both on the larger and smaller scale of warfare and will, we hope, continue to be a valuable asset in our efforts to restore faith and order to the Empire.
translation: 瓦尔德施泰因家族的一个贵族在神圣罗马帝国的宗教冲突中被发现是一个有才能的将领。在波希米亚宣誓效劳后，瓦伦斯坦在战争中早早地证明了对皇帝的忠诚。他已经开始提供富有远见而创新的对大大小小战争的建议而且将，我们希望，继续作为帮助我们帝国重拾秩序和信仰的宝贵力量。

original: Emperor [Root.Monarch.GetName] needs loyalty now more than ever.

translation: 华伦斯坦的忠诚受到质疑

original: Since joining our forces early in the war, Wallenstein has shown himself to be very capable as a military commander. However, although he has made an effort to appear loyal and grateful, he is known to disagree with many of Emperor [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s decisions. Reliable sources indicate that he has even been angered by some of our refusals to compromise in the conflict. Many now suspect him of considering defecting to the enemy. Fortunately, some of the officers in his forces are still loyal to us first. They could ensure he never fights for another League.
translation: 华伦斯坦在战争的早期就加入了我们一方，并且也已证明了自己是一个非常可靠的军事指挥。他的确尽力地表现出自己的忠诚和感激，然而人人尽知他对[Root.Monarch.GetName]皇帝的许多决策都持有异议。根据可靠的消息他甚至会因我们在战争中一些不让步的行为而愤怒。现在许多人都怀疑他可能会倒向我们的敌人，幸运的是他部队里的许多军官依然对我们是忠诚的，他们应能保证他不会真的倒向另一方的联盟。

original: He needs to be captured, alive or dead.
translation: 不管他是死是活，把他给我抓起来。

original: We need him alive, leading out troops.
translation: 我们需要他活着带军出征。

original: The worst fears of our advisors have proven true. Our dependence on Wallenstein's military leadership while the war put increased strain on our nation and Empire made him bold enough to desert us in the midst of the war, fleeing to join the enemy. Our troops have not seen the last of him on the battlefields, but he will now be leading the armies of the traitors against the Emperor.
translation: 我们顾问最害怕的事情发生了。战争对我们国家和帝国了很大的压力，而由于我们太过信任华伦斯坦的军事领导，他现在胆大包天，在战事还在进行的时候就逃到了敌方。我们的部队目前还没有在战场上看到他，但是他定会带领着反帝叛徒的军队现身。

original: We should have had him killed while we had the chance.
Albrecht von Wallenstein will defect to [This.GetName].
translation: 阿布雷希特·冯·华伦斯坦将会叛逃到[This.GetName]。
华伦斯坦将军从[From.GetName]逃到我们这了

original: Our war to stop the [From.Religion.GetName] tyranny of the Holy Roman Emperor in [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] has made even [From.Monarch.GetHerHis] own generals doubt their cause. After seeing [From.GetName]'s refusal to compromise as the war drags on, Albrecht von Wallenstein has decided that he would be better off serving us. It appears they doubted his loyalties one time too many.
translation: 我们为了阻止神圣罗马帝国皇帝在[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的[From.Religion.GetName]暴政的斗争让[From.Monarch.GetHerHis]麾下的将军都开始怀疑其作为的正当性。在看到[From.GetName]对于这旷日持久的战争绝不妥协的表态后，阿布雷希特·冯·华伦斯坦决定倒向我们。看起来他们对他忠诚的经常性怀疑造成了恶果。

original: A self-fulfilling prophecy, but fortunate for us.
translation: 好一个自我应验的预言，然而对我们是件好事。

original: A siege dragging on over winter is always costly and best avoided completely. This winter has been particularly harsh and one of our sieges has seen both equipment and soldiers freezing. At this rate, we'll either have to recuperate and wait out the winter or send in more men, many of whom are likely to die from cold and starvation. How many are we willing to sacrifice to take this one city?
translation: 冬季的围城常常会造成惨重代价，所以它本应被极力避免。这个冬天异常的寒冷，而我们一场围城战的士兵和器械都快要冻僵了。如果情况在这么下去，我们将不得不撤离围城的部队，等到冬天过去；或是投入更多的人力攻城，但是这也可能让他们死于饥饿和寒冷。为了攻占这座城市，我们愿意做出多少牺牲？

original: End of the House of Griffins

The tumultuous state of the Holy Roman Empire has taken a toll on our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s health. Our small nation lies in the midst of a brewing conflict, and at the worst possible time, our ruler is in poor health and lacks heirs. With [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] passing, Pomerania sees the end of the Griffins, who have ruled this nation for centuries, and risks partition by the powers who are opportunistically striking against the weakest parts of the Empire.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国的动荡使得我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的健康状况极具恶化。我们小小国家的命运在冲突的暗流涌动中摇弋不定，然而正是在这关键的时候，我们缺乏继承人的统治者却突然一病不起。在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]死去之后，波美拉尼亚见证了格里芬家族的终结。随着这一统治了她数个世纪的家族憔然退场，许多如豺狼般寻找着机会的国家也盯上了这块帝国里最脆弱的一块肥肉，欲将之瓜分殆尽。

original: We will persist as sovereign through these hard times.
translation: 我们会在这最艰难的时刻捍卫我们的主权。

original: [This.GetName] will gain claims on all Pomeranian provinces.
translation: [This.GetName]将会获得所有波美拉尼亚省份的宣称。

original: End of the House of Griffins

After ruling Pomerania for centuries, the last [From.Monarch.GetTitle] of the House of Griffins to reign in the country has passed away without an heir. With the ongoing religious conflicts in the Holy Roman Empire, it would not be impossible for someone with ambition to lay claim to the region. However, we are not the only ones who have noticed this, and many powers may soon prepare to get their share to Pomeranian lands.
translation: 在统治波美拉尼亚数个世纪后，格里芬家族最后的君主[From.Monarch.GetTitle]无嗣而终。由于神圣罗马帝国境内宗教战争的进行，足够有野心的人是不会放过夺取这块地方宣称的机会的。我们并不是唯一一个注意到这一点的势力，许多其他的国家可能很快就要准备好在瓜分波美拉尼亚的事宜上掺上一手了。

original: We know an opportunity when we see one.

The League war has been brought to the heart of our nation, and yet we have suffered defeat. [From.GetAdjective] forces engaged ours near our capital of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and won, which has caused both concern and shame in our military. The war may be won yet, but this battle may still be remembered, whether we like it or not.
translation: 同盟战争已经波及到我们国家的心脏，但我们却节节败退。在我们首都[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]附近，[From.GetAdjective]军将我们的部队打的大败。这件事令我军既担忧又蒙羞，虽然我们依然可能取得战争的胜利，但是，不管我们愿意不愿意，这场战役将会被人们铭记。

original: We can only hope our future successes will overshadow it.
translation: 我们只能期望未来的成就能掩盖这一污点了。

original: Our decision to take a stance in the religious conflict in the Holy Roman Empire has caused even more heated discussions about where [Root.GetName] stands on the issue of the Reformation. We may not doubt the goals of the League, but there is no shortage of people in our country who do. What is obvious to us, that we have chosen the right side for the good of all [Root.GetAdjective] people regardless of faith, seems like the lies of heretics to some of our subjects. The most zealous objectors have taken up arms against their rulers and the League.
translation: 我们参与神圣罗马帝国冲突的决定激起了人们关于[Root.GetName]对改革态度的讨论。我们不能怀疑同盟军的目的，但是已经有很多流言蜚语在我们国家传播了。我们很清楚我们所做出的决定是对拥有不同信仰的[Root.GetAdjective]人民负责的决定，但有些人却认为这是异端之举。那些最为激进的反对派已经武装起来反对我们的同盟。

original: How little these people know of international affairs.
translation: 这些人真是对国际关系一无所知。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] is a practically minded ruler. Although as pious as any [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], politically expedient alliances come first, and despite our [Root.Religion.GetName] faith, we have joined a religious League that opposes our beliefs. Most advisors see this as a necessity - some of them may even have suggested it.\n\n$THEOLOGIAN$$INQUISITOR$ is not such an advisor. A person of faith, they have hid their outrage at our decision poorly and their attitude is now beginning to impact our international diplomacy. Although we remain loyal to the League, we may find it difficult to retain good relations with its members when we are not only of the wrong faith, but keep such company.
translation: 尽管[Root.Monarch.GetName]和任何一个[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]一样虔诚，然而我们的国君精思明虑，将政治需求放在第一位。于是我们加入了与我们的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰相悖的宗教同盟。多数顾问都认为这是必要之举，甚至有的还早早就上奏提议过。\n\n$THEOLOGIAN$的$INQUISITOR$却和他们不同。他太过虔诚，他的团队难以掩饰自己对我们决策的愤怒，并已经开始影响到我们的外交活动了。我们是绝对忠于同盟者的，但是因为我们信仰的错位，以及这个人的存在，我们可能难以和同盟者继续维持良好的关系。

original: If they can't keep their mouth shut, they must go.
translation: 他们不闭嘴就让他们滚。

original: Our allies deserve to hear the truth, even when they don't like it.
translation: 我们的同盟不会喜欢此事，但他们有权了解真相。

original: The people of [Root.GetName] have often seen their loyalty to [Root.Owner.GetName] questioned both because of their [Root.Culture.GetName] heritage and because of their refusal to follow the [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] faith. This has led some of them to question whether they belong under the rule of [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] at all. Increasingly, they are requesting the right for locals who represent their interests to make decisions on how the province should be ruled. We are reaching a point where some kind of compromise has to be made.
translation: [Root.GetName] 的人们经常发现他们的忠诚受到 [Root.Owner.GetName] 质疑，不仅由于他们的 [Root.Culture.GetName] 文化传统而且他们拒绝遵从 [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] 信仰. 这导致一些人质疑他们是否应生活在 [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetName] 的统治下. 相应的他们要求本地自治的权力来决定省份应如何治理. 现在我们必须做出某种妥协了.

original: Give power to the [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Owner.Culture.GetName] nobles in the region.
translation: 给信仰[Root.Religion.GetName]的 [Root.Owner.Culture.GetName]贵族一些权力。

original: Give power to those [Root.Culture.GetName] who follow the [Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 下放权力给 [Root.Culture.GetName] 信仰[Root.Owner.Religion.GetName] 的人.

original: Agree to give them the right to rule themselves to some extent.
translation: 同意授予他们某种程度的自治。

original: The Society of Jesus, a congregation more commonly known as by the name of its members, the Jesuits, have offered to provide an education for young [Root.Heir.GetName]. Many relatives and advisors have supported the suggestion, hoping that [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] will grow up to become, as the Jesuits call themselves, a soldier of God. In these turbulent times, they argue, strength of the spirit is the most important trait of a ruler. Others fear that a people so close to the Church would harden the nascent [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s heart to those who stray from its doctrine.
translation: 耶稣会，一个可能对他们成员更熟悉的称呼，耶稣会士，向我们年轻的[Root.Heir.GetName]伸出玉枝，提供给[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]一次教育的机会。君室和顾问都表示支持，并希望[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]茁壮成长，成为一个耶稣会成员，也就是「上帝的战士」。人们常说，在这样一个动荡年代，一个好的统治者要有有着足够强大的灵魂。但是也有人认为，如果一个[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]太过接近教会，就不再会对那些迷途于错误教条的人心慈手软。

original: We need a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] who can fight for our faith!
translation: 我们需要一个能够捍卫我们信仰的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] will be raised as a soldier of God, versed in military matters, but harsh on heretics.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetName]将会成为一个上帝的战士，[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]将精通军事，对异端却毫不留情。

original: We will not allow a religious order to influence our future ruler.
translation: 我们绝不允许宗教势力影响我们未来的统治者。
耶稣会受教者[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]登上君位

original: Leaving [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s education to the Jesuits has yielded what most would consider the expected results. The new [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] does not lack conviction or bravery, but is fiercely loyal to the Catholic Church and the Jesuits in particular. The faithful rejoice, but heretics now fear [Root.GetName] more than ever.
translation: 经过耶稣会的教育之后，[Root.Monarch.GetName]着着实实成为了一个众望所归的君主。新君[Root.Monarch.GetName]信念坚定胆识过人，但是他却对天主教会，特别是耶稣会，十分的忠诚。我们的信徒欢呼雀跃，而那些异端现在会对[Root.GetName]更加地恐惧。

original: The war for religious unity in the Holy Roman Empire is not going our way. Our capital of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName], by many considered the last safe refuge for those who can make it there, has been taken by the enemy. Now the nobility, both those who resided in the city to begin with and those who fled there, fear that [Root.GetName] is lost and have started to escape to those neighbors who may still house good [Root.Religion.GetName]s.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国宗教统一战争的局势并没有倒向我们一方。我们的首都，一度被许多逃难者认为是最后的庇护所的[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，已经被敌人攻占。不论是本地还是外地逃难而来的贵族都担心[Root.GetName]已经输掉了战争，于是有许多人纷纷逃往愿意招待[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒的邻国。

original: Let them flee, and return when [Root.GetName] sees better days.
translation: 逃吧，等到[Root.GetName]恢复太平再回来吧。

original: Bring them to safety within our borders, whatever it takes.
translation: 不管付出怎样的代价，都要让他们在我们境内找一处新的庇护所。

original: The occupation of [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] has frightened many among [From.GetName]'s nobility, causing them to flee the country and hoping to find shelter among their fellow [Root.Religion.GetName]s here. Since the conflict is religious, at least on the surface, we would be expected to aid those who share our faith. Yet the eyes of the League's enemies are ever upon us, and there are many who would not take kindly to seeing their enemies under our protection.
translation: [From.Capital.GetCapitalName]的失陷让许多[From.GetName]贵族陷入恐慌，并逃亡外国祈求一处能够收容[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒的地方。由于冲突至少在表面上是宗教性的，国际环境期望我们帮助与我们同宗的信徒。然而同盟的敌人们已经盯上我们，如果我们保护难民的话，他们或许会对我们的行动有所动作。

original: Surely there are others who can carry this burden.
translation: 肯定还有别人能背负这个负担。

original: [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful will always find a haven here.

translation: 伊尼戈·贝莱兹·德·格瓦拉

original: Conflicts like our present concerns over the religious state of the Holy Roman Empire, although they may seem decided by war, also require diplomatic tact and shrewdness to be won. We happen to have a man at our disposal, the Count of Oñate, who possesses these exact talents. Our enemies in the Empire have neighbors who may very well be interested in knowing that we'd rather see that land in other hands. Merely letting them know could spark a conflict to our advantage.
translation: 尽管当下神圣罗马帝国正在进行的这场宗教冲突似是必须藉由战争以一决雌雄，却也需要一些外交手段与阴谋算计来决定其胜负。我们发现欧那铁的伯爵正是拥有这样才能的人。让我们在敌人的邻国传出一些话，让他们知道我们更情愿让敌人的地盘被其他人拥有。仅仅是把话传出去，就可能激起一场对我们有利的冲突。

original: Send news that [Root.GetName] wish to give them the lands of our enemies.
translation: 传出消息，说[Root.GetName]愿意将敌人的土地分出去。

original: Offer [This.GetName] a claim on a neighboring HRE nation who opposes on in the Leagues.
translation: 给[This.GetName]一个处于敌对联盟中的邻近的神圣罗马帝国成员的宣称。

original: His talents are better applied to long-term diplomatic efforts.
translation: 他的才华应该被用在一些长期的外交事务上。

original: The allegiance of one of our neighbors, a fellow member of the Empire, appears to have angered [From.GetName]. They have sent an ambassador, a man named Íñigo Vélez de Guevara who appears to have conducted diplomacy in various parts of the Empire, to offer us a claim on the lands of those who have opposed their League.\n\nDire times may be ahead, but dire times are not without opportunities. This is a chance to expand our borders, or alternately to show that we mean our neighbors in the Empire no harm, regardless of League loyalties.
translation: 我们一个属于神罗成员的邻国似是激怒了[From.GetName]。他们让一个名为伊尼戈·贝莱兹·德·格瓦拉的人为我们提供一个他们敌对阵营国家的宣称。此人似乎从事着帝国不同地方的外交活动。\n\n虽然艰难的时代近在眼前，但是艰难的时代中并不是没有机会可寻。这正是一个扩张我们领土的绝佳机会，或者，不考虑同盟本身的忠诚的话，我们也可以借此机会向神罗诸邻国表示我们无意插足神罗事务。

original: Let all know that we do not lay claim to this land.
translation: 让所有人都知道我们不会对此地进行宣称。
向瑞典征收厄勒海峡通行税

original: The Sound Toll has been an important source of income for Denmark since the early 15th century and has allowed us to wield significant influence over the trade through Øresund since.\n\nSweden has been exempt from the tolls since our countries were united in the Kalmar Union. However, Sweden is no longer under the rule of the Danish crown and has not been for a long time. Perhaps they should start paying the price as well - there is only so much generosity we can show for old time's sake, after all.
translation: 自十五世纪早期在丹麦海峡开始征收贸易通行费开始，海峡税就是丹麦收入的大头。\n\n卡尔马联盟联合了丹、瑞两国后，瑞典就被特例免除了海峡税。然而瑞典已经很久不被丹麦王室统治了，或许他们得学着开始缴纳这份费用——我们也是已经为老友尽完这个人情了。

original: We should have removed that exemption long ago.
translation: 我们早就应该取消免征特权

original: Traditions like these are what keeps the peace.
translation: 这样的传统有利于维持和平友好关系。
丹麦强征厄勒海峡通行税

original: Despite their control of the Sound already giving them a powerful position in Baltic trade, the Danes appear to have let their greed get the better of them. We have been informed that the Sound Toll, which our nation has been exempt from since the days of the Kalmar Union, is now enforced for Swedish ships as well. This is already looking to be a significant annoyance, and some advisors are even suggesting plans for going to war over this grave insult.
translation: 尽管对海峡的控制已使他们在波罗的海的贸易中占据了强有力的地位，丹麦人之欲犹无厌。我们获悉自卡尔马同盟成立以来被免除的海峡税又开始征收，瑞典船只也不能幸免。这着实令人恼怒，部分顾问甚至暗示以这奇耻大辱为由准备开战。

original: Request Ottoman Backing to Claim Poland
translation: 要求奥斯曼支持我们宣称波兰

original: We live in a time of possibilities, and our nation has only begun to expand its borders. Born at the edge between the Christian and the Muslim world, with both the Holy Roman Empire and the Ottoman Empire so close, we must use our connections wisely to persist. Having maintained good diplomatic relations with the Turks, we can leverage their support to prepare an invasion of the Polish lands and claim them for our own.
translation: 我们活在一个充满可能性的时代，然而我们的国家才刚开始扩张领土。我们处于基督教世界和伊斯兰世界的边缘上，毗邻神罗和奥斯曼两大帝国，所以我们必须精明的利用我们的关系生存下去。我们一直和土耳其人保持着良好外交关系，所以我们也能对他们施加影响，让他们来支持我们一场酝酿中的入侵波兰的计划，并将其全部收归我们囊中。

original: The time is right. This is our chance.
If the Ottomans agree, we should have claims on neighboring Polish provinces after a week.
translation: 若奥斯曼帝国同意，我们将在几周后获得相邻波兰省份的宣称。

original: Transylvania wishes no harm to the Poles.
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚不会侵害波兰。

original: Transylvania Requests Backing to Claim Poland
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚要求支持对波兰的宣称

original: [From.Monarch.GetName] of Transylvania has sent word that they considering an invasion of Poland. Believing that we'd benefit from seeing their neighbors weakened, they want our implicit support for claiming this land.
translation: 特兰西瓦尼亚的[From.Monarch.GetName] 已经告知我们正在考虑一场对波兰的入侵. 他们相信我们将从波兰的削弱中受益，他们希望我们含蓄的支持他们的宣称.

original: We see no point in such a campaign.
translation: 我们认为这样的战役没有意义。
将匈牙利从宗教压迫下解放

original: The formation of the Leagues in the Holy Roman Empire have made it clear that we live in a time when nations no longer sit idly by and allow people of their faith to suffer under godless rulers. Not far from our border, Hungarian [Root.Religion.GetName]s are in exactly that unacceptable situation. Our nation has strong bonds with Hungary in law and in spirit, and cannot let this continue. It is time for us to free them and reclaim the land, so that [Root.Religion.GetName] blood may never be spilled upon it again.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国内形成的各个宗教同盟使得人们坚信我们活在一个国家绝对不会对无神之君治下的信徒视若无睹的时代。在我们国土之外，匈牙利的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒们就正在遭受着无神之君的压迫。我们的国家与匈牙利的律法和精神都有着深厚的联结，绝对不能对此放任不管。我们是时候去解放他们并收复失地了，不要让[Root.Religion.GetName]教徒的鲜血再度洒在这片土地之上。
特兰西瓦尼亚与匈牙利人同在。
特兰西瓦尼亚的黄金时代

original: Our nation is seeing perhaps its best era since it was born into its current form. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has proven to be a highly capable [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], and investments are being made to make [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] a cultured and impressive city. We hope to spread architecture and education throughout the nation over the coming decade, and pray that this age of peace and prosperity will last.
translation: 我们的国家或许正在见证着自诞生以来最好的时代。[Root.Monarch.GetName]已经证明自己是一个优秀的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，并且对[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]源源不断的投资将会把它建设成一个文化名城。我们希望在接下来的十年里，我们的建筑和教育能够传播到整个国家去。我们也祈愿这个和平繁荣的时代能够持续下去。

original: We will build a nation to last throughout the ages.
translation: 我们将会建设一个长治久安的国家。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName], being a [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] of faith, has found an unusually personal way of creating trust and ensuring loyalty. When meeting another [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler in person, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] will often ask them to pray together for their common goals. While perhaps forsaking some of the distance sometimes needed in diplomacy, it can create stronger bonds than any formal agreement. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has considered employing this method again on an upcoming visit to a foreign capital, although it is not certain if it will be successful.
translation: 作为一个虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]统治者，[Root.Monarch.GetName]找到了一条不寻常的个人方法来结实忠实可信的朋友。当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]私访[Root.Religion.GetName]统治者时，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]常常会邀请他们为他们共同的目标而祷告。虽然这样的活动破坏了外交活动中有时有必要保持的距离，它却能形成比官方协议更要牢固的纽带。于是在这次外事访问中，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]考虑再次用这种方法来建立关系，尽管我们不是很清楚它能不能成。

original: Souls, not only minds, must unite for true trust to be formed.
translation: 忠诚的形成不仅要同心戮力，更要有灵魂共鸣。

original: Perhaps it would be better to practice more secular diplomacy.
translation: 或许采取一些更世俗点的外交手段会更好。

original: Our ongoing war over the religious state of the Holy Roman Empire is going well. The optimism from seeing our efforts to accomplish religious goals has taken on an especially spiritual form, with one of our minister declaring that God is Spanish, fighting for our nation these days. If things continue to go our way, even our enemies may have to admit that there is some truth to this.
translation: 我们在神圣罗马帝国宗教战争中取得了节节进展，随着我们的宗教目的一步步达成，一种乐观主义发由精神世界表现出来。我们的一个大臣宣称道上帝是西班牙人，在这个时代他为我们的国家而战。如果事情依然进展顺利，我们的敌人可能都会觉得这种说法有几分道理。

original: What better ally could a soldier ever ask for?
translation: 军人们还能奢求比这更好的战友吗？

original: Our ongoing war over the religious state of the Holy Roman Empire is going poorly. Since religion is at the core of this conflict, many of those who once claimed that God was with us when we decided to join the League are now claiming that God is depriving us of the means of war and wants us to make peace. Although far from the only interpretation of current events, it has been echoed enough times to increase the doubts that the war can be won.
translation: 神圣罗马帝国宗教战争中的进展并不顺利。由于宗教是冲突的一大核心，许多曾经宣称上帝与我们同在的家伙们都决定倒向那个宣称上帝鄙夷我们并且期望我们停止战争的同盟。尽管这绝不是现阶段战局的唯一解释，但是它也已经足够与那些越来越怀疑战争走势的人们产生共鸣了。

original: 'Tis a poor faith that increases doubt.
translation: 信仰脆弱的人才会徒生疑虑。

original: While the poor state of the [Root.GetAdjective] currency is becoming ever more troubling for us, the common people have started to look to other solutions. Many are growing wary of the use of money and avoid it whenever possible, reverting to old means of trade like the barter system. Perhaps their concerns are misplaced, but if we do not act swiftly, we may lose our grip on the economy and the country itself.
translation: 当下[Root.GetAdjective]糟糕的货币状态给我们带来了更大的麻烦，大众已经纷纷开始自行寻求其他解决方法了。许多人开始对货币的使用抱有担忧，于是想尽一切办法避免它，于是一些旧时代的交易手段重现江湖，比如说以物易物。或许他们的担忧是毫无道理的，但是如果我们不迅速采取行动，我们或将失去对我们国家经济状况，甚至是我们国家本身的把控。

original: Let us just hope this works well for them until we get the problem under control.
translation: 在我们控制住问题之前，我们只能寄希望于这样的手段能正常运作了。

original: Seek the advice of our best economists to stop this by any means.
translation: 找到我们最能干的经济学者用任何手段去阻止它。

original: Our privateers have long been an annoyance to the Spanish fleets, but a daring plan hatched recently would make us more than just an annoyance. The Spanish Treasure Fleet is departing from the colonies, carrying a cargo of silver, gold and exotic goods worth more than their weight in either. Our privateers plan to intercept these ships in the early stages of their route. They assure us that the cargo can be captured with little risk, and is unlikely to fail unless someone betrays our plan to the Spanish.
translation: 一直以来，我们的私掠船就让西班牙舰队忧心如捣，而一个正在酝酿的大胆计划会让这帮西班牙人更是恨的咬牙切齿。西班牙宝藏船队满载着成吨的白银、黄金和各种异国特产，正要从一个殖民地出发。这些财富如金山银池，而我们的私掠船计划在他们航程的早期就截住他们。私掠者向我们保证夺取这些货物风险不会太高，而且除非有告密者将消息泄露给西班牙人，这项计划也不大可能会失败。

original: Their treasures are better off in [Root.GetAdjective] hands.
translation: 这些宝藏在[Root.GetAdjective]手中会发挥出更大的价值。

original: We hardly wish to draw the wrath of the Spanish armada.
translation: 我们并不想招致无敌舰队的怒火。
成功俘获西班牙珍宝舰队！

original: One by one, the ships of the Spanish Treasure Fleet were intercepted, many of them taken by surprise, some of them trapped, unprepared for us to make such a bold attack. Despite some ships receiving warning beforehand, the cargo from the captured ships will boost our economy for months, if not years. The privateers have returned to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] as heroes. We are unlikely to ever see such a successful capture again.
translation: 西班牙珍宝舰队的船只一艘接一艘被我们拦截，许多船只在突袭中被缴获，一些则因为对我们如此强力的攻击毫无准备而被围困住。尽管一些船只已经收到了警报而逃走，我们所捕获的这些珍宝船也会给我们的经济带来数个月乃至数年的增长。回到[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的私掠者们受到了英雄凯旋般的欢迎。我们也很难再见到一场如此成功的劫掠战了。

original: Yet it was a joy to see it once.
translation: 毕生只见一次亦令人高兴。

original: Treasure Fleet Captured by the Dutch
translation: 珍宝舰队被荷兰人捕获

original: The Dutch privateers who have long plagued our efforts to get trade goods home from distant colonies recently made a direct attack on our Treasure Fleet just as it was leaving for the Spanish ports to bring silver and gold back to our homeland. Although some ships were prepared and managed to avoid the assault, the ones who did not cost us dearly. It has not yet been decided how or what the Dutch will pay for this, but they will certainly pay.
translation: 一直以来，荷兰的私掠船队就是我们远洋殖民地贸易的心头大患，而他们最近的一场胆大包天的劫掠活动将我们刚刚出港不久的携带着各种真金白银珠宝的珍宝舰队打得大败。尽管一部分船只已经做好了防止突袭的准备，并成功逃脱了，但那些已有的损失依然难以令人接受。我们一定要让荷兰人付出代价，不管是用怎么样的方式，让他们付出多大的代价。

original: Gold, silver and blood would all be acceptable currencies.
translation: 为了我们失去的金银珠宝，让他们血债血偿。

original: The education [Root.Monarch.GetName] had growing up during the regency has prepared [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to rule as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], just as we hoped. The advisors who provided it are proud of having left such a lasting legacy in the wisdom and motives of the [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] who will rule [Root.GetName].
translation: 正如我们所期望的那样，[Root.Monarch.GetName]从小就开始的教育让[Root.Monarch.GetHeShe]准备好了成为一个[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]进行统治。为他提供教育的顾问十分自豪，认为自己留给[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]的渊博智慧和远大理想将会伴随着[Root.Monarch.GetHeShe]统治[Root.GetName]。

original: The League war has brought us all the way to the capital of one of our enemies. Striking at the heart of their nation, we were victorious, to their great shame. Among the many skilled soldiers involved, one in particular has been praised for contributing to the victory and has been promoted to the position of general after showing exceptional calm and quick thinking during the mayhem.
translation: 同盟战争的进行已经让我们兵临一个敌人的首都城下。我们对敌人的心脏地带进行了致命打击并取得了胜利，使他们的脸上无光。在我们众多技艺精湛的士兵中，有这么一位因为在这场战役中所展现出来的冷静与决断力以及他巨大的贡献而脱颖而出，成为了一名将军。

original: He may strike fear into the hearts of more nations yet.
translation: 希望他能让我们更多的敌人闻风丧胆。

original: [Root.GetName] is under attack, but the enemy has so far not advanced very far into our lands. Our army strategists suggest that we fortify our defenses where they are needed the most. They are, however, turning to [Root.Monarch.GetName] for an opinion on exactly where that would be. It is certainly true that we cannot afford to lose control of our capital but it may still be best to fortify our borders first.
translation: [Root.GetName]正在遭受攻击，但是我们的敌人还没有过度深入我们的土地。我们的军事战略专家建议我们立刻在最需要的地方加固防御，然而他们却和[Root.Monarch.GetName]产生了分歧。无论如何我们绝对无法承担首都失陷的结果，但是我们最好的选择或许还是在边境加固防御。

original: Focus on preparing the capital and its surrounding provinces.
translation: 专注于加固首都及其周围省份的防御。

original: Fortifications must start at points on our borders.
translation: 在边境据点加强我们的防御。

original: While the League war was started for religious reasons, the religious allegiance of the Holy Roman Empire is not the only concern of the members. Some see the war as a chance to claim land from some of those on the opposing side, considering the religious goals of the leaders to be secondary, if not a pretense entirely.\n\nRecently, we have been confronted by ambassadors from the leader of our League, who implores us to make our real motives clear for the benefit of future peace negotiations.
translation: 同盟战争虽是因宗教原因开始的，但是对宗教的忠诚并不是神圣罗马帝国成员们唯一的考虑因素。一些人把这场战争看作开疆扩土的好机会，把宗教目标放到第二位，甚至是把它抛到脑后。\n\n最近同盟领袖的大使访问了我们，请求将我们真实的意图讲清楚，以利于未来的和平谈判。

original: We hope to finish this war with more land and make no secret of this.
translation: 我们不会隐瞒希望获得更多土地的意图。

original: [Root.GetName] fights for the cause of faith itself!

While the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith may be crucial for us, some members of the League are not so noble in their intentions. An ambassador recently returned from [From.Capital.GetCapitalName] with word from the [From.GetAdjective], who admitted that what they really hope to gain from this war is expansion of their borders. Unpleasant news, weakening the strength of our cooperation and position to negotiate peace.
translation: 尽管[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰对于我们而言很残忍，但某些同盟成员的真实意图却不那么高尚。最近从[From.Capital.GetCapitalName]回来的大使带回了[From.GetAdjective]的消息，他们承认他们参加这场战争的真实意图在于拓展边界。这是一个令人不那么高兴的消息，这会削弱我们的团结和在和谈中的地位。

original: At least they are honest in their selfishness.
translation: 至少他们对于自私很诚实。

original: Not all of the League joined our side to fight for the [Root.Religion.GetName] cause. Many have simply chosen our side because it is politically expedient. Word from [From.GetName], however, is that they truly care about our plight and see the League as a religious alliance first and foremost, and go into battle knowing that they are doing God's work by our side.
translation: 并非所有加入我们这方的邦国都是为[Root.Religion.GetName]的原因而战。许多国家的选择只是政治上的权宜之计。可是来自[From.GetName]的消息称，他们真正关心我们的困境并且希望同盟最先且最重要的应是一个宗教同盟，这样在战斗中他们可以确保我们一方在为上帝而战。

original: Let us hope they remain true to such a noble ideal.
translation: 希望他能一直保持如此纯正的贵族精神。
