original: Would you like to use the $LIST$ to automatically transport §Y$UNIT$§! to §Y$DESTINATION$§!?
Would you like to order $UNIT$ to automatically explore these seas?
translation: 你希望指示$UNIT$自动探索海洋吗？

original: Would you like to order $UNIT$ to attempt to circumnavigate the globe? This is very difficult and may result in the fleet being lost to attrition.
translation: 你希望指示$UNIT$尝试进行环球航行吗？这非常困难，可能导致该舰队在途中因损耗而沉没。

original: Would you like to order $UNIT$ to automatically map this coastline?
translation: 你希望指示$UNIT$自动探索海岸线吗？

original: Would you like to split §Y$UNIT$§! and use $LIST$ to automatically transport the split units to §Y$DESTINATION$§!?
translation: 你想拆分§Y$UNIT$§!然后用$LIST$自动运输拆分后的部队到§Y$DESTINATION$§!吗？

original: Najaf, the final resting place of Ali, is one of the most sacred places on earth for Shiites. As custodians of this holy city we have undertaken various projects to make this site all that it is supposed to be.
translation: 作为阿里·本·阿比·塔利卜的安息之地，纳杰夫是世界上最重要的什叶派圣地之一。作为这座圣城的管理者，我们必须开始建设各种项目，让这里成为它本该有的样子。

original: The Miniature painting business is booming. Everyone who is anything in the Islamic world wishes to acquire or emulate the works of our masters.
translation: 波斯纤画贸易十分兴隆，伊斯兰世界人人都希望能获得或能仿制我们的大师们的杰作。

original: The militant Musha'sha'iyyah sect has taken hold of this province, leading to unrest and social instability.
translation: 激进的穆沙阿派控制了该省，导致了社会动乱。

original: The militant Safawiyyah order has taken hold of this province and many of its inhabitants long to join up with their members of faith.
translation: 尚武的萨非教团已经控制该省份，当地居民中有许多教友渴望加入它。

original: A strong country is a country of a strong faith. We are actively promoting Twelver Shiism as the faith for the people of Persia.
translation: 一个强国一定要有强大的信仰。我们正在积极地在波斯的人民中传播十二伊玛目派信仰。

original: We have adopted a policy of generous rewards for Sunni clerics that convert to our new state religion.
translation: 我们通过对逊尼派神职人员施行丰厚的奖励政策使得他们转而信奉我们的国教。

original: All clerics who are not willing to become faithful followers of our new state religion are being actively persecuted. There must be no traitors among the clergy in our state.
translation: 所有不愿意真诚信奉我们国教的神职人员都遭到了不断的迫害。我们国家的神职人员中绝不应出现叛徒。

original: Shiite scholars, lawyers, clerics and other men of quality are flocking to our shores from all over the world.
translation: 世界各地的什叶派学者、法学家、神职人员和其他高素质人才云集我国。

original: The resources of this area are partly consumed by the project to remake the city of Isfahan into a world capital.
translation: 这一地区的资源的一部分正在被消耗在一场重建伊斯法罕圣城使其成为世界中心的计划中。
伊斯法罕独占半个天下

original: 'Isfahan is half of the world' is an old saying. After our restructuring of the city this is more true than ever. This city is the artistic, political and cultural capital not only of Persia but the entire Persianate world.
translation: 古人云：「伊斯法罕独占半个天下」。在我们重建这座城市之后，这句话比以往更加接近现实了。这座城市不仅仅已成为波斯的艺术，政治和文化的中心，对于整个大伊朗地区更是如此。

original: \n§YIt's possible to move here with help from transport ships.§!
translation: \n§Y我们可以用运输船移动至此。§!

original: \n§RIt's possible to move here with help from transport ships, but all transport fleets are currently busy.§!
translation: \n§R我们可以用运输船移动至此，但是我们所有的运输舰队都无暇抽身。§!

original: Right-click to order your navy to explore this province.
translation: 右键点击此处来命令你的海军探索这个省份。

original: You can only Circumnavigate the Globe once!
translation: 你只能进行一次环球航行！

original: You need at least Diplomatic Technology level §Y$NUM$§! to be able to Circumnavigate the Globe.
translation: 你至少需要 §Y$NUM$§! 级外交科技以进行一次环球旅行。

original: You must have an Explorer leading this navy in order to be able to send it on an exploration mission.\n
translation: 你必须有一名探险家带领这支舰队才能将其派遣去进行探索任务。\n

original: You must explore an adjacent province in order to be able to send explorers here.\n
translation: 你必须先探索了一个相邻省份才能探索这里。\n

original: You must have a total of at least 3 Light and Heavy ships in this fleet to be able to explore with it.
translation: 进行探索任务这支舰队至少需要由3条轻型战舰或重型战舰编成。

original: Your fleet must be in port in order to be able to send it on an exploration mission.
translation: 你的舰队必须停靠在港口中才能进行一个探索任务。

original: This province is too far away from your closest core province to be able to explore it.
translation: 这个省份距离你最近的沿海核心省份太远了，当前不能探索。

original: In Persian art the prohibition of depicting the human figure never reached as far as the non-religious literature and the Persian nobility have been commissioning illuminated manuscripts containing exquisite and very expensive miniature paintings for as long as anyone can remember.\nWith the rebirth of the Persian Empire the miniature painting industry is now booming. The works of the masters of the $CAPITAL$ school are attracting not only domestic buyers but are now being exported all over the Islamic world.
translation: 在发布描绘人像的禁令后，波斯的艺术从来没有达到未伊斯兰化前，波斯贵族委任工匠制作包含精致细密画的手稿时的高度。\n随着波斯帝国的重生，细密画绘制产业有再度兴旺。出自$CAPITAL$学校中大师之手的作品不仅吸引了国内的买家，而且还被出口到了整个伊斯兰世界。

original: After a lifetime in the royal bureaucracy Iskandar Beg Munshi has completed a great chronicle of the history of our state. Starting with the founding of our dynasty Munshi goes on to retell the events of every Shah since. The more recent parts of the period covered by the chronicle draws from Munshi's own rich experience from his time in the service of the throne.
translation: 在奉献毕生的精力后，伊斯坎德尔曼士完成了关于我们国家历史的一部巨作。文员们整理了自王朝开创以来每个国王在位期间发生的事件。编年史所涉及到的最近一部分时期内容更来自于这位文员在为王室服务期间所获得的经验。.

original: We are fortunate to be the custodians of Najaf, one of the holiest cities in the world and the resting place of Imam Ali. In recent years, during the struggles of Timur, the Jalayirids and the Qara Qoyunlu the city and its shrines have become somewhat neglected. It is our duty to rectify this situation.
translation: 我们很幸运地成为了纳杰夫的统治者，这座城市是世界上最神圣的地方之一，也是伊玛目阿里的安息之地。近些年来，在帖木儿、札剌亦儿、黑羊王朝的蹂躏下，这座城市和圣地已经有些荒废了，我们有义务去改变这个现状。

original: We must do our utmost to embellish Najaf and its shrines.
translation: 建设纳杰夫是我们的责任.

original: Let us protect Najaf without indulging in extravagance.

translation: 穆莎莎伊耶教派的兴起

original: A millenarian sect centered around the Iraqi theologian Muhammed Ibn Falah is rapidly gaining followers among the Arab and Persian tribesmen in southern Mesopotamia. As the sect continue to gain followers and financial assets it remains unclear whether Ibn Falah or any of his successors will become a significant factor in the politics of Persia
translation: 一个以伊拉克神学家穆罕穆德伊本法拉赫为中心的千禧年教派正在迅速增加信徒。这些信徒主要是来自于阿拉伯和波斯的游牧民。在此教派继续增加追随者和资产的情况下，伊本法拉赫或他的接班人是否会成为波斯政坛有重大意义的因素仍然是一个未知数。

original: The rich Sufi Safawiyyah sect in northwestern Persia has begun a transformation from a largely ascetic sect into a military order. The ideas of the sect have struck home among the Turcoman tribesmen in Persia and the leaders of the sect are more and more being regarded as semi-divine beings. What effect this will have on the politics of Persia remains to be seen.
translation: 西北波斯的苏菲萨法维教派开始由庞大的禁欲主义团体转变为军事性组织。该教派的宗旨已得到了土库曼游牧民的支持，而其领导者也越来越被视作半神般的存在。这究竟会对波斯的政治有何影响有待我们进一步的观察。

original: The appearance of a religious Persian state has stirred the hearts of the Qizilbash tribesmen in our lands. Minor clashes with government officials have now escalated into a full blown uprising.
translation: 一个宗教化的波斯激怒了我们国家的土库曼游牧民。他们同政府的小型冲突现在已演变为有组织性的暴动。

original: For too long Persia has stood divided when foreign invaders have entered our lands. While $MONARCH$ is an immensely popular $MONARCHTITLE$ a durable state should not be built on personal loyalties alone. The road forward must be to unify our people through a common religious identity different from that of our neighbors.\nWhile far from all of our subjects would identify as Shia currently there are many cases of Shiite customs, such as the honoring of the Imams, being practiced by the Muslims of Persia. By ensuring that our people all adhere to Twelver Shiism we can create a Persian identity which will stand the test of time.
translation: 很长时间以来，波斯饱受外国侵略者的摧残。虽然$MONARCH$是一个非常受人民爱戴的$MONARCHTITLE$，一个能长久存在的国家不应只是建立于个人的忠诚之上。我们走的应该是一条和我们邻国不一样的通过宗教统一来团结人们的道路。虽然谈不上所有的臣民都是什叶派信徒，但我们有许多诸如崇拜伊玛目的什叶派传统被波斯的穆斯林们遵循。通过确保我们的人们都信奉十二伊玛目派，我们可以达到经得起时间检验的波斯民族大团结。

original: Our people will be unified by their faith.
translation: 我们的人民将会由于他们的信仰紧密地团结在一起！

original: There is strength in diversity too.
The Faith of the Sunni Ulema

While popular Islam in Iran might be positively predisposed towards Shiism the Ulema has always been dominated by Sunnis. For some of these clerics the transition has been very smooth, almost suspiciously so, while others have been refusing to adapt to the new ways of our state.
translation: 虽然伊朗的伊斯兰教以什叶派为主导。但是乌理玛的位置一直是被逊尼派所主导。一部分神职人员的向什叶派的过渡非常平稳，但值得担心的是，其他人对我们国家的新方针十分抵制。

original: It has now been centuries since there was a strong Shiite state either in Iran or elsewhere. With the birth of our kingdom an increasing number of Shiite theologians, clerics and all kinds of Shiite intelligentsia have come flocking to our borders from all over the Muslim world.\nThis is quite fortunate as there is a shortage of Shiite lawyers, clerics and officials in our lands, but this turn of events has made many Muslim monarchs feel quite threatened by our state.
translation: 在伊朗或其他地方的强大什叶派国家已经产生了数百年。随着我们王国的建立，越来越多的什叶派神学家、神职人员和其他什叶派知识分子从伊斯兰世界各地赶来我国。这对于缺少什叶派律师、神职人员和公务员的我国来说，这真是一个好消息。但是这一事件让很多穆斯林君主感到来自于我国的深深威胁。

original: We should not risk angering our neighbors.
translation: 还是别去惹我们的邻居吧.

original: If we are to build a truly Persian nation we must create a worthy and truly Persian capital. Isfahan is an old city situated at the heart of the lands of Persia and would fit our ambitions nicely.\nTalented architects from all over our lands stand ready to transform this old city into a proper symbol of our power. This is, however, going to be a both costly and time consuming process.
translation: 如果我们打算建立一个富强的波斯国家，我们就必须建设一个宏伟的都城。伊斯法罕是一座位于波斯中心的古城，它很符合我们的建都要求。来自全国各地的富有才华的设计师已经准备好将这座古老的城市打造成我们国家实力的象征。然而这将是一个昂贵且耗时的过程。

original: $CAPITAL_CITY$ is the capital of this country.

translation: 伊斯法罕就是半个世界

original: The construction of the new royal center at Isfahan is finally finished and before us now lie one of the greatest cities of the world. Starting at the Chahar Bagh avenue and ending with the great Maydan-i Naqsh-i Jahan we have now gathered all the government institutions of our empire in one place.\nThis Maidan of Isfahan is itself a microcosm of our empire, a huge square filled with the stands of merchants from all over our lands, dominated by the monumental Masjid-i Shah mosque, the Imperial Bazaar and the Ali Qapu Palace of our $MONARCHTITLE$. In the process of completing the restructuring of the city many new construction techniques have been born out of necessity and a generation of artisans and architects have developed their trades further than was previously thought possible.
translation: 新首都伊斯法罕的建设已经完工了，现在她已经成为了世界上最棒的城市。起于四分花园大道，止于世界之景广场，我们在这里聚集了帝国的所有机构。\n伊斯法罕广场就是我们帝国的缩影，全国各地的商人汇聚在巨大的广场之中，而位于中央的是皇家清真寺、帝国集市和我们$MONARCHTITLE$的阿里卡普宫。在完成城市建设的过程中，许多新的建筑科技随着需求而产生。一大波艺术家和建筑师的技艺提升大大超出了以前的想象。

original: Versions seems to diverge on exactly how it happened, some say they came in the dark, some that they had hid in big boxes disguised as gifts, but somehow the commander of one of our coastal forts have managed to lose control of both his island fort and the entire region under his control at the same time. The perpetrators are a group of Siddis, former slaves of Ethiopian origin that have become a quite common sight in the navies and armies of this region.\nThe leader of the Siddis has sent an emissary to our court today, asking that we allow them to stay in control of the fort that they have taken in return for their loyal service to our state.
translation: 对于它究竟是如何产生的问题有不同的说法。一些人说他们从黑暗中到来，一些人则说他们是藏在巨大的箱子中伪装成礼物而出现的。但无论如何，我们沿海要塞的指挥官已经同时失去了对海岛和整个地区的控制权。事件的实施者是一群希狄人，他们原本是来自埃塞俄比亚的奴隶，但现在已经成为了这个地区陆海军的主要力量。希狄人的领袖今天向我们宫廷派遣了一位使者，要求我们允许他们保持对这些要塞的控制，并承诺为我们国家效忠来回报。

original: These rebels must be dealt with!

translation: 梅瓦尔地区的防御工事

original: Our Rana has seen fit to do a general oversight of all forts in our lands.
translation: 吾王认为有必要对我们土地上的所有要塞进行整修。

original: This area is controlled by the huge mountaintop fortress of Kumbhalgarh. Its long and thick walls are said to be second only to the one in the faraway lands of China.
translation: 这个地区被山顶巨大的贡珀尔格尔堡垒所据守着。堡垒又厚又长的城墙据说可媲美遥远中国的长城。

original: Similar in style to older Jain monuments in the same area the Vijaya Sthambha or Tower of Victory stands as a monument to the success of our dynasty.
translation: 和同一地区的耆那教纪念碑风格类似，胜利之塔是对我们王朝伟业的一个纪念。

original: In order to commemorate his victories over his many enemies such as the Sultan of Malwa, the treacherous Rajas of Marwar and the greedy Sultan of Gujarat, Rana Kumbha began the construction of a unique monument in 1442.\nTaking over ten years to complete the Vijaya Sthambha with its richly decorated nine stories is a testament not only to our dynasty but also the skill and craftsmanship of our sculptors and architects.
translation: 为了纪念他对他的一些敌人如摩腊婆苏丹、奸诈的迈瓦尔王公和贪婪的古吉拉特苏丹作战的胜利，拉纳·昆巴开始在1442年建造一座独一无二的纪念物。\n耗费十年时间完成的九层装饰一新的胜利之塔，是我们我们国力，以及国内雕刻家与建筑师技艺的最好证明。

original: The return of Rana Jodha Rathore

When we annexed the neighboring kingdom of Marwar in 1438 it was in an act of retribution. The Rathore Ranas of Marwar, once trusted friends and regents to our Rajas, had conspired to murder our royal heir and overthrow our kingdom. Ever since the last remaining heir of the Rathore lineage has been wandering the deserts of Rajasthan biding his time and waiting for an opportunity to reclaim his patrimony.\nThat time seems to have finally come, at least in the mind of Jodha Rathore. We have just received word that our men in the Mandore fort in Marwar have been overwhelmed by soldiers loyal to the cause of the Rathores.
translation: 当我们在1438年附庸了我们的邻国迈瓦尔时，他们正在进行报复行动。迈瓦尔的拉索王朝君主，这些吾王曾经的亲密战友，却在暗地里计划刺杀吾王，试图颠覆我们国家。从那时起，残存的拉索血脉继承人一直徘徊在拉贾斯坦的沙漠之中，等待时机夺回他们的权力。这天似乎已经到来了，至少在久哈德·拉索心中是这样的。已经有消息说我们在迈瓦尔地区曼多尔堡的士兵被效力于拉索的反贼所击溃了。

original: While the kingdom of Mewar is both proud and strong, an epitome of the Rajput spirit of old, it has few friends and many enemies. In order to defend ourselves and deter any would-be invader we must fortify our kingdom. Plans have been drawn up for a fortress making use of the Aravalli range itself as a wall against our enemies. This huge mountaintop fortress would allow us to keep a close watch on most of our lands and together with Chittorgarh fort it will make our lands a nightmare to control for any invader.
translation: 虽然梅瓦尔王国已经十分强盛，但受到古老的拉其普特精神影响，她树敌太多，却朋友寥寥。为了自卫和威慑潜在的侵略者，我们必须增强我们的国力。我们计划利用阿拉瓦利岭的天险之势修建一座城堡来抵御敌军。这座巨大的山顶要塞将让我们能监控大部分领土。配合奇陶尔加尔堡，它将成为任何侵略者的噩梦。

original: In an attempt to reconcile our dynasty with our rivals in Marwar one of our princes was married to the Rathore Princess Mira Bai a few years ago. The marriage was to become a quite short affair, however, as the young princess was widowed a few years later.\nAs a widow Mira Bai have become increasingly devoted to Krishna and has been seen wandering the streets of the capital singing and dancing with others of a similarly strong faith. The fact that this behavior is far from fitting for a royal widow has led to some ill will within the royal family. Possibly because of this Mira Bai have now proceeded to leave $CAPITAL_CITY$ and has been heard to be touring the countryside of Rajasthan, proclaiming her love and devotion to Krishna.
translation: 为了和我们的宿敌迈瓦尔达成和解，几年前我国的一个王子迎娶了拉索公主米拉拜。然而，几年后年轻的公主成为了寡妇，这场婚姻短暂的影响也因此而终结。作为寡妇的米拉拜投入了黑天神的崇拜之中，经常在首都的大街上与有着相同信仰的人们唱歌跳舞。这种行为违反了皇室寡妇所应遵守礼节，对皇室也有着极其恶劣的影响。米拉拜很有可能离开$CAPITAL_CITY$，听说她将游历拉贾斯坦的乡间，宣扬她对黑天的热爱和奉献。
针对库姆巴拉纳的阴谋

original: Rana Kumbha, one of the greatest kings of our dynasty has become the victim of a heinous plot. Seemingly oblivious to the fact that this will stain our family's reputation forever one of the royal sons, Udai, has murdered his father.\nThis Patricide has shaken our kingdom to its core. Unwilling to have anything to do with a murderer the proud chiefs of the Mewar kingdom have elected to support Udai's brother Raimal instead.
translation: 我们王国最伟大的国王库姆巴拉纳死于一场凶险的阴谋。似乎有个将会玷污皇室声誉的事实表明，皇子乌代谋杀了他的父亲。这个弑父者震惊了王国上下。诸位大臣不打算给凶手机会，他们将支持乌代的兄弟雷玛成为新的国王。

original: A proclamation has gone out from our country, that the lost children of al-Andalus are invited to seek shelter and new lives in our beautiful cities. We shall give them a friendly and welcome reception as they will enrich our country and impoverish that of the infidel. Over time they will become visible with their sophistication and influence our research.
translation: 我们国家最近发布一项声明，容许安达卢西亚地区迷失的孩子在我们美丽的城市寻找避难所，重获新生。我们应该接纳他们，这将会让我们国家变得更富强，同时减弱异教徒们的实力。时间将使他们变得更成熟，这将对我们的研究产生积极的影响。

original: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful. Granada has fallen to the infidels! The last jewel of al-Andalus, a beacon of learning is now in Castilian hands. As the Islamic world reels from this loss, Moorish refugees flock to the Muslim cities and courts of North Africa and the Middle East, bringing with them knowledge, works by exceptional scholars like Abu al-Walid ibn Rushd, Abu al-Qasim al-Zahrawi and Abu Bakr ibn Tufail. Inviting these refugees to $COUNTRY$ might provide an enormous boost to our own efforts in the fields of science and culture.
translation: 以至高至上的安拉之名。格拉纳达被异教徒攻陷了！这颗安达卢斯最后的珍宝，学术的灯塔现在却落入了卡斯蒂利亚人手中。伊斯兰世界还沉浸在此次陷落的悲痛中时，摩尔难民如潮水般涌入了北非和中东的穆斯林城市，同时带来了他们传承自伊本·鲁斯德、宰赫拉威、图费勒等著名学者的知识。邀请这些难民到$COUNTRY$将为我们在科学和文化方面的发展带来巨大的帮助。

original: By all means, invite them to $COUNTRY$!
translation: 用尽一切办法让他们来$COUNTRY$！

original: The Shahi Qila of Jaunpur is the most heavily fortified citadel in our country and the pride of our dynasty.
translation: 沙溪城堡是我们国家最坚固的堡垒，也是王国的骄傲。

original: The Sant Kabir may have a problem with religious authority but for our kingdom on the whole the presence of this holy man helps bring our people together.
translation: 圣者迦比尔可能与宗教权威有些过节，但这位圣人将能有助于我国人民的团结。

original: We have initiated a recruitment program targeting the Rajput villages of the Doab and Gangetic plain. Joining the army is becoming a new tradition for the second sons of the families in these communities.
translation: 我们已启动了在恒河平原拉其普特人村落的征募计划。家中的次子参军正在成为这些社区的新传统。

original: The writing is on the wall for our old overlords in the Sultanate of Delhi. By now all talented men are leaving the Sultanate to seek employment abroad.
translation: 我们过去在德里的领主们如今已难挽苏丹国衰落的颓势。如今德里的能人志士都在陆续离开苏丹国另投明君。

original: We have enacted a policy of taxation on the many pilgrims of northern India. While this is a very unpopular policy for our non-Muslim subjects it does bring in a steady income to the state treasury.
translation: 我们颁布了对大量在北印度的朝圣者征税的法令。尽管这项法令让非穆斯林的国民非常不快，但它给我们带来了十分稳定的收入。

original: The old Northern Indian trade of Sadak-e-Azam is supported by a network of caravansarais, facilitating trade and enriching our state.
translation: 在北印度的主道公路上，由商队旅舍形成的网络支撑着这条公路上历史悠久的贸易活动，让我们的国家变得富有。

original: While a great tragedy to many, Timur's sack of Delhi in 1398 was one of the most important events in the history of our sultanate. It is what propelled our ancestors from mere governors of the east (Malik-us-Sharq) to Sultans in their own right. Since that day we have watched with great interest as the Delhi Sultanate has gradually been torn apart by inner struggles and claimants with outside support, using every opportunity to slowly eat away at their control over northern India.\nDelhi's situation is now worse than ever and as yet another power hungry local strongman marches on the capital an increasing stream of Delhian nobles and officials pour over our borders seeking new employment and offering to help us secure what remains of the Delhian lands.
translation: 1398年，帖木儿洗劫了德里。这既是德里人经历的重大悲剧，也是我国历史上最重要的事件之一。这一事件帮助我们的先辈们从东方边境的统治者「东方之王」变成了有自己头衔的苏丹。自那时起，我们一直关注着德里苏丹国饱受内忧外患，被逐渐瓦解，并利用一切机会蚕食着德里在北印度的控制权。\n如今的德里比过去任何时候的境况都要糟糕，又有一支强大的地方力量占据了首都。越来越多的德里贵族和官员涌入我们边境寻求工作，并帮助我们巩固在德里的土地中留下的财富。

original: Traditionally Muslim powers in this region have relied militarily on Afghan and Persian cavalry. If we are willing to expand the Hindu influence in our armies, however, the Rajput farming communities that dot the Doab and Gangetic regions would make for an ideal source of infantry. Not only are there many of second sons that would jump at the prospect of becoming soldiers, many of these communities are said to already have mastered the use of firearms better than many of our regular soldiers.
translation: 一直以来，印度地区的穆斯林政权依赖来自阿富汗和波斯的骑兵进行统治。不过，如果我们希望提高印度教徒在军队中的人数，在多阿普和恒河地区的拉其普特人将会是很好的兵源。那里不仅有许多励志加入军队的次子，而且据说那里有许多已经熟练掌握火器的人。

original: Let us integrate them with our forces.
translation: 我们的军队会把吸纳他们。

original: No, it is too dangerous to rely on these Hindus.
translation: 不，这太危险了，我们不能依赖这些印度教徒。

original: Some say that he was born a Muslim and some a Hindu, to the man itself it matters little. A Sant from a poor weaver's caste in Varanasi has risen to unprecedented levels of popularity. Kabir's poems are an attack against useless dogmas, the caste system and the Hindu and Muslim clergy. For Kabir the divine is formless and over-regulated religious customs only bring us farther from it.
translation: 有人说他出生于穆斯林世家，也有人说他是印度教徒的儿子，但对卡比尔自己来说这都无关紧要。从一个贫穷的瓦拉纳西纺织工到大众偶像，圣诗人卡比尔的诗歌抨击着无用的教义，种姓制度，印度教和穆斯林的圣职人员。在他看来，混乱无度并且被过分调整的宗教仪式只会让我们远离它们的初衷。

original: The site of Jaunpur on the northern bank of the Gomti river has been commanded by a fort long before the arrival of Islam in these lands. The Delhi sultans in their day further fortified the place using materials from many of the buildings of the defeated Rashtrakutas of Kannauj.\nWith the advent of our independent Sultanate in the late 14th century the fort was further strengthened and began to serve as a royal residence. Now that our state has grown into a power in its own right, however, it is high time that we take a new look at the state of the Jaunpur Qila.
translation: 赞普尔位于戈墨蒂河的北岸，在伊斯兰教到来之前就一直由一座要塞控制着。德里的苏丹们在他们的统治期间，用缴自卡瑙杰的罗湿陀罗拘手中的战利品加固了这座要塞。\n我们在十四世纪获得独立之后，这座要塞进一步被修缮，并开始作为王家住地。如今我们已经发展为有自己名分的一股势力，是时候重新审视一下赞普尔要塞了。
我们该对它进行一次全面的修缮。

original: Let us strengthen it in weak areas.
translation: 我们应该加固它的薄弱之处。

original: The first of the great works of the Jaunpur sultanate after its independence was the imposing Atala Masjid mosque, a marriage of local and Muslim architecture unlike anything that can be seen elsewhere in India. The impressive facade of the mosque is quite unique and has attracted the attention of both high and low.\nAs our Sultanate has grown so has the fame of the Atala Masjid mosque and as we now stand ready to start more works of construction it is believed we should continue to develop this unique architectural style and make it more closely associated with our Sultanate.
translation: 赞普尔苏丹国获得独立之后的第一项伟大工事，乃是壮观的阿塔拉清真寺。这是一座融合了当地与穆斯林两种不同风格的建筑，与印度其他地方的清真寺大不相同。清真寺引人注目的正面十分独特，吸引着所有人的目光。\n随着苏丹国与阿塔拉清真寺的名气逐渐增长，我们如今准备开始进行更多的建筑工事，继续修建更多采用这种独特风格的建筑，让这种风格与我国联系在一起。

original: We need a new Mosque in this style!
translation: 我们还需要一座新的，采用这种风格的清真寺！

original: Let us return to the more conservative style of the Delhi Sultans.
translation: 我们应该重新采用过去德里苏丹们采用过的保守风格。

original: One of the oldest cities in the world and the holiest city of Hinduism, Varanasi, lies not far from Jaunpur. Every day countless Indian pilgrims traverse our lands to reach not only Varanasi but many of the other holy places of Hinduism, Buddhism and Jainism in the region we occupy.\nThese travelers are compelled by their religious convictions to make this journey and will attempt to reach their goal almost regardless of any hindrance we might put in their way. Our vizier has therefore suggested that we, like the Delhi sultans before us, create a specific tax on all pilgrims that would visit the holy places in our lands. In place such a tax would undoubtedly bring us a steady income, but it would not be a very popular policy among our non-Muslim subjects.
translation: 瓦拉纳西，世界最古老的城市之一，也是印度教最神圣的圣城。每天，不计其数的印度朝圣者穿过我们的领土，去往瓦拉纳西和其他我们占领的印度教、佛教和耆那教圣地。\n这些旅行者被他们的信念驱使着踏上旅途，无论我们在路上设置多少难关，他们都会试图抵达终点。由是，我们的大臣建议我们学习过去德里苏丹所做的，设立一个，向所有到我国境内拜访圣地的朝圣者们征收的特别税目。设置适当的税收无疑将成为国库稳定的收入来源，但这项政策不会受到我国非穆斯林国民的欢迎。

original: Let us allow the pilgrims free passage.
translation: 我们应当允许朝圣者们免费过境。

original: Through the middle of our lands, all the way from Bengal to Kabul, goes one of the oldest trade routes in the world. The Sadak-e-Azam is the commercial artery of Northern India and the means by which most goods and merchants arrive or leave our lands. Making the journey safer and quicker for the travelers of this road should be a top priority for our Sultanate and for any other power that the path crosses. It has been suggested that by enforcing the existing road and supplementing the existing stops of the route by a network of Serais of our own we might greatly ease the journey for many.
translation: 世界上最古老的商路，西起孟加拉，东至喀布尔，横卧在我们的领土中。主道公路是北印度的贸易要道，将会带来大量的货物和商人进出我们的国土。保证商旅在主道公路上的安全和快捷，应是我国和其他主道公路过境政权的头等大事。有人建议，通过旅栈网络来加强现有道路和补给现有的贸易节点，将会极大地方面旅客的旅程。

original: The Traders should pay for their own expenses.
translation: 商人们的支出应当自付。

original: Right between the Malwa plateau and the plains of the Jaunpur sultanate lies the small state of Kalpi. This is an area that for years has been contested between us and the Sultans of Malwa before finally falling into their hands in 1433.\nRumors of the bad conduct of the Malwan governor against the Muslim girls of his court have lately enflamed public opinion against him among our Muslim population. This might well the opportunity we have been waiting for...
translation: 在摩腊婆高原和赞普尔平原之间有一个名叫卡尔皮的小国。我们和摩腊婆曾经为了此地争夺数年，直至1433年最终落入他们手中。\n有传言说摩腊婆执政者对待穆斯林姑娘不雅的言行，在穆斯林人群中引起了不小的愤怒。这或许会是我们等待了许久的机会……

original: Demand to be given the right to punish Kalpi.

Emissaries of the Sultans of Jaunpur are claiming that the sultan of Kalpi, our vassal, has been conducting himself badly towards Muslim women and must be punished. The Jaunpuris would take the matter into their own hands and want to conduct a punitive expedition against Kalpi.\nWhile we have also heard rumors of the state of affairs in Kalpi this is a decision to consider carefully, Kalpi is an old contested zone between Jaunpur and Malwa and it does not seem unlikely that the Jaunpuris might have bigger plans than they let on.
translation: 来自赞普尔苏丹的使者声称，我们的附庸卡尔皮，对待穆斯林女子时有不雅的行径，应当受到惩罚。赞普尔人希望亲手讨伐卡尔皮。\n虽然我们也有听闻在卡尔皮发生的事情，但这应当是一个需要慎重思考的决定。卡尔皮是赞普尔和摩腊婆之间长久以来产生冲突的地区，赞普尔人看起来很可能会有，在他们请求的事情之外有更大的计划。

original: Allow the Jaunpuris to punish Kalpi
translation: 允许赞普尔人惩戒卡尔皮。
我们必须支持我们的附庸。
卡尔皮 —— 请求被许可

original: Malwa has agreed to let us punish the Sultan of Kalpi in the interest of better relations between our two states.
translation: 为寻求两国之间更好的关系，摩腊婆同意由我们来惩戒卡尔皮。

original: Malwa has made it clear that if we want to undertake any kind of punitive expedition against Kalpi we will have to fight them too.
translation: 摩腊婆严正表态，若我们想要对卡尔皮实施任何行动，我们也将和摩腊婆为敌。

original: Our country is prospering in the able hands of Bendahara Tun Perak.
translation: 盘陀诃罗敦霹雳出色的管理，使得我国国力蒸蒸日上。

original: Piracy in the Malay sea can often be a problem but right now we have matters in hand.
translation: 马来海上的劫掠行为长期以来都是一个难题，但如今我们已经能控制住它了。

original: In order to please the more orthodox elements of our religious establishment we have adopted a stricter interpretation of Islamic law less in line with the traditional laws of Malacca. This new direction for the Sultanate has, however, made many non-Muslims fear of becoming a marginalized part of our society.
translation: 为了讨好更多正统的宗教保守派，我们通过了一项与传统马六甲法律不同的更严厉的伊斯兰教法解释。不过国家的这一发展方向，让许多非穆斯林害怕成为社会中被排挤的对象。

original: Our decision to reduce all taxes on trade to practically nothing have stimulated economic growth and has led to our kingdom entering an unprecedented period of economic growth.
translation: 我们几乎废除一切贸易税收的决定刺激了经济的发展，使我国经济进入了前所未有的繁荣期。
针对易卜拉欣罗阇的密谋

original: The religious balance in an as cosmopolitan state as Malacca can be a very fragile thing. In our state traders of many religions and cultures live side by side yet still keep apart to a certain extent. The biggest communities, those of the Gujaratis, Tamils, Javanese and Chinese all have their own respective obligations to the state and keeping the influence of these groups in balance is one of the most important tasks of any Malaccan monarch.\nThe ascension of Raja Ibrahim in 1444 has therefore ruffled quite a few feathers. Ibrahim was a practicing Hindu and came to be seen by many as a traditionalist aiming to roll back the influence of Islam in our country. It still came as a big surprise when the young king was found dead in his palace today. Many suspect that his prime minister, the royal Bendahara, must've had a hand in this but little can be proven.
translation: 在一个像马六甲一样世界性的国家里，宗教平衡是一件非常脆弱的事情。在我们国家中，各种不同信仰的商人们生活在一起，但仍一定程度上的分隔着。其中最大的几个团体：古吉拉特人，泰米尔人，爪哇人和中国人都各自履行着对国家的义务。保证这些团体之间的平衡是每届马六甲君主最重要的人物之一。\n1444年易卜拉欣罗阇的登基激怒了不少的人。易卜拉欣是一个实打实的印度教徒，并且在许多人眼中是一个想要把伊斯兰影响赶出我们国家的传统派。但年轻的国王今天被发现死在宫中依然让人震惊。许多人猜测他的宰相，王室盘陀诃罗，一定与此事有关，但没有人能证明。

original: Raja Ibrahim will not be forgotten.
translation: 易卜拉欣罗阇不会被忘记。

original: Unlike the late Raja Ibrahim (by now known as Abu Syahid Shah, the martyred king) our new ruler is a Muslim and the trader communities in our city seem to be more accepting of his rule. Nonetheless a royal Bendahara that would plot against his liege is a frightening thing and we would be wise to replace this minister or risk meeting the same fate as his last master. Our trusted advisors all point to a young and successful general as a suitable replacement. Tun Perak is said to be wise for his years but above all he is also said to be extremely loyal.
translation: 不像之前的拉惹·易卜拉欣（如今被称作阿布沙希德沙，可怜的国王），我们的新统治者是一个穆斯林，看起来我们城市里的商人团体更欢迎他的统治。但是一个会对自己领主试试密谋的王室盘陀诃罗令人恐惧，我们必须聪明的换掉这位首相，不然将有可能面临和上一位君主一样的命运。我们值得信任的谋士都指名一位年轻有为的将军可以担当此任。传闻敦霹雳不仅足智多谋，而且更重要的是他十分忠诚。

original: Appoint a puppet and marginalize the Bendahara.
translation: 任命一名傀儡，将盘陀诃罗边缘化。

original: Keeping the seaways clear is an important priority for a state as dependent on trade as ours. Lately pirate activity has been on the rise again. Traditionally this is the kind of task that would be delegated to the trader communities in our city.
translation: 对于像我们一样依赖贸易的国家塞说，保持海路畅通是头等大事。近来海盗活动又开始死灰复燃。通常，治理海盗的任务会被委托给我们城市中的商人团体。

original: Assign the task to one of the trader communities.
translation: 将这项任务委派给一个商团。

original: We will use our own resources to sort this out.
translation: 我们会用自己的力量来解决这件事。

original: Malacca has in many ways been the center of the islamization of the Malay archipelago. Our state itself has, however, always avoided any stern or overly orthodox varieties of Islamic law in favor of keeping it an attractive spot for traders of all nationalities. Instead tradition is relied upon to be the law of the land while orthodox Islamic laws have been reserved for special cases, often related to keeping the public order. While this has upset some of those with more delicate religious sensibilities over the years it has been good for trade and has therefore been supported the Malaccan communities.\nOver time, however, Muslims have become more and more dominant in our state and due to its importance for the spread of Islam among the islands some have even begun to consider Malacca a pilgrimage site. Perhaps the time has come to introduce a bit more orthodoxy in the laws and customs of our state?
translation: 马六甲就许多方面来说，正处在马来群岛伊斯兰化的中心位置。但是我们国家却一直都在避免各种严格的或是过分正统的伊斯兰教法，以期吸引来自各个族群的商人。相反，我们传统上一直遵从当地法律，伊斯兰教法只在部分情况下才会使用，以保证公共秩序。在冒犯有敏感宗教感情的人的同时，这确实对贸易有许多好处，因此在马六甲的商团中一直受到支持。\n但是穆斯林随着时间慢慢成为了我们国家的主流，并且由于马六甲在传播伊斯兰教中的重要地位，许多人已经开始将马六甲视作朝圣的圣地。也许现在是时候在我们国家推广一些更为正统的法律和关税了？

original: Yes, in the name of Allah.
No, let us keep with our old traditions.
translation: 不，我们要保持我们的旧传统。

original: Trade is the sole occupation for our kingdom and to the surprise of many visitors we have little in the way of agriculture and have to import even basic foodstuffs. Despite this our kingdom is flourishing and ships from all over Asia come to our docks to sell, buy and resell all kinds of goods.\nIn order to further encourage trade the royal Bendahara has suggested that we lower customs and duties to almost nothing. This bold policy would set us apart even from other trade oriented kingdoms and would in his opinion secure our place as the greatest emporium of the East.
translation: 贸易是我国立国之根本。很多访客会吃惊我们国家几乎没有农业，需要进口哪怕是最基础的食物。尽管如此，我们王国依然兴兴向荣。来自亚洲各地的商船驶入我们港口买卖交易各类商品。\n为了进一步鼓励贸易，王室盘陀诃罗建议我们将关税和赋税减少到将近为零。这大胆的政策将会是我们和其他贸易王国区分开，盘陀诃罗认为这会巩固我们东方第一贸易大国的地位。

original: Malacca has nothing of its own, and has everything of the world.
translation: 马六甲不生产货物，但拥有世界上所有的货物。

original: We cannot afford to lower these fees.
translation: 我们无法承担降低税收。

original: While putting down some disturbances related to a man running amok in the countryside our Bendahara received unexpected aid from a local warrior today. When all the Bendahara's own guards had fled this man and his friends acted quickly and valiantly to save our minister. Moved by this deep loyalty to the state the Bendahara immediately appointed the young warrior, Hang Tuah, to the post of royal commander.\nOur kingdom has now gained the service of one of its greatest champions.
translation: 今天，我们的盘陀诃罗在平息一个在村子附近横冲直撞的人造成的麻烦时，得到了来自一位当地战士的意料之外的帮助。当盘陀诃罗的保镖们纷纷逃跑的时候，这名战士和他的朋友们迅速勇敢的就下了我们的宰相。盘陀诃罗被他为国尽忠的举动感动，当即任命这位年轻的战士，汉都亚，担任王室指挥官。\n我们王国最伟大的拥护者之一如今在效力王室。

original: May our people never vanish from this earth.
translation: 希望我们的人民永远不会从地上消失。

original: Ships from distant shores is no rare thing in Malacca yet today an unusual visitor arrived in our city. The captain presents himself as coming from a Christian kingdom far to the west known as Portugal and wants to sign a trade agreement by which his country would become one of the most favored trading partners of our state.\nThe Muslim Gujarati community, however, is propagating very strongly that the man is dangerous and that his country is a sworn enemy to our religion. The Gujaratis are so vehemently opposed to Portuguese presence here that they have already begun to act with open hostility towards the newcomers, confiscating their goods and boarding their ships. There is a risk that this could get out of hand very quickly...
translation: 远道而来的船只在马六甲并非新鲜事，但是今天有一位不寻常的访客来到了我们城市。船长表示他来自一个遥远的西方基督教国度，名唤葡萄牙，希望签署一项成为我国最惠贸易伙伴的协议。\n但是古吉拉特穆斯林商团则大肆宣扬此人十分危险，他的国家与我们的宗教是不共戴天的仇敌。古吉拉特人十分反感葡萄牙人在此出现，甚至已经开始对新来的访客公开表示敌意，没收他们的货物，登上他们的商船。这一情况有可能很快就会超出控制……

original: Lambaste the Gujaratis and attempt to save the situation.
translation: 责备古吉拉特人，并试图挽回现状。

original: We must not allow the Portuguese to gain a hold in this part of the world.
translation: 我们不能让葡萄牙人在世界的这一隅得到份额。

original: The incident is going to be perceived as slightly LESS BAD by Portugal.
translation: 葡萄牙对这场事变的态度开始好转。

original: The incident is going to be perceived to be WORSE by Portugal.
translation: 葡萄牙对这场骚乱得态度变得更糟。

original: Word has reached us that the Sultanate of Malacca have confiscated the cargo of visiting Portuguese ships. We fear our old enemies in the Muslim world have gotten to them first and poisoned their minds against us.
translation: 有消息说马六甲苏丹国没收了来访葡萄牙船只的货物。恐怕我们的穆斯林到敌人先接触到了他们，并且洗脑了他们对我们的态度。

original: Coldest period of the Little Ice Age

The winters have been getting longer and colder for as long as anyone can remember. As ice and snow once again creep further south this winter crops are becoming ruined, wine is spoiled and the fish have begun migrating to warmer waters.
translation: 冬天越来越长越来越冷，已经超出了所有人记忆中的冬天。当冰与雪又一次慢慢冻住南方，这次冬季作物将会凋零。葡萄酒开始变质，鱼群开始迁移到更暖的水域。

original: Coldest Period of the Little Ice Age

Developments in bottle making have allowed Wine producers to create bottles in more standardized sizes and as a result have been able to reintroduce the use of the bottle cork. This is a much more efficient way to seal in the wine than the old cloth stoppers and has meant that wine can now be transported over much farther distances than was previously considered possible. Perhaps we are now seeing the birth of a worldwide wine trade.
translation: 玻璃瓶技术制造的发展令葡萄酒生产商们可以制作尺寸更标准的瓶子，使得回收利用软木塞成为可能。这比用布瓶塞更为高效，并且意味着葡萄酒可以被运输到更远的地方。或许我们正在见证全球葡萄酒贸易的开端。

original: Growth of the International Wine Trade
translation: 国际葡萄酒贸易的增长。

original: A new technique for fabric production have begun to emerge among the clothworkers of $COUNTRY$. The so called 'New Draperies' are much thinner, lighter and cheaper than the thick woolens that used to be in demand. While demand is on the rise for these new products their productions makes use of considerably less wool and as a result prices have been declining.
translation: 一种新的编织工艺在 $COUNTRY$ 的纺织工中逐渐形成。这种被称为「新布料」的布匹比过去需求的毛织品更轻、更薄、更便宜。对这种新商品需求上升的同时，生产它们所需要的羊毛比过去显著地减少，导致布匹价格下降。

original: The enlistment armies of old are increasingly being replaced by more permanent national armies. As part of this process many states have begun to regulate how the uniforms of their soldiers should look and some have even begun to provide these uniforms themselves to their soldiers. Dye was never cheap and with the increased demand now put on both dyes and cloth prices are on the rise.
translation: 过往时代的征召兵正在逐渐被永久性的国家军队所取代。这个进程中的一部分象征就是许多国家规定了士兵制服的样式，有一些国家甚至自制制服提供给士兵。染料向来不便宜，现在随着需求的提升，染料和布匹的价格会进一步提升。

original: Our explorers report that over the Grand Banks of Newfoundland they have found waters teaming with thousands upon thousands of fishes just waiting to be caught! Fishing expeditions are headed to these waters in greater and greater numbers and markets are awash with an unimaginable supply of Fish.
translation: 我们的探险家报告说在纽芬兰的大浅滩他们发现了一块水域，那里有成千上万的鱼类可供捕捉！越来越多的捕鱼者涌向那篇海域，市场上充斥着不可想象数量的鱼类。

original: The steady supply of Indian cottons has begun to result in some big changes in European cloth consumption. Muslins, calicoes and other cotton cloths are being sold at higher and higher prices in the European markets.
translation: 印度棉布的稳定供应逐渐开始对欧洲棉布消费产生重大改变。平纹细布，白棉布以及其他棉布在欧洲市场上的价格越来越高。

original: The demand for furs has been constantly rising throughout the middle ages and an increasingly colder climate has not done anything to change this lately. Because of this the European beaver population is having trouble coping with the constantly growing demand for furs. It has gotten to the point that beavers are very rarely seen in Europe at all and furs now have to be imported at great cost from Russia and the far north.
translation: 中世纪以来对皮毛的要求就在持续上升，而近来越来越冷的气候只让这一趋势更加明显。由于这个原因，欧洲海狸的种群数量正随着对皮毛需求的上升逐渐衰减。人们已经注意到欧洲已经很难看到海狸了，现在不得不从俄罗斯以及更北端进口高价的皮毛。

original: Beaver fur is an excellent material for hat-making. It keeps warmth and can hold its shape well even in rough weather and over long times. Rising demand for felt hats along with the complicated process involved in making them has led to the growth of a healthy hatmaking sector in our economy.
translation: 用海狸的毛皮来制造帽子想必是极好的。保温性能佳，即使在恶劣气候下也能长期维持形状不变。对毡帽的需求逐渐增加，制造它们的流程也不简单。总之制帽产业已经成为我们经济中的一个重要的盈利部门。

original: Permanent navies have gone from being exceptional cases to becoming the norm. The institutions devoted to the control of these new navies are beginning to take a much more active part in the procurement of supplies for the construction, rationing and upkeep of their ships.
translation: 常设海军已经从特例走向常态。为这些常设海军专门成立的部门正越来越活跃，他们负责采购补给，建造和维护战船。

original: The bronze cannon has made its entrance on the battlefield and is here to stay. The materials needed to feed the growing cannon-making industries have led to an explosion in the demand for copper over the last few years and prices have risen as a result.
translation: 随着铜炮在战场上大发神威，制炮场对于黄铜的需求也水涨船高。近几年内，黄铜的需求量估计都会居高不下。

original: Tea drinking is far from a new element in Japanese culture. The continued development of the Japanese Tea Ceremony during the 16th century, however, has led to the drink now becoming commonplace throughout Japanese society.
translation: 在日本文化中饮茶的习俗源远流长。十六世纪日本茶道的不断发展使得饮茶成为日本社会中常见的社交仪式。

original: With an increasing amount of competitors in the spice market the availability of the once extremely rare spices of the east have increased drastically in the west. While some have tried to stabilize the Spice prices by burning what they produce or imposing stricter rules for its export it now seems clear that the profitability of the business has taken a permanent downturn.
translation: 随着香料市场竞争者的增加，曾经稀有的东方香料的供应量在西方市场大幅增长。尽管有些人试图通过烧毁部分产品或者严格控制进口量来稳定香料的价格，这项生意的利润已经永远不会像过去那样高了。

original: Sugar was once a rare luxury that had to be imported from the Maghreb or the Middle East. As the world has opened up and the purchasing power of our urban class has increased, sugar may still be considered a luxury, but quite an affordable one.
translation: 蔗糖曾经是一种稀有的奢侈物，需要从马格里布或者中东地区进口。现在新世界的大门已经打开，我们城市阶层的购买力也增加了，蔗糖也许仍然被视为一种奢侈品，但能够负担它的人已经很多了。

original: Silk has been in high demand throughout the world since long before the middle ages and its procurement was one of the driving forces behind the voyages of discovery in the east. With the greater availability of silk, both raw and woven, the demand for Silk cloth in the west is soaring ever higher.
translation: 在中世纪之前很久，全世界的人们都渴求丝绸，获取它成了探索东方的源动力之一。随着生丝和丝织物供应量的加大，西方对于丝绸衣服的渴望更加高涨。
孟加拉染料作物种植园

original: Our direct control over some of the dye producing areas of northern India has attracted a number of fortune seekers aiming to expand the production into our lands in Bengal. Some parts of Bengal would seem ideal to grow Indigo and most seem to judge that it is likely that these efforts will be successful if allowed. Growing Indigo and process of turning the plants into dye is hard work, however, and allowing these unscrupulous people free reins here might lead to difficulties down the road.
translation: 我们在北印度掌握的几个染料生产区域吸引了一些淘金者，他们的目的是把这些作物推广到我们在孟加拉的土地。孟加拉的一些区域看起来很适合种植靛蓝，目前来看只要允许种植肯定能收获不少。然而，种植靛蓝，把它变成染料是一项艰辛的工作，而且给予这些亡命之徒过多自由说不定会在将来引起麻烦。

original: Restrict the creation of new Plantations.

Initially many types of tropical wood would be considered too brittle by woodworkers. With the development of veneering, however, it has become possible to make use of Ebony and other tropical woods selected for their beauty rather than their strength. As a result the creation of beautiful and original cabinets and other prestige furniture from tropical woods has grown into a major business.
translation: 最初，许多类型的热带木材会被木工认为太脆。然而，随着镶木技术的发展，有着华美外形但没有强度的乌木和其他热带木材也有了被选择的可能性。这导致了通过热带木材制造的美丽的原生态橱柜和其他名贵家具成为了一项大产业。

original: Declining Elephant Populations in South East Asia

After many years of slow declining the Elephant population of South East Asia is now at an all time low. The demand for Elephants and Ivory products in both South East Asia and China has, however, never faltered and as a result the price of elephants and their ivory is rising.
translation: 多年以来东南亚的大象种群数量不断减少，现在已经是史上最低的时候了。东南亚和中国对大象和象牙的需求从未减少，导致大象和象牙的价格不断攀升。

original: Various advances in the field of ironworking have meant that the iron cannon is now both more efficient and reliable than the old bronze cannons. As iron products are also increasingly replacing copper in other fields, such as for mealtime utensils, the price of copper has been dropping while the demand for Iron is on the rise.
translation: 铁加工技术的多种进步意味着现在的铁炮比旧式的铜炮更加有效且可靠。随着铁制品在其他场合也开始逐渐取代铜制品，例如餐具等等，铜的价格正在下降，而对铁的需求量却在上升。

original: The use of Cocoa to create a hot beverage is a custom inherited from the American natives. While the new drink caught on quickly in some parts of European society it has taken some time, and large amounts of sugar, before it reached a larger acceptance. With that out of the way, however, the demand for chocolate is now steadily increasing in the old world.
translation: 使用可可制作成热饮是从美洲原住民那里学来的习俗。这种新的饮料很快抓住欧洲社会的部分人的胃口，大量的糖也开始被需求。在旧大陆对巧克力的需求正在逐渐增加。

original: Originally marketed as a medicinal plant Tobacco has come to be increasingly popular in both the Christian and Muslim world for its recreational purposes. From Paris to Bengal the habit has grown to such an extent that the tobacco business is becoming quite lucrative.
translation: 烟草最初被当做是一种药物，现在它作为消遣道具，在基督教和穆斯林世界变得越来越受欢迎。从巴黎到孟加拉烟草生意的利润变得非常丰厚。

original: For centuries coffee has been a product exclusively grown and exported from Yemen and Ethiopia. The merchants of Yemen in particular have had such a strong grip over the coffee trade that they have gone to great lengths to stop anyone from bringing the plant across their borders.\nJust as the silk worm once traveled west along the trade routes, so too has the coffee plant come to be in the possession of our merchants. The plantations in [java_coffee_here.GetName] have begun to produce a significant amount of coffee, making beans much more readily available.
translation: 几个世纪以来咖啡仅在也门和埃塞俄比亚种植和出口。实际上也门的商人们牢牢把握着咖啡贸易，并且不远万里地阻止咖啡植株的流出。\n正如蚕种随着商路去往西方，咖啡植株也被我们的商人掌握了。[java_coffee_here.GetName]的咖啡树已开始大量的产出咖啡，这些咖啡豆现在更容易获得了。

original: The merchants that once came to our ports to procure coffee now have other options, and while [mocha.GetCapitalName] remains an important port in its own right it is no longer the main entrepot for coffee beans in the world.
translation: 到我们这个港口采买咖啡的商人们现在有了别的去处，虽然[mocha.GetCapitalName]本身还是一个重要的港口，但它已不再是首屈一指的咖啡豆转口港了。

original: Let us hope the [From.GetAdjective] merchants choke on their vile concoctions.
translation: 我们盼着[From.GetAdjective]商人们自食苦果！

original: While paper is superior to parchment in many ways, it has never entirely been able to displace it. However, with the popularization of the Printing Press, books, pamphlets and even playing cards have become commonplace, in a way they never have before. The art of producing paper itself has also become far more refined over the last decades and these two things now coincide to make paper much more sought after than ever before.\nPerhaps the most visible example of this is the bookmarket of [bookmarket_here.GetCapitalName], which seems to grow larger every year. Originally a fair for the printers of [bookmarket_here.GetAreaName], the fair now sees visitors from the entire continent.
translation: 虽然纸张在很多方面优于羊皮纸，它还是不能完全地取而代之。然而，随着印刷机的流行，书籍，小册子甚至是纸牌都变得更加且空前的寻常。造纸术在过去的几十年里更加完善，这两者使得纸张比以往更受追捧。\n可能最明显的例子就是[bookmarket_here.GetCapitalName]的书市了，它的规模每年都在变大。这本来只是[bookmarket_here.GetAreaName]本地印刷商的展会，现在却有着来自整个大陆的参观者。

original: [bookmarket_here.GetCapitalName] truly is the greatest bookmarket in the world.
This will benefit the entire province.

translation: 现代印刷业和出版业的成长

original: For centuries paper mills have relied on mechanical hammers to beat lumpen paper pulp, crushing the fiber to create the raw material needed to then create paper.\nUsing the local windmills for power, enterprising artisans in [hollender_beater_province.GetName] have now devised a more efficient solution. What they call the [Root.GetAdjective] Beater, is a vat with a wind-powered horizontal roller with blades. These blades can shred as much pulp in hours as the old hammers did in days.
translation: 几个世纪以来造纸厂依靠机械锤来捣捶成浆，破碎纤维来获得造纸的原材料。\n[hollender_beater_province.GetName]进去的工匠们利用风车的动力实现了一种更加高效的方法。就是他们口中的[Root.GetAdjective]打浆机，它是一个大桶里有着风力驱动的带叶片的水平辊。这些叶片一小时内打出来的纸浆就抵得上从前的捣锤一天的量。

original: The Paper Market will never be the same.
translation: 纸业市场永远地改变了。

original: Beaters Replacing Hammers for Paper Production
translation: 造纸业中打浆机代替了捣锤

original: Bureaucrats have long favored paper over parchment and other materials due to how much easier it is to work with. There are also various measures that can be taken to make official papers harder to falsify. The invention of the watermark in Fabriano is one, the elaborate marbling techniques and calligraphy of the Islamic paper producers another.\nAs Empires increasingly come to grow to encompass more than one continent this need for provable authenticity and ease of use has lead to Imperial Bureaucracies from China to Europe exclusively using paper for official documents and orders.
translation: 官僚们长久以来垂青于使用纸张而非羊皮纸或者别的材料，因为纸张用起来简单得多。并且有着很多方法让公文难以被伪造。法布里亚诺的水印就是这样一种发明，精致的大理石花纹技术和伊斯兰造纸商的书法也是这样的技术。\n随着帝国扩展到了其他大洲，对文件的可证实性和易用性让从中国到欧洲的帝国官僚机构无一例外的使用纸张记录官方文件和政令。
借阅图书馆和图书俱乐部

original: With literacy on the rise, the spread and dissemination of books has become an objective both for economical and, ideological reasons. Booksellers have become a much more common sight in many cities in general, and in large ones such as [lending_libraries_here.GetName] there are entire shop streets lined with boxes of books for sale.\nFor those that could not afford to buy books themselves there are now an increasing number of ways to lend or co-finance book purchases, such as paid lending-libraries, book buying cooperatives, or subscription societies.
translation: 随着识字率的提高，书籍的传播和普及已经成为经济上和思想上的双重目标。书商基本上在许多城市都成为了一个非常普遍的行业，在[lending_libraries_here.GetName]这样的大城市里会有一整条街市排列着装满书的箱子等待贩售。\n对那些负担不起购买书籍的人来说，现在有着越来越多的方法借阅或者合购书籍，比如付费借阅的图书馆，购书合作社或者订阅社团。

original: Can the masses really be trusted with the written word?
translation: 能把书写的权利交给大众吗？
租借图书馆和图书俱乐部

original: With the colonization of the Americas a wide range of new seeds, crops and animals are starting to spread between the New World and the old. From the first moment of introduction crops such as maize, manioc and tomatoes are now spreading over the entire old world, just as Non-American beasts of burden are becoming ever-more sought after in the new world.\nAs lands that were once considered unfit for growing anything, either for part of the year or in some cases ever before, are put to use in the production of food and cereals, the general availability of food in the world is higher than ever before. Few things in this century will bring as much benefit to the common man, as grown food is now much less scarce than it once was.
translation: 伴随着美洲殖民化的进程，各色新的种子、作物和牲畜开始在新大陆和旧大陆间互相传播开来。从引进的那一刻起，像玉米、木薯和番茄这样的作物正在整个旧大陆扩散，非美洲原产的各类驮兽在新大陆也变得愈发司空见惯了。\n往日公认的不毛之地，如今也在各自不同合适的时节产出粮食，世界粮食总产量因此空前高涨。食物再也不像以往那样短缺了，本世纪鲜有别的事物能像这样为普罗大众带来这么大的好处。

original: Gem-cutting masters in [diamond_city.GetCapitalName] have made a breakthrough in diamond cutting by experimenting with diamond dust suspended in oil on their scaifs. This is allowing the [Root.GetAdjective] artisans to cut the rare stones in entirely new shapes and to much greater brilliance. The resulting technique, known as faceting, produces a stone of a more pleasing geometric shape and with better optical qualities. As the new stones, and the technique for making them, spread across courts and workshops the demand for jewelry, diamonds and precious stones is increasing greatly.
translation: [diamond_city.GetCapitalName]的宝石切割师在试验中将钻石粉尘与橄榄油混合后涂抹在磨轮上，从而在钻石切割领域取得了重大突破。[Root.GetAdjective]的工匠借此得以将宝石切出全新的造型，其光泽也更加闪亮。由此产生的被称为刻面的技术，能加工出几何形状更惹人喜欢、光学质量更好的宝石。新工艺和用它加工的宝石分别在各地的工坊和宫廷中逐渐流传开来，人们对钻石和宝石的需求与日俱增。

original: Diamonds, a type of stone so durable that it cannot even be polished, save from using its own dust, has long been the most rare of all precious stones. For centuries India has been the only known source of Diamonds in the entire world, and even there it is only found in a few well guarded mining regions.\nWith the discovery of large quantities of diamonds in inland South America, however, diamonds have become something not only for kings and princes, but also for rich magnates, burghers or other connoisseurs of jewelry.
translation: 钻石是一种非常结实的石头，除了使用自己的碎屑之外，它甚至不能被打磨，长久以来都是所有珍贵的石头中最罕见的. 几个世纪以来，印度一直是世界上唯一已知的钻石来源，即使在那里也只有少数几个保护的好的矿区才能找到.\n然而，随着在南美洲内陆发现的大量钻石，钻石不仅成为国王和诸侯的东西，也成为富有的贵族，市民或其他珠宝鉴赏家的东西

original: Protestant and Reformed Churches Reject Incense
translation: 新教和改革宗的教堂拒绝使用熏香

original: Many Reformed and Protestant theologians have come to reject not only the elaborately decorated nature of Catholic churches but also the use of incense in religious rituals. The use of scents, candles, and incense is now increasingly considered sacrilege and as a result the demand for all types of incense that for over a thousand years have pulled frankincense and myrrh from the east to Europe has finally begun to decrease.
translation: 许多改革宗和新教神学家不仅抛弃了天主教教堂复杂华丽的装饰，而且还拒绝在宗教仪式中使用熏香。香水，香薰蜡烛和熏香的使用现在被渐渐地视为一种亵渎 。在过去的一千年里，欧洲对香料的需求使得乳香和没药源源不断地从东方运往欧洲。而这一现象在近些年来终于开始减少了。

original: Reformed and Protestant Rejection of Incense
translation: 新教和改革宗拒绝使用熏香

original: A growing merchant class as well as increasingly demanding social code among the nobility and upper classes has lead to an increased demand for perfume. The halls of grand palaces are now expected to have a likable scent as well as a majestic decour. This has lead to a surge in demand for products such as frankincense, myrrh and other scented products for the making of perfume and in [perfume_city_grass.GetCapitalName], the refinement of local flowers and foreign scented goods have even grown into a major industry in itself.
translation: 不断增长的商人阶层以及贵族和上流社会中越来越严格的社交规则导致对香水的需求增加.现在预计大宫殿会有一个吸引人的香味和雄伟的装饰 . 在[perfume_city_grass.GetCapitalName]导致对乳香，没药和其他香料产品需求的猛增,本地花卉和外国香料的精制甚至已经发展为一个主要产业 .

original: They certainly have a good nose for things like this.
translation: 对于这种事他们肯定有很棒的嗅觉

original: Through the scientific and very aggressive breeding of horses, pigs, cows and sheep, [Root.GetAdjective] farmers have begun to create entirely new types of animals, more specialized for the various tasks they are to perform. For centuries various regions have had famous breeds of livestock but with the new methods now being pioneered it has become evident how easy it is for man to create specific improvements in the animals.\nAs a result the cattle trade is being revitalized, with a drastic increase in the quality of sold animals rather than just the quantity of animals sold.
translation: 通过对马，猪，牛和羊的科学和非常积极的育种，[Root.GetAdjective] 的农民开始创造全新的动物类型，更专业化的履行各种任务.几个世纪以来，各地都有着名的家畜品种，但随着现在开创的新方法的出现，人们已经很清楚在动物身上创造了特别的改进是多么容易.\n因此，牛的贸易正在恢复活力，销售动物的质量大大提高，而不仅仅是出售的动物的数量.

original: Ever since the 13th century spectacles made from glass lenses have come to replace the reading stones of older eras. Through thorough optical observation these lenses have now reached a level of perfection that has allowed even the smallest of things to be enlarged.\nTo the delight of scholars these new lenses can also be used to create both optical microscopes, allowing them to examine what could never be seen before, and the refracting telescope, allowing study of far-away objects such as the stars. The field of optics is now at the brink of a revolution, bringing great benefits both to science, navigation and warfare.
translation: 自十三世纪以来，用玻璃镜片制成的眼镜取代了旧时代的阅读石. 通过深入的光学观察，这些镜片现在已经达到了完美的程度，甚至允许最小的东西被放大.\n令学者们高兴的是，这些新的镜片也可以用来制作光学显微镜，使他们能够观察以前从未见过的东西，还有折射式望远镜，可以研究远处的物体，比如恒星. 光学领域正处于革命的边缘，给科学，航海和战争带来巨大的好处.

original: We can now see things far away as if they were nearby.
translation: 我们现在能看到远方就像他们在面前一样

original: Glassmakers in [glass_province.GetName] have started using flintstone and sand together with lead to create a clear, easily worked and flawless product. This new method is rapidly challenging the existing major glass producing centers in the world as the markets are flooded in the new, and very popular product.
translation: [glass_province.GetName]的玻璃制造者已经开始使用燧石，沙子和铅一起制造一个晶莹的，易于工作的和无瑕疵的产品. 这种新方法正在迅速挑战世界上现有的主要玻璃生产中心，因为市场会在新的和受欢迎的产品中被淹没

original: Over time, technology has greatly increased the output of existing coal mines as well as making it possible to mine coal in many places where it would previously have been unfeasible. Our coal mines are working at an unprecedented efficiency and while the continued industrialization still means that coal is in great demand this demand can now more easily be met.
translation: 技术进步导致已开采的煤矿产量不断快速增加，也使得许多过去无法开采的矿区得到开发。我们的煤矿正已前所未有的效率运作，且随着工业化持续，煤的需求依然旺盛，而需求缺口更容易被填补。
扎格纳特与加亚帕蒂王国

original: More than any other deity Jagannath is connected to the people of Orissa and more than any other deity this, the greatest avatar of Vishnu, is connected to our dynasty. Each Gajapati king is supported by Jagannath and his priests and the temple at Puri grows richer by the year due to royal patronage.
translation: 在奥里萨民众心中查伽纳什是最息息相关的神祇，而且比任何其他神灵都重要。他是毗湿奴最伟大的化身，与我们的王朝有关。每个加贾帕蒂国王都需要得到查伽纳什和其祭司的支持，由于王室的赞助，普里的寺庙正逐年变得更加富裕。

original: We have temporarily stopped the traditional salt tax. While this has robbed us of a major source of income for the state the popularity of our dynasty and our monarch has benefited greatly from this move.
translation: 我国停止征收盐税。这一举措虽然导致我国收入缩水，但是也使民众归心。

original: After years of warfare our people are tired and want to live their lives in peace.
translation: 这些年来的穷兵黩武使人民难以忍受

original: This province supports a pretender against our rule.
The Gajapatis and the cult of Jagannath
translation: 加亚帕蒂王国和贾格纳斯崇拜

original: The ceremonies at the great temple in Puri and the log in which Jagannath manifests himself have at times been ridiculed and mocked by foreign rulers, but in Orissa Jagannath, the 'Lord of the Universe' is undisputedly the most popular deity.\nThe support of Jagannath and his priests have also been unwavering for Raja Kapilendra, the founder of our dynasty. Now the time has come for our dynasty to repay this debt, we should patronize the temple at Puri and elevate the worship of Jagannath as the primary cult in our kingdom.
translation: 即使外邦君主时常嘲笑奚落乃至诋毁查伽纳什神庙中的宗教仪式、典籍经节，\n「世界之主」查伽纳什在奥里萨仍是最重要的一位神祗。拉者 Kapilendra，正是依托着查伽纳什教团的支持方得以上位。现如今，作为回报，是时候将查伽纳什奉为我国主神了。

original: Let us not put all of our eggs in one basket.

When Kapilendra Deva overthrew the last of the Eastern Ganga Kings in 1434 Orissa was in a sad state. Muslim incursions from the north and west as well as rivalry with other neighbors to the south had reduced the kingdom greatly. Since then Raja Kapilendra has quickly turned all of that around. In consecutive wars with Bengal, the Reddys of Andhra, the Bahmani Sultans and the Vijayanagar empire, Orissa has grown in both size and strength under his leadership.\nThis constant warfare has, however, taken its toll on the population of our kingdom and an unusually bad harvest season has now resulted in growing popular unrest. It has been suggested that the public mood would be improved if we temporarily lifted the traditional Salt tax and otherwise devoted our attention to the public good a bit more.
translation: 卡皮伦德拉·德瓦揭竿而起之时，奥里萨已然国将不国。卡皮伦德拉登基之时，强敌环伺，国土沦丧泰半。经过我王多年征战，光复故土、海内归心，敌国皆望风丧胆。\n然而这般穷兵黩武的代价，便是民不聊生、经济衰退。解决之法，便只有暂免盐税，藏富于民。

original: We don't need the Salt tax.
We cannot bow to public pressure.
translation: 我们不能屈服于公众的压力。

original: After a long life the great warrior king Kapilendra lies on his deathbed. To the shock of his 18 legitimate sons, however, the old king, guided by the voice of Jagannath, has elected to make his illegitimate son Purushottama his heir.\nAs the king draws his last breath the royal succession is far from assured as Hamvira, the favorite candidate until this date, has fled to the south where he has taken up arms against Purushottama.
translation: 一生戎马的卡皮伦德拉王终于只能躺在病榻上了，他遵循主宰神的指引欲将王位传给私生子普鲁绍塔玛，令他的18位合法王子无比震惊。\n当旧王咽下最后一口气的时候普鲁绍塔玛的王座仍然脆弱不堪——最受拥戴的争位者哈姆维拉已在南部举起了针对他的叛旗。

original: We must follow the will of Jagannath!
translation: 吾等当遵从主宰神的旨意！

original: Our neighbors will learn of this and react accordingly.
translation: 我们的邻国很快就会得知此事并作出反应。

original: Word has reached us that Kapilendra, the warrior king of Orissa, is dead and it seems his sons are fighting for his throne, leaving the kingdom weak and exposed.
translation: 消息传来，善战的卡皮伦德拉王去世了，似乎他的儿子们正在为宝座打得不可开交，使得整个王国防备虚弱。

original: A messenger arrived today from Hamvira, a contender for the throne of Orissa. If we support him in his struggle to secure the throne of Orissa for himself Hamvira claims he will grant us a number of important forts in the east.
translation: 奥里萨的王位争夺者哈姆维拉派来的使者今天到达，他承诺会割让东部重地给我国以换取对他战争的援助。
巴赫曼尼扶持哈姆维拉。

original: The Bahmani sultan, an old enemy of our kingdom, has decided to back Hamvira. We can't know for sure what he has been promised but if rumors are to be believed Hamvira has been desperate enough to promise the Bahmanis a large part of our country.
translation: 我们的世仇——巴赫曼尼的苏丹，决定扶持哈姆维拉。虽然没有确切证据，但是据说他已经狗急跳墙，许诺要出卖一大片国土给巴赫曼尼。

original: Best make sure he doesn't win then.
translation: 那就打得他什么也拿不出来。

original: As the armies of Hamvira, the pretender, take control of the capital the civil war seems to be coming to an end. In the south the Bahmani sultan has acted quickly by sending troops to garrison the new forts that they have been promised.
translation: 篡权者哈姆维拉的军队控制了首都，内战似乎到此为止了。南方的巴赫曼尼苏丹也迅速派兵进驻了许给他们的地盘。

original: With the civil war in Orissa coming to an end we have now managed to take control over the areas promised to us by Hamvira.
translation: 奥里萨的内战结束，我们的部队也控制了哈姆维拉承诺给我们的土地。

original: With the departure of the Gajapatis from the throne of Orissa the close bond between the state and Jagannath and his priests has been cut. While the temple in Puri and the worship of this deity himself remain important to the cultural and spiritual life of Orissa it is no longer as closely tied to the monarchy itself.
translation: 象王宾天，Jagannath与王室的紧密关系受到破坏，再也不会亲密如初了。

original: Up until now Sanskrit has been the only language of literature in Orissa, with the colloquial Oriya language being reserved for the Shudras and lower castes. Sarala Das, a retired soldier with little formal education has begun to change this, however, by translating the Mahabharata into Oriya. Sarala Das' original work is also exclusively in Oriya and other poets have now begun to take up this practice.
translation: 到目前为止，梵语一直是奥里萨唯一的文学语言，而奥里萨方言则被视为是首陀罗和低种姓所使的语言。然而一位受过良好教育的退役士兵婆若罗-达什，开始改变凭借自身的学识将《摩诃婆罗多》译成奥里萨语。婆若罗-达什不多的作品也都是以奥里萨语所作，许多诗人也纷纷开始效仿。

original: A poet, seer and prolific author has been gaining popularity as a Vaisnava saint in our kingdom. Achyutananda is said to be able to foretell the future and his books are written in Oriya, the language of the people.
translation: 一位用奥黎萨文作诗的多产诗人，Achytananda，被认定为Vaisnava宗先见，他所写的预言书、诗歌皆以奥黎萨语写就。

original: In order to placate the many foreign traders in our state we have begun to weed out unorthodox religious practices. While this may be to our advantage in the long run it is currently undermining the legitimacy of our own dynasty, which is rooted in these traditions, and creating tensions between the many religious groups in our state at the same time.
translation: 为了安抚外商，我们摒弃了一些传统。长远来讲，这定是一件利国利民的好事。然则，现在，这一政策受到了各界宗教人士的巨大反弹。我国王室的合法性也因此受到了怀疑。

original: This city has been attacked and sacked by the Zimba people and the local economy suffers while it is being rebuilt and repopulated.
translation: 津巴人攻陷了城市并烧杀抢掠，对本地经济造成了巨大的打击。

original: The Chronicle of Kilwa is a book that records the history of our dynasty from its origins before arriving in Kilwa up until the present day. It is a document that proves our legitimate right to rule the ports of the Swahili coast without a shadow of a doubt.
translation: 基尔瓦编年史乃我国王族史，记录我们王朝如何来到基尔瓦，从其起源记录至今。它亦证明了我王是斯瓦希里沿岸不容置疑的合法统治者。

original: Shirazi Islam and the Patricians of Kilwa
translation: 设拉子人的伊斯兰教和基尔瓦贵族

original: Most of the Swahili states are to this day ruled by dynasties that claim to be descended from the first Islamic migration into this region. The Islam practiced by these 'Shirazis', as they call themselves, is, however, not the most orthodox form of the religion. Many older local ceremonies are performed daily in our court and the Shirazi lineages are considered to have magical abilities that give them the right to rule these cities.\nAs the wealth of Kilwa and the other Swahili states grows, however, new waves of foreigners continue to arrive in great numbers. Traders from Oman, Persia, the Bahmani kingdom and other faraway lands have made our cities their home and a rising class of indigenous merchants has made these groups their partners. Many of the newcomers are abhorred by our traditions. If we would adopt a more orthodox form of Islam this would certainly help our relations with the other states of the Indian Ocean, but there is a very real risk that it would undermine our own rule and hurt relations with the other Swahili states.
translation: 绝大多数斯瓦西里城邦王朝都声称自己是「设拉子人」的后代。设拉子人是第一批迁徙到斯瓦西里的穆斯林的后裔。然而，他们所信奉的伊斯兰教不是那么正统。宫廷中每天都在举行古老的本地仪式，而设拉子人的血脉被认为具有魔力，这给予了他们统治这些城市的权利。\n随着斯瓦西里地区经济的迅猛发展，来自阿曼、波斯、巴赫曼尼王国和其他遥远国度的巨商们蜂拥而至，在我们的城市安家，而一群正在崛起的本土商人也正把他们当做合作伙伴。然而许多外来者与我国的传统互斥。若是我国采用更正统的伊斯兰教形式，定能使我们与其他印度洋国家的关系大为改善。但相对的，我们也很可能遭到传统势力与邻邦的反弹与抨击。

original: We must follow the ways of our ancestors.
translation: 我们必须遵循祖先的道路。

original: Let us purge our kingdom of pagan beliefs and ceremonies.
translation: 让我们清除王国内的异教信仰与仪式。

original: With more and more foreign traders arriving in the Swahili coast from orthodox Islamic states our old Shirazi ways have come more and more under fire. We have watched with disgust as some of the old Shirazi dynasties of the Swahili coast have been overthrown by a rising class of indigenous traders allied with the newcomers.\nAs one of the oldest and most powerful Shirazi dynasties, however, we still stand strong. In order to suitably impress foreigners and domestic troublemakers alike it might be best if we assigned our scribes to create a chronicle over our famous lineage, so that none may doubt our Shirazi origin and the old Islamic roots of our dynasty.
translation: 常驻在我国的中东富商开始对我们所信奉的设拉子教派口诛笔伐，甚至伙同土著势力颠覆了几个设拉子人王国。\n我国根基牢固，现在并不需要担心。但是，如果我们能够捏造...呃不...编写一本编年史，说明绿教乃我国立国之本且我王乃正宗的阿拉伯人... 这群家伙应该就不会来找我们麻烦了吧...

original: Let us create such a Chronicle.
translation: 让我们也创造一部这样的编年史。

original: We have more important matters to attend.
translation: 我们还有更重要的事去做。

original: In the process of reforming the religious establishment of our kingdom we have come to the point where we will need to make a choice in regards to which tradition we should try to emulate. Our kingdom is home to Persian Shiites, Ibadi traders from Oman as well as Indian and Turkish Sunni traders. Apart from theological considerations the form of Islam we will associate with is likely to shape the foreign policy of our kingdom for years to come.
translation: 我们到了选择派别的关头了。我们无法在什叶派波斯巨商、伊巴德派阿曼商人以及来自印度与土耳其的逊尼派突厥商旅间继续左右逢源了。是时候该做个决定了。交好任意一派都会在外交、宗教层面上对我国产生巨大影响。

original: Our current reforms have been enough.
translation: 我们目前的改革已经足够了！

original: Let us align with the Ibadis.
We should invite Sunni scholars to help reform our kingdom.
translation: 快让逊尼派毛拉来教导我们

original: While our kingdom owes its entire existence to the Indian-Ocean trade network and holds very little real control over the African inland we must always be on our guard for the people of the interior. One such group, the cannibalistic Zimba, have been spreading fear along the coast far to our south. With little warning the Zimba suddenly descended on the city of Kilwa itself today. Many Kilwan citizens are now dead and even more have fled the city. It will take years for Kilwa to recover, we can scarcely remember a greater tragedy in the history of our kingdom.
translation: 我国虽然坐拥整个印度洋海岸，但是内陆腹地却完全不在我国掌控之中。时常会有内陆的野蛮人来袭击我国的城市。津巴食人部落就是我等的心腹大患。不久前，这些魔鬼趁我国不备，奇袭了基勒瓦城。毫无准备的基勒瓦不多时便沦陷在了这些恶魔手中。昔日的荣耀之城燃起了熊熊烈火，路边尸骨累累，残缺不全的身体器官随地可见，散发着刺鼻的焦臭味。基勒瓦已然化作一座死城，我们只能在回忆中见到它过去的荣光了。

original: Use all resources to rebuild and restore Kilwa.
Coup of Suleiman and Muhammad al-Mazlum

When Sultan Ismâ'îl ascended the throne of Kilwa in 1442 his rule was questioned by the local rulers in Zanzibar who supported his relative Said's bid to become sultan. Said's plot was, however, thwarted by the royal vizier Suleiman and the emir Muhammad al-Mazlum.\nWith the passing of Ismâ'îl himself, however, it seems Suleiman and Muhammad have decided that the time has come for them to rule in their own name. Acting quickly they have used their influence to secure the capital for themselves and have agreed to share power by taking the throne in turns.
translation: 苏丹易司马仪于1442在基勒瓦即位后，许多桑给巴尔部落首领纷纷支持他远亲——赛义德与其夺权。经过一番权争，苏丹方才在两位重臣——苏莱曼国师和默罕默德·玛斯兰酋长的支持下，巩固了自己的王位。赛义德的阴谋被忠诚的维齐尔苏莱曼和埃米尔Muhammad al-Muzlum所挫败。\n随着易司马仪的去世，苏莱曼和穆罕默德开始决定是他们自己统治的时候了。他们快速行动，利用人脉和影响力控制了首都，并且同意以轮流上台的形式来分享权力。

original: While $MONARCH$ had served as minister of the throne in many years before usurping power directly his coup has made him unpopular among the citizens of Kilwa. Prominent citizens are now demanding his resignation and unless placated we may have a revolt on our hands sooner or later.
translation: $MONARCH$在篡夺王位之前，他当国王的大臣很多年。他的政变行为让他在基勒瓦的平民中间非常不受欢迎。很多人民现在要求他退位，除非我们进行怀柔，一场叛乱正迫在眉睫。

original: Our ruler has won the right to this throne.
translation: 我们的统治者是王冠合法的主人.

original: Holding on to the Kilwan throne has never been easy and with the great number of plots surrounding the coronation of monarchs over the last decades the post of Vizier in the royal government has become one sought by ambitious men wanting the throne for themselves rather than loyal administrators eager to serve the crown.\nThe faltering popularity of the monarchy lately was apparently all that our current Vizier needed to attempt to secure the throne for himself.
translation: 保住基勒瓦的王位从来不是易事，无数的阴谋围绕在君主身边。过去数十年来，呆在维齐尔这个职位的人总是想要满足自己获取王位的野心，而不是忠诚地为王室服务。\n最近国王人气衰落很显然让维齐尔开始觉得需要去争取为自己夺取王冠。

original: A popular movement in this area has begun working towards limiting central authority and trying to establish an orthodox Islamic state governed by Sharia.
translation: 这一地区的一项受欢迎的运动开始朝向限制中央权力发展，他们开始想要建立正统的伊斯兰国统治并实行沙里亚法。

original: Marabout preachers inspired by the charismatic Nasir al-din have begun propagating for an Islamic reformation in $PROVINCENAME$. Many local warriors have joined with the Marabout and together they are now working outside of the state to create a society here following the Sharia in its purest form. They are violently opposed to any pagan traditions or foreign influences.
translation: 在富有魅力的Nasir al-din感召之下，隐士传道者开始在$PROVINCENAME$传播伊斯兰改革的理念。许多当地的战士加入了隐士的队伍，现在他们共同在国家外部努力建造一个遵循纯粹沙里亚法的社会。他们极端反对任何异教传统或者外国的影响。

original: Religious tensions have been slowly rising in our country since the rise of the Marabouts in the middle of the 17th century. Now the Marabout faction in $COUNTRYNAME$ have come out in open revolt against the old aristocracy in $CAPITAL_CITY$. The promised revolution has quickly gotten the support of many of the Fulani herdsmen that are present in large parts of our state and it is clear that we will soon have a very serious revolt on our hands.
translation: 随着17世纪中期伊斯兰隐士运动的兴起，我们国家中的宗教紧张正在逐步升级。现在在$COUNTRYNAME$的隐士派系已经公然反抗$CAPITAL_CITY$的旧贵族。革命迅速地获得了许多富拉尼牧人的支持，在许多地区都存在着革命势力，一场大叛乱迫在眉睫。

original: We must join the revolution, death to the aristocrats!
translation: 我们必须加入革命，让贵族都去死!

original: As our country has now entirely abandoned the Islamic ideals on which it was built the Marabout faction has left our country and moved on to other places.
translation: 既然我们国家已经彻底抛弃了伊斯兰理想，基于此之上的隐士派系离开了我们国家跑去其他地方作乱了。

original: Unrest among the Fulani & Orthodox Muslims
translation: 富拉尼人和正统派穆斯林的骚动

original: Our policies of state in general and our actions against the followers of Usman dan Fodio in particular have led to widespread unrest in our country. Fulani Muslims abroad view us with content and our own subjects reject our authority. Surely things will calm down soon?
translation: 我们整体的国策以及针对奥斯曼·丹·福迪奥的追随者的行动导致了国内大规模的骚动，国外的富拉尼穆斯林认为我们软弱可欺，我们的附庸藐视我们的权威，事情能很快平息下来吗？

original: Inspired by the Fulani religious revolutions Usman dan Fodio, a Fulani Muslim scholar in Gobir, have begun agitating for reform in our country. His strong message and his charismatic person has impressed parts of our population and a growing movement now supports the creation of a Caliphate governed by orthodox Islamic traditions, adherence to the Sharia and the mission to spread the true faith in West Africa.\nThe message is also quite critical of the current way our state is run and the authorities in Gobir fear for that Usman Dan Fodio's followers might soon openly revolt against our rule.
translation: 被富拉尼的宗教革命所激励，奥斯曼·丹·福迪奥，在戈比尔的一位富拉尼穆斯林学者，开始在我们国家鼓吹改革，他的坚定信念和个人魅力让部分人民如痴如醉，现在有一个正在进行中的运动支持用正统穆斯林传统建立一个哈里发国家，完全遵循沙里亚法，并把真主的信仰散播到整个西非。\n他的理念对我们国家目前的政策持批评态度，戈比尔当局害怕福迪奥的追随者会公开发动反抗我们的叛乱。

original: Invite Usman dan Fodio to reform our country.
translation: 支持福迪奥改革我们的国家

original: This dangerous agitator and his followers must be expelled.
translation: 这个危险的煽动家和他的追随者必须被放逐

original: Usman dan Fodio and his followers will leave the country.
translation: 福迪奥和他的追随者离开了这个国家

original: The followers of Usman dan Fodio

The popular Islamic reformer Usman dan Fodio has been expelled by the authorities of Gobir. He and his followers are now looking for a pious ruler elsewhere who will allow them to reclaim the city of Gobir and create the orthodox Islamic state they dream of.
translation: 广受欢迎的伊斯兰改革家福迪奥最近被戈比尔当局流放。他和他的追随者现在正在找寻一位虔诚统治者，能允许他们在他的国家再一次宣称戈比尔的主权，并建立他们梦寐以求的正统伊斯兰国度。

original: The Sokoto Caliphate can now be created.
translation: 索科托哈里发国现在可以建立了。

original: Usman dan Fodio and his followers are now looking for a pious ruler who will allow them to rule the city of Gobir and create the orthodox Islamic state they dream of. We must help these pious men to achieve their goal and put our country at their disposal.
translation: 福迪奥和他的追随者正在找寻一位虔诚的统治者，能允许他们在他的国家再一次宣称戈比尔的主权，并建立他们梦寐以求的正统伊斯兰国度。我们必须帮助这些虔信的人来追寻他们的目标，并把我们国家给他们支配。

original: We have built a strong fortified city as the new capital of our dynasty here. Gazargamu ensures that our kings will be safe from foreign armies and pretenders alike.
translation: 我们建立了一座坚固的要塞城市作为我们王朝的新首都。加扎尔加姆可以确保我们国王的安全，使其不受他国军队或王位觊觎者之类的存在的威胁。

original: We have weeded out the old class of self-serving kingmakers among the various title-holders of our kingdom. Our current subordinates focus on serving the throne rather than enriching themselves.
translation: 我们淘汰了那些自私的旧贵族，他们只顾着保住自己的特权，甚至要干涉王室事务。现在我们留下的贵族都是忠心耿耿，而非心怀不轨。

original: We have a strict policy against any religious syncretism of heathen influences among our aristocracy.
translation: 我们在贵族中间实施了严格的法律来禁止异端的传播

original: The two branches of the Sayfawa dynasty
translation: 赛法瓦王朝的两个分支

original: Ever since the 14th century, there have been two branches of the Sayfawa dynasty fighting for the throne of our kingdom. As neither branch has been powerful enough to defeat the other entirely, the Idrisid and Dawudid lines have come take short turns on the throne. Some rulers have not even lasted a year. This conflict has gone on for far too long and by now our ministers and governors are all playing kingmakers while the kingdom burns.\nWith the death of our $MONARCHTITLE$, the usual disputed succession has taken place with a pretender taking up arms against the royal heir.
translation: 自从十四世纪开始赛法瓦王室的两个分支就互相争斗来争夺王冠。由于两个分支中的任何一个都没有足够的实力彻底击败另一支，所以结果是伊德里斯和达乌迪两个分支轮流执政。有时候有些国王统治的年份甚至不到一年。冲突已经持续太久，我们的大臣和官员都在这个权力的游戏里扮演角色，而让整个国家处在痛苦之中。\n随着$MONARCHTITLE$的去世，王位觊觎者再次起兵对抗继承人的烂戏再度上演。

original: While Borno is a rich province fully worthy to be the capital of our kingdom defending it has always a problem. From the east our old enemies the Bilala frequently raid into our lands and frequent succession wars also highlight the need for a more fortified capital.\nPlans have been drawn up for the creation of a fortified city on the western shore of lake Chad to ensure the future safety of our dynasty.
translation: 博尔诺是一个富有的省份，完全配得上成为我们的首都，但是如何防卫它一直是个难题。在国家东部，我们的老对手Bilala时常来劫掠我们的土地，而频繁发生的继承战争同样也凸显了一座新都的重要性。\n规划已经开始设想在乍得湖西岸建设一座利用要塞设防的城市来保证我们王朝的安全。
强制实行正统伊斯兰教法

original: While our Islamic Sultanate is one of the older in this region it is even among the upper classes an unorthodox and syncretic religion. Inspired by the many learned men who come to our capital $MONARCH$ has been considering if we should start a purge of the religious syncretism, especially among the aristocracy and the members of the royal dynasty. As the Dawudid line gets some of their support from heathens we can only hope that this will perhaps also lessen the political instability of our country.
translation: 我们国家在这片区域很早就皈依了伊斯兰，但在上流阶层中非正统和综摄仍然在流行。受到许多来到我们国家首都的学者的启发，$MONARCH$开始考虑是否应该清除所谓综摄的影响，尤其是在王室和贵族中间。既然达乌迪分支从异教徒那里得到不少支持，我们只能希望这么做可以减少我们国家的不稳定。

original: Let us not go overboard with this.
translation: 还是不要过于投入在这件事上.

original: During the political instability and the frequent conflicts between Dawudids and Idrisids everyone from our local titleholders to the ministers in our palace have gotten used to be able to play kingmakers while enriching themselves using the resources of the state.\nThis must end. Let us revoke their privileges and if needed even their titles and remind them of their duties to the throne.
translation: 在政治不稳定，王室的两大分支达乌迪和伊德里斯不断斗争的背景下，我们的贵族以及宫廷大臣开始玩起了造王者的游戏，依仗他们所掌握的资源左右国家政策，加强自身的权力。\n不能再这样下去了，让我们来停止他们的特权，如果有必要，还要褫夺他们的头衔，让他们清楚自身的地位。

original: We cannot infringe upon their rights.
translation: 我们不能侵犯他们的权力。

original: The Abbasid claimant Abd al-Azis Yakub has bestowed the title of Calipha on our $MONARCHTITLE$. This strongly legitimizing gesture is something we will make sure nobody forgets and all $MONARCH$'s successors shall use the title from now on.
translation: 宣称是阿拔斯继承者的阿卜杜勒-阿齐斯 亚库布已经在$MONARCHTITLE$之上加冕了哈里发的头衔。这种强正统的姿态可以向世人表明我们会让所有人记得$MONARCH$的继任者从今以后会获得这个头衔。

original: Inspired by what he has seen on his Hajj our $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$ have decided that our kingdom must modernize its army and economy. $MONARCH$ have already begun to take steps to strengthen our cavalry arm, invite Turkish gunners and adopt the administrative techniques he has seen among our Muslims brothers between here and Mecca.
translation: 受到麦加朝圣时所见所闻的激励，我们的$MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCH$决定我国要改革军队和经济制度。$MONARCH$ 开始要求逐步加强我们的骑兵部队，引入土耳其火枪以及采用麦加以及其他地区穆斯林兄弟们正在使用的管理技术

original: Reform both the economy and the army.
During the regency of $HEIR$ the queen mother Aisha has come to shine. Under the firm and forceful rule of this remarkable regent the kingdom itself and its future ruler are both prospering.
translation: 在$HEIR$的摄政会议期间，母后阿伊莎开始走上前台。随着强力的统治，她能使王国在她本人以及继承人上台之后持续繁荣

original: With the death of our ruler, the usual disputed succession has taken place with a pretender taking up arms against the royal heir.
translation: 随着统治者的去世，继承争议像往常一样再度发生，一名觊觎者武装起来反对王室继承人继任。

original: You cannot revoke electorates unless there is an official religion in the Empire.
translation: 除非帝国有官方信仰，否则不能废除选帝侯。

original: \nYou need transport ships in order to transport troops with this fleet.

Though they are long gone, the Chalukya Empire which stretched from the Deccan to the Tamil kingdoms remains a powerful memory. As our own empire has expanded and advanced, the poets and chroniclers write as though Vijayanagar were the Chalukya Empire reborn. Now that we have seized the ancient Chakulya capital of Kalyana, located not far from the former Bahmani capital of Bidar, we have an opportunity to relocate the court to the northern city so that we can fully claim the Chalukya legacy as our own.\n\nThe traditional capital at Vijayangar, The City of Victory, yet remains a great and prestigious city however, and allows us to forge an imperial legacy of our own.
translation: 虽然它们早已不复存在，但从德干到达泰米尔王国的查卢基亚帝国仍然是一个强大的记忆。随着我们自己帝国的扩张和发展，诗人和史学家写道，毗奢耶那伽罗就像是查卢基亚帝国的重生。现在我们已经占领了距离前巴赫曼尼首都比达尔不远的古老的查卢基亚的首都卡雅那，我们有机会将宫廷迁移到这座北方城市，以便我们能够完全宣称查卢基亚的遗产是我们自己的。\n\n传统首都毗奢耶那伽罗，这座胜利之城，仍然是一个伟大和著名的城市，并允许我们建立我们自己的帝国遗产。

original: The City of Victory will remain our capital.
translation: 胜利之城将继续作为我们的首都。

original: We will claim the Chalukya legacy, move the capital to Kalyana!
translation: 我们要获取遮娄其的遗产，迁都到卡雅那！

original: Leave the capital in its present location.
translation: 把首都保留在目前的位置。

original: The Vijayangar Empire stands victorious over all of its enemies; the upstart Bahmani Sultanate is utterly defeated, the Tamil kings dutifully accept our rule, and we have even added Andhra and Lanka to our domain. Feasts and festivals in the capital celebrate the moment of our victory in south India as the Maharaja confers upon [Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] the title of Chhatrapati in a clear message to the world that Vijayanagar will submit to no foreign power.
translation: 毗奢耶那伽罗帝国战胜了所有的敌人；自命不凡的巴赫曼尼帝国彻底被击败，泰米尔诸王忠实地接受了我们的统治，而我们甚至将安得拉和兰卡纳入我们的版图。我们在南印度的胜利之时，首都中欢宴庆祝王公授予[Root.Owner.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]印度皇帝的头衔，向世界发出了明确的信号，毗奢耶那伽罗帝国不会屈从于外国势力。

original: Bengal’s reach extends from the Punjab to the Chinese frontier. There have been few mightier empires in history, and none better ruled. Celebrations of our victory resound throughout the empire, but nowhere more so than in [Root.Capital.GetName] where commoners, merchants, scholars, and nobles alike flock to bask in [Root.Monarch.GetName]’s glory.\n\nThe Bengal Tiger is triumphant!
translation: 从旁遮普到中国边境都已纳入孟加拉的统治。历史上几乎没有有如此强大的帝国，也没有更好的统治。我们胜利庆典的欢呼在整个帝国回想，在[Root.Capital.GetName]中更是如此，平民，商人，学者和贵族都享受[Root.Monarch.GetName]所带来的的荣光。\n\n孟加拉虎凯旋！

original: At last our secondary capital is almost finished. A stately city with palaces mosques, temples, an advanced water supply system and not the least important fortifications, now exists around the hilltop of Champaner.\nOne of the finest buildings is the huge Jama Masjid Mosque in the exquisite Gujarati Indo-Muslim style that our sultanate has become known for.
translation: 最终我们的第二首都就要完工了。一座有宫殿清真寺，寺庙，一个先进供水系统以及牢固堡垒的庄严的城市，现在就位于尚潘纳周围的山顶上。\n其中最精美的建筑物便是我们苏丹举世闻名的精致的古吉拉特印度穆斯林风格的贾玛清真寺。

original: For centuries Venetian glass has dominated the glassmaking sector, with smaller glassmaking enterprises trying to faithfully emulate the masters on Murano island. Bohemia has been a glass-making region since the 12th century, but by combining their native chalk with potash in a new method the Bohemian glass-makers are now finally able to challenge the Venetian glass. The new strand of Bohemian crystal is both more durable, brilliant and distinctly different in its style form the Venetian glass. Bohemian crystal chandeliers, glass jewelry, and engraved glass is rapidly becoming a common sight in all the courts of Europe.
translation: 几个世纪以来，威尼斯玻璃一直支配着玻璃制造业，小型玻璃制造企业试图忠实地模仿穆拉诺岛上的大师。波希米亚自十二世纪以来就一直是生产玻璃的地区，但是通过一种新的方法结合他们本地的白垩和钾盐后，波希米亚的玻璃制造商现在终于能够挑战威尼斯玻璃。改进后的波西米亚水晶比威尼斯玻璃更加耐久，光亮，并且在风格上截然不同。波希米亚水晶吊灯，玻璃珠宝和雕刻玻璃正迅速成为欧洲所有宫廷的常见景观。

original: Throughout its history, several great cities have had the honor of being the political center of the Moroccan sultanate. Under the Idrisids and Marinids, the northern city of Fez has been the favored seat of government, allowing its rulers to lead the charge against their enemies in Iberia and the eastern Maghreb. The Almavorids and Almohads favored the southern city of Marrakech, while Caliph Yaqub al-Mansur attempted to establish the capital at Rabat. Some in the court argue that Meknes could also serve as a political center. Any of these cities would make a fine capital for our nation.
translation: 这座历史悠久的大城市有幸成为摩洛哥苏丹国的政治中心。在伊德里斯和马里尼德的统治下，北部城市非斯备受政府的青睐，使其统治者对抗伊比利亚半岛以及马格里布东部的敌国。 在穆拉比特以及穆瓦希德王朝时期则更青睐于南部的城市马拉喀什，而哈里发雅各布阿曼苏尔则试图在拉巴特建立首都。也有一些政客认为梅内克斯也可以作为一个政治中心。这些城市中的任何一个都可以成为我国的一个优良首都。

original: In the wake of the conflict between the Wattasids and Marinids, the powers of the south have begun to stir. Sensing weakness, the Sufis, tribes, and Emirs have begun to form alliances and make marriage pacts among one another. Though many in the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]’s court are content to leave them to their own devices and cloister themselves in [Root.Capital.GetName], the threat from the south will only continue to grow if they are not dealt with.
translation: 在唤醒了瓦塔斯王朝与马林王朝的冲突后，南方的势力逐渐开始激起。苏菲派，部落和埃米尔人之间已经开始形成联盟，并相互通婚。尽管[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]政府中的许多人都满足于将他们留在自己的领土和清真寺中并且在[Root.Capital.GetName]中避免冲突，但若不着手处理这些情况，来自南方的威胁将持续增长。

original: A show of force will remind them of their place.
translation: 展示武力以使他们明白自己的位置。

original: We should leave them to their own affairs.
translation: 我们应该让他们自己解决问题。

original: The Government Rank of §Y[Root.GetName]§! changes to §YEmpire§!.
